chylderen enemye sowed deuell apoca harueste ende world reaper angel lyke ye tare therfore gathered together brent fyre shall ende worlde sonne man shall sende hys angel shall gather hys kyngdome sklau ders commytte iniquite shall cast chymney fyre shalbe wepynge gnasshynge teth daui sapi b cor e shall ryghteous shyne ye sonne ye kyngdome theyr father hath eares heare let hym heare agayne kyngdome heauens lyke vnto treasure hyd felde whych fyndeth hydeth ioye therof goeth selleth hath byeth felde agayne kyngdome heauens lyke vnto marchaunt man sekynge good perles philip wha one precious perle foude wente solde bought agayne kyngdome heaues lyke vnto nette cast see gatherynge together euery kynde fysshes whych whan full drawynge syttynge shore chose good fyshes theyr vessel cast euell math b shall ende worlde angel shall go forth separate euell myddes ye ryghteous shall caste chymney fyre math c shalbe pynge gnashynge teth haue ye vnderstande thynges said vnto yee lord sayd vnto euery scribe therfore learned kyngdome heaues lyke vnto man housholder bryngeth hys treasure new thynges olde marci luce b came passe whan iesus ended parable departed thence commynge co try taught theyr sinagoges maruayled sayde whence commeth thys wysedome vertues vnto hym ioh c thys carpenter sonne hys mother called mary hys brother iames ioseph simon iude hys systers wyth v whence hath thynges offended hym iesus sayde vnto marci luce c ioh e prophete wythout honoure hys owne contry hys owne house dyd many myracles theyr vnbelefe xiiii chapter marci b luce tetrarcha hath iurisdiccion ouer fourth part great lordeshippe tyme herode tetrarcha herde fame iesu sayd vnto hys seruauntes thys ihon baptist rysen dead therfore myracles worke hym luce c herode helde ihon bounde hym put hym preson herodias hys brother wyfe ihon sayd vnto hym leuiti b c lawfull haue wyllynge put hym death feared people gene c thy estymed hym prophet math b daye herodes byrth dyd doughter herodias daunce myddes marci pleased herode wherfore promysed wyth oth geue euer wolde haue axed hym beynge counseled afore hyr mother sayd geue platter head ihon baptist kynge sory oth sat together table commaunded geuen sente beheaded ihon preson hys heade brought platter geuen vnto damesell brought vnto hir mother disciple also approchynge nye toke body buried commynge tolde iesus marci luce b whych whan iesus herde departed thence lytle ship deserte place waye ioh aand whan ye people herd followed hym foote cyties departynge thence saw great multitude pytie healed theyr sycke whan euen come hys disciple came hym sayeng desert place ye houre ouerpast sende thou people awaye goynge maye bye meate iesus sayd vnto haue nede go geue ye eat answered hym haue fyue bread two fyshes whych sayd vnto brynge hether wha co mauded people syt downe vpo grasse whan fyue breades two fysshes taken lokynge vp heauen blessed brake gaue breades vnto hys disciple disciple gaue vnto people dyd eate fylled toke remnauntes euen twelfe baskettes full broken meates nombre eater fyue thousande men besyde wemen chylderen marci ioha immediatly iesus caused disciple go vp lytle shippe go hym ouer water tyll sent awaye people people beynge sent awaye luc bhe wante vp mountayne praye hymselfe alone whan yt euen come pa alone lytle shippe tossed wyth wawes myddes ye see wynde contrary ye fourth watch nyght came vnto walkynge vpon see seynge hym walkynge vpon see troubled sayenge vision feare cryed immediatly iesus spake vnto sayeng haue confidence feare peter answerynge sayd lorde yf thou commaunde come vnto vpon water sayde come peter goyng downe lytle shippe walked vpon water yt myght come vnto iesus seynge wynde stronge afrayed whan begonne synke cryed sayenge lord saue thou immediatly iesus rtchynge forth hande toke holde hym sayde vnto thou lytle fayth hast thou douted marci whan come vp lytle shyppe wynde ceassed shyppe came worshypped hym sayenge truly yu art sonne god whan gone ouer ye water came londe genesar whan place knowne hym sent al contry presented vnto hym suche euell ease prayed hym myght touche heme hys garment whosoeuer touched safe xv chapter came vnto hym hierusale scrybes pharisesmarc sayenge thy disciple trasgresse tradicios elder wash theyr handes whan eate bread answerynge sayd vnto ye also transgresse commaundement god owne tradicions sake god hath sayde exodi b deut c c honoure thou father mother euer curseth father mother let hym dye death ye saye prou soeuer shall say father mother gift soeuer shall profyt shall honoure hys father hys mother commaundement god haue ye made none effecte owne tradicions sake ye ypocrites well hath esay prophecied sayeg esay c ezech fthys people honoureth lippes theyr hart farre fro vayne serue teachynge doctrynes preceptes men whan people called together vnto hym sayde vnto heare vnderstande entreth ye mouth defyleth man whyche procedeth mouthe defyleth man disciple co mynge nye sayd vnto hym knowest thou pharises wha herde thys sayenge offended answerynge sayde actu euery plant heauenly father hath planted shalbe rooted let alone blynd leader blynde yf blynde leade blynde fall diche peter answerynge sayde vnto hym mar b expounde vnto v parable sayde vnto also yet wythout vnderstondynge ye vnderstonde thas euery thynge entreth ye mouth goeth belly cast draught thynges whiche procede mouth go hart defyle man fro hart go euell thoughtes manslaughter aduoutries fornicacios theftes false wytnesses blasphemyes defyle man eate vnwasshen hades defyleth iesus beynge departed thence wente forth coastes tyre sidon beholde woma canaa beyng come forth coastes cryed sayenge vnto hym haue mercy lorde thou sonne dauid doughter euell vexed deuell answered word hys disciple approchyng nye besought hym sayenge sende awaye cryeth v answerynge sayde luc sent vnto shepe israel perished came worshypped hym sayenge lorde helpe answerynge sayde good take ye chyldrens bread cast vnto dogges sayde yee lord whelpes also eate crommes fall theyr lordes table iesus answerynge sayde vnto woman greate thy fayth vnto euen thou wylt hyr doughter healed houre whan iesus departed thece came see syde galile goynge vp mountayne sat ther came vnto hym muche people hauynge wyth dome blynde lame feble many layed hys fete esai healed people maruayled seynge domme speakynge lame walkynge ye blynde seynge magnified god israell marc iesus whan disciple called together sayde haue pytie people seynge contynue thre dayes haue maye eate wyll let go awaye fastynge lest myscary ye waye disciple saye vnto hym whence shal get v much bread wyldernesse maye satisfye greate multitude iesus sayde vnto howe many loaues haue ye sayde seuen fewe lytle fysshes commaunded ye people shulde syt downe vpon grounde takynge seuen loaues fisshes geuynge thankes brake gaue disciple disciple gaue vnto people dyd eate satisfyed remayned broke meates toke away euen seuen baskettes ful dyd eate foure thousande men besyde chyldren weme whan multitude sent awaye wente vp lytle shyppe came coastes magedan xvi chapter marc b ioh pharises also saduces came vnto hym teptynge requyred hym wolde shewe token fro heauen luce f answerynge sayde vnto whan euen come passe ye saye wyll fayre skye reed mornynge wyll foule wether skye gloomynge reed ye discerne face skye discerne token tymes math euel aduouterous generacion seketh token ther shall token geue vnto ye token prophet ione ionas beyng forsaken wente hys waye marc b wha disciple come ouer ye water forgat take ye bread sayd vnto luce take hede beware leuen pharises saduces thought amonge themselues haue take bread iesus knowyng sayd ye thynke amonge youre selues ye lytle fayth ye haue ye bread ye yet vnderstonde remembre mat c fyue bread fue thousande men howe many baskettes toke ye vp math nother seuen bread foure thousande men howe many baskettes toke ye vp ye vnderstande howe spake vnto bread beware leuen pharises ye saduces vnderstode bad beware leuen bread doctryne pharises saduces mar luc c iesus came coastes cesarea philippi axed disciple sayenge whome men saye sonne man sayde ihon baptiste elia hieremy one prophetes iesus sayeth vnto whome saye simon peter answerynge sayde luce c ioh gthou art christe sonne lyuynge god iesus answerynge sayd vnto hym blessed art thou simon bar iona fleshe bloude hath shewed vnto ioh ebut father ye heauens saye vnto thou art peter vpo thys cor stone wyl buylde congregacio para b esaie c gate hell shall preuayle agaynst vnto wyll geue keyes kyngdome heauens math b ioh c soeuer thou byndest vpon earth shal bounde also heauens soeuer thou lowesest vpon earthe shalbe lowsed heauens also charged hys disciple shuld tell man iesus christe mar luce c tyme forth beganne iesus shew vnto hys disciple must go hierusalem suffre many thynges elder scrybes chefe ye prestes slayne ryse agayne thyrde daye peter takyng beganne rebuke hym sayenge farre fro lorde shal happen vnto beynge turned sayde vnto peter reg go thou sata thou hyndrest thou sauourest thynges god math mar e luce c ioh c sayde iesus vnto disciple yf ony man wyll come let hym denye hymselfe take vp hys crosse followe wyll saue hys lyfe shall lose loseth hys lyfe sake shall fynde profiteth man yf wynne ye whole world suffre harme vnto hys soule exchauge shal gyue hys soule ye sonne man shal come glory hys father wyth hys angel rom shall recompence euery man accordynge hys workes mat luce c verely saye vnto ther standyng whych shal tayst death tyll se sonne man commynge hys kyngdome xvii chapter marc luc syxe dayes toke iesus peter iames ihon brother bryngeth vnto hye mountayn waye transfigured apoc chys face shone sonne hys garmetes whyte snow beholde ther appeared vnto moses elia talkynge wyth hym peter answerynge sayde vnto iesus lorde good beyng v yf yu wylt let v make thre tabernacle one one moses one elia whyle yet talkyng behold bryght cloude ouershadowed holde voyce cloude sayeng esa mat b mar beloued sonne whome well pleased heare hym disciple also hearynge fell vpon theyr face sort afrayed iesus came touched sayde vnto arise vp feare lyftynge vp theyr eye sawe noman iesus onely math comynge downe mount iesus commaunded sayenge ye shal tell vision man tyll sonne man aryse agayne ye dead disciple axed hym sayeng scrybes saye elia must fyrst come answerynge sayde vnto mala elia truely shall come restore thynges agayne saye vnto elia come already neuerthelesse haue done hym soeuer wolde euen also shall sonne man suffre vnderstode disciciples sayd vnto ihon baptist marci b luce whan come vnto people ther stepte vnto hym man fallynge downe hys knee hym sayeng lorde haue mercy sonne lunatyke suffreth grefe oftymes falleth fyre ofte water brought hym also vnto thy disciple coulde heale hym iesus answerynge sayd faythlesse frowarde generacion longe shall wyth longe shall suffre brynge hym hyther iesus rebuked hym deuell departed hym chylde healed houre marci c came disciple vnto iesus secretly sayenge myght cast hym iesus sayde vnto vnbelefes sake verely say vnto math c luce yf ye haue fayth grane mustarde sede ye shal saye vnto thys mountayne remoue hence shall remoue ther shall nothynge vnpossible vnto thys kynde caste prayer fastynge math c b marc luce c whyle occupyenge galile iesus sayd vnto sonne man muste betrayed handes men shall kyll hym thyrde daye shall ryse agayne exceadynge sory whan come capernaum yt receaued tribute money came peter sayd vnto hym doth master pay tribute mony sayd yee whan entred house iesus preueted hym sayenge thynkest thou simon kynges earth receaue tribute costume theyr owne chylderen straungers sayd straungers iesus sayd vnto chyldren fre math c offende go thou vnto see cast hooke take ye fysh commeth vp fyrst whan hys mouthe openeda stater certayne pece money value aboute xx pen thou shalte fynde stater take geue vnto xviii chapter houre marci luce c came disciple vnto iesus sayenge thynkest thou greater kingdom heauens iesus callynge chylde vnto hym set hym myddes sayd verely saye vnto excepte ye turned become petri lytle chyldren ye shall entre kyngdom heauens euer humbleth hymselfe therfore thys lytle chylde greater kyngdome heauens receaueth suche one lytle chylde name receaueth marci e luce offedeth one lytle one whych beleue better hym yt mylstone ass hanged hys necke drowned depe see wo vnto worlde sklaunders cor b luce necessary sklaunders come neuerthelesse wo vnto sklau der commeth math marci c yf thy hande thy foote sklaunder cut hym cast hym good vnto yt entre vnto lyfe feble lame hauynge two hades two fete cast euerlastynge fyre yf thyne eye sklauder pluck hym cast hym fro good vnto entre lyfe hauynge one eye hauynge two eye cast hell fyre take hede ye despyse one lytle one say vnto theyr angel heaues alway beholde face father whych heauens sonne man come saue whych ben last thynke luce yf ony man haue hundreth shepe one gone astraye wyl leaue nyne nyenty mountaynes go seke yt wente astray yf chaunce yt fynde verely saye vnto ioyeth ouer tha ouer ye nyne nyenty whych went astray euen ye wyl father whyche heauens one lytle one perysh leuit eccli b luce yf thy brother synne agaynste go thy waye reproue hym betwene hym alone yf heare thou hast wonne thy brother yf heare take wt yet one two nume deute b c cor ye mouth two thre wytnesses sentence maye stande yf heare tell thou congregacio yf heare ye cogregacion let hym vnto heythen publicane verely saye vnto math c thynges euer ye bynd vpon earth shal bounde also heaue thynges euer ye lowse vpon earth shalbe lowsed heauen also agayne saye vnto yt yf two coset vpo earth cocernynge euery thynge axe shall come passe vnto fro father whyche heaues luce b two thre gathered together name myddes math b marci c luce peter commynge vnto hym sayde lorde ofte shall brother synne agaynst shall forgeue hym tyll seuen tymes iesus sayd vnto hym saye vnto tyll seuen tymes tyll seuenty tymes seuen tymes therfore kyngdome heauens lykened vnto man kynge whyche wolde laye accomptes hys seruautes whan begonne laye ye accomptes ther offered hym one oughte hym ten thousande talentes wha wher make recompence hys lorde co mauded hym solde hys wyfe chyldren al recopence made ye seruaut fallynge downe prayed sayeng haue pacience shall paye al lorde ye seruaunt hauynge copassion let hym go forgaue hym ye det seruaut beynge gone forth foud one hys fellowes ought hundreth pen takynge holde caught hym throte sayenge paye yt thou owest fellow fallynge downe prayed hym sayeng haue pacience shall paye neuerthelesse wolde wente cast hym preso tyll shulde paye dette hys companyos seynge thynges done sory came tolde theyr lorde euery thynge come passe tha hys lorde called hym sayde vnto hym iacob b thou wycked seruaut forgaue ye det thou pray dest shuldest thou haue compassion thy fellowe also haue compassion hys lorde beynge wroth delyuered hym ouer tormentours tyl payed det math b marci c thus shall heauely father also vnto yf ye forgeue euery one hys brother euen harte xix chapter marc came passe wha iesus ended sayenges departed galile came ye coastes iewry beyonde iordane much people followed hym healed pharises came vnto temptynge sayenge whether lawfull man put awaye hys wyfe ony maner cause whyche answerynge sayde vnto haue ye red whych made man begynnynge made male female sayde genese thys shall man leaue father mother cleue vnto hys wyfe two shalbe one flesh ar two one flesh wherfore let man put asunder whych god hath coupled together sayde vnto hym deute iere mala c dyd moses commaunde byll deuorcement geuen put awaye sayd vnto moses hardenesse harte suffred put awaye youre wyues fro begynnynge hath ben saye vnto math marci luce c euer putteth away wyfe saue fornicacion maryeth another commytteth aduoutrye marieth put awaye comytteth aduoutrye hys disciple saye vnto hym yf cause man wyth wyfe good mary whych sayd vnto men comprehende thys sayenge whome geuen ther gelded borne fro mother wombe ther gelded made men ther gelded haue gelded selues kyngdom heauens coprehede let hym comprehende marci b luce b ther preseted vnto hym yonge chylderen myght laye handes praye disciple reproued neuerthelesse iesus sayd vnto suffre chyldren forbyd ye come vnto vnto suche belongeth kyngdo heaues wha layed handes departed thence marci b luce b beholde one comynge nye sayd vnto hym good mayster good shall maye haue euerlastynge lyf whyche sayde vnto hym axest thou good psal god good yf thou wylte entre vnto lyfe kepe exod deute commaundementes sayeth vnto hym whych iesus sayd thou shalte commyt slaughter thou shalte aduoutry thou shalte commytte thefte thou shalte speake false wytnesse honoure thy father mother rom b galat b thou shalte loue thy neghboure thy selfe yonge man sayeth vnto hym haue kepte youth lacke yet iesus sayd vnto hym luce dyf thou wylte perfecte go sell thou haste geue poore thou shalte haue math c treasure heauen come followe whan yonge man herde sayenge went hys waye heuy hauynge many possession marc c luce c iesus sayd vnto hys disciple verely saye vnto rych man shall hardly entre kyngdome heauens agayne saye vnto easyer camell go thorowe nedels eye rych entre kyngdome heauens whan thynges herde disciple maruayled exceadyngly sayenge may saued iesus lokynge vp sayde vnto wyth men thys impossible achari wt god al thynges possible peter answeringe sayd vnto hym beholde math c marci c luce c haue forsaken thynges followed shall haue therfore iesus sayd vnto verely saye vnto luce b whan sonne shal syt ye seat hys maiesty whych haue followed regeneracion shall sytte also vppon twelfe seates api iudgynge twelfe trybes israell deute b euery one forsaketh house bretheren systers father mother chyldren londes name sake iob b shall receaue hundreth folde possesse euerlastyng lyfe math b luce many fyrst shalbe last ye laste fyrste xx chapter kyngdome heaues lyke vnto housholder wente forthe early mornynge hyre worke men hys vyneyarde wha bargayne made wyth workemen peny daye sente hys vyneyarde beynge gone forth thyrde houre sawe standynge ydle market sayd vnto go ye also vyneyard whych shalbe ryght wyll geue wente theyr waye agayne wente forth aboute sixte nyenth houre dyd lyke wyse aboute eleuenth houre wente forth founde standynge sayeth vnto stande ye ydle daye saye vnto hym noman hath hyred v sayeth vnto go ye also vyneyard whan nyght lorde vyneyard sayeth vnto hys steward call workemen paye rewarde begynnynge last vnto ye fyrst wha therfore dyd come yt came ye eleuenth hour receaued pen euery one fyrst also commynge supposed shulde receaue also receaued pen euery one receauyng murmured housholder sayenge last haue wrought one houre hast thou made lyke vnto v whiche haue borne burthen heates daye answerynge vnto one sayde frende wronge diddest thou agree wt peny take thyne go thy waye wyll geue vnto thys last also lyke vnto ye rom c lefull wyll thyn eye wicked goodmath mar c luce c last shalbe fyrst fyrst ye last many called chosen b iesus goyng vp ierusalem toke twolue disciple secrete sayde vnto marc luc beholde go vp ierusalem ye sonne shalbe delyuered ouer vnto hygh prestes scrybes shal condene hym death also shall delyuer hym ouer vnto heythen mocked scourged crucified thyrde daye shall ryse agayne mar b came vnto hym mother ye chyldre zebede wt hyr sonnes worshyppyng axynge somwhat hym sayde vnto wylt thou sayd vnto hym co maunde yt two sone may sytte one thy ryghthand one thy left hand thy kyngdo iesus answeryng sayd ye wot ye axe may ye drynke ye cup yt shal drynk say vnto hym maye sayd vnto cuppe truly shall ye drynke syt ryght left hande myne geue suche math c prepared father ten hearynge toke indygnacion two brother iesus called vnto hym sayde mar e knowe prynces nacions haue domynion greater men execute authorite vpo shal amoge euer wyl become greater amoge let hym mynister wylbe chefest amonge shalbe seruaunt lyke ye sonne man came serued serue bestowe hys lyfe redempcion many marci luce wha departyng hierico much people followed behold two blynd men syttyng waye syde herde iesus wente cryed sayenge lorde thou sonne dauid haue mercy vpon v people rebuked shulde holde theyr peace neuerthelesse cryed sayde lord thou sonne dauid haue mercy vpo v iesus stode called sayde wyll ye shall vnto sayde vnto hym lorde oure eye maye opened iesus compassion vpon touched theyr eye immediately sawe followed hym xxi chapter mac luc c wha drewe nye vnto ierusale come bethphage vnto mout oliuete sent iesus two disciple sayng vnto go towne lyeth ouer agaynst anone ye shal fynde asse boude hyr foale wyth lowse brynge vnto yf ony man saye ought vnto saye ye lorde hath nede strayght waye wyll let go thys done myght fulfylled spoke prophet sayenge esay c ach b tell doughter sion hold thy kynge co meth vnto meke syttynge vpon asse foale sonne asse vsed yock disciple goyng dyd iesus comaunded brought asse ye foale layed theyr clothes vpon made hym syt theron io bbut muche people spred theyr garmentes way cut downe braunches fro tree strowed waye people wente came cryed sayenge sanna vnto sonne dauid psal c bessed commeth name lorde sanna heyght mac b luc whan come ierusalem cytie moued sayenge thys people sayde ioha thys iesus prophet nazareth galile ioh b ioh iesus wente ye teple god cast yt bought solde temple ouerthrewe ye table money chaungers seates solde doues sayde vnto wrytten reg esay iere house shall called house prayer ye haue made denne murthurers blynde lame came vnto hym temple healed whan ye hyghe prestes scrybes sawe wo ders dyd chylderen cryenge temple sayenge sanna vnto sonne dauid dysdayned sayd vnto hym areste thou saye iesus sayd vnto yee haue ye neuer red psal mouth babe sucklynges hast thou finished prayse lefte ioh went cytie bethania abode marc c mornyng returnynge cytie hungred seynge ye way luce fygge tre came vnto foude nothyng theron leaues onely sayde vnto neuer frute growe foreuer immediatlye fygge tre wythered disciple seynge maruayled sayenge wythered soone iesus answerynge sayd vnto verely say vnto math c luce yf ye haue fayth doute ye shal onely thys wyth fyggetre yf ye saye vnto mountayne auoyded caste thy selfe see shall done marc c ioh c euer ye axe prayer beleuynge ye shall receaue luc mar whan come temple chefe prestes ye elder people came vnto hym teachyng sayenge exod b actu authoryte doest thou thinges gaue yt thys authorite iesus answerynge sayd vnto wyll axe worde also yf ye tell lyke wyse wyll tell authorite thynges baptyme ihon whence heauen thought amonge themselues sayenge yf saye heauen shall saye vnto v dyd ye beleue yf saye men feare ye people mat euery holdeth ihon prophet answeryng iesu sayde ca tel sayde vnto also nother tell authoryte thynges thynke ye certayne two sonnes comynge fyrst sayde go thy way sonne worke day vyneyard answeryng sayd wil afterward repentyng wet comynge also vnto ye second sayd lykewyse answeryng sayde go syr went whether twayne dyd ye wil ye father sayd vnto hym fyrst iesus sayde vnto verely saye vnto yt publican harlot go ye kyngdo god math iho ca vnto ye way rightousnes ye beleued ye publicas harlottes beleued seyng yet ye repetauce afterward yt ye myght haue beleued hi hear another parable ther housholder gene esay iere b marc luce planted wyneyarde hedged aboute dygged wynepresse buylt tower let oute vnto husbandme went straunge contry whan tyme frute drawen neare sent seruauntes husbandman receaue frutes husbandman catchynge seruautes one bet another kylled another stoned agayne sent seruauntes mo fyrst dyd vnto lyke maner laste sent sonne vnto sayenge wyll perchauce stonde awe sonne husbandman seynge sonne sayde amonge themselues thys heyre gene come let v kyl hym shall haue hys enherytaunce catchynge hym thrust hym vyneyard slewe hym nowe whan lord vyneyarde shall come wyl vnto husbandme sayde vnto hym shal cruelly destroye euell personnes let oute hys vyneyarde vnto husbandman shall delyuer hym frute hys tymes iesus sayde vnto dyd ye neuer reade scripture psal c actu pet stone buylders refused become heade stone corner thys done lorde maruaylous eye therfore saye vnto ye kyngdome god shall taken fro shalbe geuen vnto nacion whiche shall brynge forth frutes acha falleth vpon thys stone shall broken peces dani vpon falleth shall grynde hym whan hyghe prestes pharises herde hys parable perceaued spake c luc b sekynge take hym feared people ioh dthey helde hym prophet xxii chapter iesus answeryngeluce b spake vnto agayne parable sayeng kyngedome heauens lyke vnto man kynge whiche made mariage vnto hys sonne apo band sent hys seruaunt call bydden vnto mariage wolde come agayne sent seruautes sayng tel bydde gestes behold haue prepared dynner myne ox fed cattel kylled al thynges ready come ye mariage made lyghte went theyr wayes one ferme another hys marchaundyse remnaunt helde hys seruauntes beynge shamefully intreated slew whan kynge herde wroth sendynge hys hoostes destroyed murtherers set fyre vpo theyr cyti sayde vnto hys seruautes mariage dede prepared bidden worthy go therfore hyghe wayes whome euer ye fynd byd mariage hys seruau te beynge gone hye wayes gathered al fande good bad mariage full eater kynge wente se eater spyed man clothed wyth weddyng gamente sayd vnto hym frend howe cameste thou hauynge weddynge garmente euen spechlesse math f c sayde kynge vnto seruautes hys handes fete beynge boude cast hym vtter darknesse shall waylynge gnashynge teth mat b many called fewe chosen marci luc c ioha pharises goynge away toke counsell howe myghte take hym wordes sent vnto theyr disciple wyth herodes officer sayenge master knowe thou arte true teachest waye god truely carest man thou regardeste person men tell v therfore thynkest thou lawfull geue tribute vnto emperoure iesus knowynge theyr wyckednesse sayde ye ypocrytes tempte ye shewe tribute money offred hym peny iesus sayde vnto whose thys ymage superscripcion sayde vnto hym emperours sayde vnto mat rom b geue therfore emperours vnto emperoure god vnto god hearynge maruayled leauynge hym wente theyr waye mar b luc actu day came vnto hym saduces saye ther resurreccion axed hym sayenge master moses sayd deut yf man dead hauyng chyldren hys brother shall mary wyfe rayse vp sede vnto hys brother ther wyth v seuen brother fyrst maryeng wyfe dyed hauynge sede lefte hys wyfe vnto brother lykewyse seconde thyrde vnto seuenth last woman dyed also resurreccion therfore whose wyfe shall seuen al iesus answeryng sayd vnto ye erre vnderstandynge scripture power god resurreccion shall nother mary maryed ye angel god heauen resurreccion deade haue ye redde spoken god sayenge vnto exodi hebre c god abraham god isaac god iacob god dead lyuynge people hearynge maruayled hys doctrine marc c luce c pharises hearynge put saduces silence gathered together one doctoure lawe temptymge hym asked mayster whych great commaudement lawe iesus sayd vnto hym deute b b thou shalte loue lord thy god wyth thy harte thy soule thy mynde thys principall fyrst commaundemente seconde lyke vnto leuit e rom b thou shalte loue thy neghboure thy selfe two commaundementes hangeth lawe prophetes marc pharises beynge gathered iesus axed saynge thynke ye christ whose sone said vnto hym dauids sayd vnto doth dauid sprete call hym lorde saynge psal lord sayd vnto lorde syt thou ryghthades tyl set thyne enemyes stoole thy feete yf dauid therfore call hym lord hys sonne man coulde answere hym one word nother durst ony daye forthe axe hym ony mo question xxiii chapter spake iesus vnto people hys disciple sayenge scribe pharises haue sytten vpo moses seate therfore euer byd obserue theyr workes deute saye esay b luce bynde heuy intollerable burthen laye vpo men shulders theyr finger wil sturre theyr workes sene set abrode theyr philacteries wers wryttinges comau dementes writte philacteries make large heme loue syt vppermost meatetymes haue ye chefe seates synagoges salutacions ye market called men rabbi iaco ye called rabbi one master ye brethre call man father vpon earthe one father ye heaues nother ye called master one youre master christe greatest amoge shalbe seruaut luce b b exalteth hymself shal brought lowe yt hubleth hym selfe shalbe exalted luc wo vnto scribe pharises ye ypocrites ye shut vp ye kyngdo heaue ye entre selues nother suffre ye enter yt enter wo vnto scribe pharises ye ypocrites ye deuour wydowes house prayenge loge prayer therfore shal ye receaue greater iudgement wo vnto scribe pharises ye ypocrites ye copasse see lande yt ye may make one proselite nouice conuer e turned fro belefe hey vnto iewes proselite wha becom one ye make hym chylde hell two folde ye wo vnto blynde gydes ye say euer sweareth teple yt nothynge euer sweareth golde te ple gyltye ye fooles blynde whether greater golde temple yt sanctifyeth golde euer sweareth ye altare yt nothynge euer sweareth offerynge yt vpon gylty ye fooles blynde whether greater offerynge altare yt halloweth offerynge therfore sweareth ye altare sweareth al thinges theron sweareth temple sweareth hym dwelleth therin math euer sweareth heauen sweareth trone god hym sytteth theron luce dwo vnto scribe pharises ye ypocrites ye tyth mynt anyse commyn haue lefte wayghtyer matter lawe iudgement mercy fayth oughte haue bene done leaue behynde ye blynde gydes whych strayne gnat swalow vp camel luce wo vnto scrybes pharises ye ypocrites ye make cleane outesyde cuppe platter wythin ye ful robbery vnclennesse thou blynde pharise clense fyrst insyde ye cuppe platter ye outsyde may cleane also wo vnto scribe pharises ye ypocrites ye lyke vnto paynted sepulcres appeare bewtyfull outwarde vnto men wythin full dead men bone fylthynesse euen ye also outwarde ye appeare vnto men ryghteous wythin ye full ypocrisye iniquite luce wo vnto scribe pharises ye ypocrites ye buyld tombes prophetes garnysh sepulcres ryghteous saye yf bene oure father tyme wolde haue ben party fellowes wyth ye bloude prophetes tessa c therfore ye wytnesses vnto selues ye chyldre slewe prophetes fulfyll ye also ye measure father ye serpetes ye generacion vypers howe shall ye escape iudgement hell math b luc e actu e g ioh therfore saye vnto beholde sende vnto prophetes wyse men scrybes shall ye kyll crucifye shall ye scourge synagoges persecute cytie cytie vpon maye come al ryghteous bloude whych hath bene shed vpon earth bloude ryghteous gene b abel vnto bloude zacha azachary sonne barachias pa ye slewe betwene temple altare verely say vnto thynges shall come vpon thys generacion luc ierusalem ierusalem slayest prophetes stonest sent vnto ofte wolde haue gathered thy chyldren esd euen henne gathereth hyr chekens vnder wynges thou woldest behold psal house shalbe left vnto desolate say vnto ye shal se hence forth tyl ye shal say psa cblessed commeth name orde xxiiii chapter iesus departed fro temple wentmarc lu hys disciple came nye shewe hym buyldynges ye temple answeryng said vnto se ye al thynges verely saye vnto luce ther shall lefte one stone vpon another whych shal destroyed syttynge vpo mout oliuete disciple ca vnto hym secretly sayeng tel v wha shal thynges shalbe ye toke thy comyng ye ende ye world iesus answeryng sayd vnto colo c take hede yt deceaue ther shall many come name sayenge christ shall deceaue many ye shal heare warres noyses warres take hede ye troubled thynges must done ende yet esd c one people shall ryse vp agaynst another realme agaynst realme ther shalbe pestilence honger eartquakes thorow place begynnynge sorowes math b marc b luce b ioh shall put trouble shall kyll ye shalbe hated people name sake shall many offended shall betray one another shall hate eche many false prophetes shal aryse shall deceaue many e b iniquite shalbe pleteous charite many shal waxe colde math c endureth vnto ye ende shal safe marc b thys gospell ye kyngdome shalbe preached ye world wytnesse vnto people shall fulfyllynge come marci b luce cwhan ye therfore shall se abhominacio desolacio dan b whych spoken daniel prophet stande holy place readeth let hym vnderstande let whych iewry flye vnto mountaynes let hym thacke come downe fet ony thynge hys house let hym whyche felde turne backe fetch hys coate wo vnto wyth childe geue sucke dayes praye ye flyght wynter ye sabbath dani shall ther great trouble begynnynge worlde vnto thys tyme shal except dayes ben shortned al flesh shuld saued ye choses sake shal day shortened marci c luce c yf ony man shall saye vnto lo christ beleue ther shall aryse false christes false prophetes shall geue great deute tessa b token wonder much yf done chosen shulde brought erroure behold haue told befor wherfore yf shall saye vnto beholde wyldernesse go ye forth beholde innermost partes beleue lyke lyghtenynge goeth ye east shyneth tyl west shal also comynge sone man iob dwhere euer body shall also aegles gathered marc c luc c ioel bbut soone ye trouble dayes shall sonne darkened moone shall geue hyr lyght starres shall fall fro heauen power heauen shall moued shall appeare token ye sonne heaue tha shall al ye kynredes earth mourne actu b shall se sone man comynge ye cloudes heauen wyth great power maiesty tessa c shall sende angel trompe great voice shal gather hys chose fro foure wyndes fro hyghest ye heaues vntyl theyr endes marc luce lerne similitude ye fygge tre wha hys brauche tender leaues growe ye know somer nye lykewyse ye whan ye se al thynges knowe ye nye euen dores verely saye vnto generacyon shall passe tyl al done esa b heauen earth shal passe wordes shall passe daye houre actu knoweth man nother angel heauens father ye dayes noe shall comynge ye sonne man also gene b luce c dayes floude eatynge drynkynge maryenge beynge maryed vnto daye noe entred arke knewe tyll ye floude came toke al shall also comynge ye sonne luce tha shall two felde one shalbe taken shalbe lefte twayne shalbe gryndynge ye myll one shalbe take wt one shalbe left two bed one shalbe take wyth one shalbe lefte math marci luc watch ye therfor ye know houre lorde shall come knowe ye thys yf good house knewe houre apoca c thefe shulde come wold surely watch suffre hys house bored therfore ye ready also ye houre yt ye know shal sonne man come math b thynke ye faythful wyse seruaunt hys lord hath set ouer hys housholde may geue meate season apoca c blessed seruaunt wha hys lorde shall come shall fynde doynge verely saye vnto shal set ouer hys goodes yf euell seruaunt shal saye hys hart lorde maketh loge come shall begynne smyte hys fellowes eate drynke wyth dronken seruauntes lorde shall come daye hopeth houre knoweth shal dyuide hym set parte wyth ypocrites shall waylynge gnasshynge teth xxv chapter shall kyngdome heauens lyke vnto ten virgin whiche takynge theyr lampes wet forth mete brydegrome bryde fyue foolysh fyue wyse foolyshe lampes taken toke none oyle wyth wyse toke oyle theyr vessel wyth theyr lampes brydegrome makynge taryenge slombred al slept mydnyghte ther crye made beholde brydegrome co meth go waye mete hym arose virgin dressed theyr lapes foolysh sayd vnto wyse geue v oyle oure lampes go oute answered wyse sayenge lest suffise v go rather vnto sell bye youre selues whan wente bye brydegrome came readye wente wyth hym mariage dore shut last come virgin also sayenge math luce lorde lorde open vnto v answerynge sayde verely saye vnto knowe mat marci luce bwatch ye therfore ye knowe nother daye houre mar luce c lyke wyse kynge takynge hys yourney straunge contry called hys seruauntes delyuered hys goodes vnto vnto one gaue fyue talentes another two another one vnto euerye one hys owne power wente awaye strayghte waye receaued fyue talentes wente wrought thesame wanne fyue lykewise receaued two wanne two also receaued one goynge dyggeth earthe hydeth hys lordes monye longe season came lorde seruautes rekened wyth receaued fyue tale te commynge neare broughte fyue talentes sayenge syr thou delyueredest vnto fyue tale te beholde haue wonne aboue fyue taletes lord sayd vnto hym mat well thou good faythfull seruaut thou hast bene faythful ouer lytle wyll set yt ouer much entre ioye thy lorde commynge nye also receaued two talentes sayde lorde thou delyueredest vnto two tale te beholde haue wonne two hys lorde sayde vnto hym well thou good faythfull seruaunt thou hast bene faythfull ouer lytle wyl set ouer much entre ioye thy lorde commynge also receaued one talent sayde syr knowe thou art harde man thou reapest hast sowen gatherest thou hast strowed fearynge wente hyd thy talente earth lo thou hast thyne hys lorde answerynge sayde vnto hym thou euell slowthfull seruaut knewest thou reape sowe gather strowed thou oughtest therfore haue delyuered money exchaungers commynge shulde verely haue receaued myne wyth vauntage therfore take talet hym geue vnto hym yt hath ten taletes math b marc c luce b c vnto euery one hath shalbe geuen shall haue abundaunce euery one hath hym shall taken also semeth haue cast vnprofitable seruaunt veter darknesse math e luce cthere shalbe waylinge gnasshynge teth tessa b whan sonne shall come hys maiesty al angel wyth hym shall syt vpo seate hys maiesty people shalbe gathered hym ezech shall separate one fro another shepherde doth sunder shepe goates truely shall set shepe hys ryghte handes goates lefte shall kynge laye vnto shalbe hys ryght handes come ye blessed father possesse kyngdome math c prepared begynnyng ye world esay b ezech afor hongrye ye gaue eate thyrstye ye gaue drynke straunger ye toke naked ye couered eccli tim c sicke ye vysited preson ye came vnto shall ryghteous answere hym sayenge lorde sawe hongrye fed thyrstye gaue ye drynke sawe straunger toke v naked couered sawe sycke preson came vnto ye kynge answerynge shall saye vnto verely saye vnto longe ye haue done vnto one least brethre ye haue done vnto shall saye also vnto shalbe lefte handes psal b mat b luc c departe fro ye cursed esa f dam b apo c euerlastynge fyre whych prepared deuel angel hongrye ye gaue eate thyrstye ye gaue drynke straunger ye toke vnto naked ye clothed sicke preson ye vysited shall also answere hym sayenge lorde sawe hongrye thyrsty straunger naked sicke preson haue mynistred vnto shall answere sayenge prou iere c zacha b verely saye vnto longe ye haue done vnto one leest nother haue ye done vnto ioh c shal go euerlastyng payne ryghteous euerlastyng lyfe xxvi chapter came passe whan iesus finished al wordes sayde vnto disciple mar luce ioha ye knowe two dayes shalbe easter sonne man shalbe delyuered may crucifyed ioha tha assembled together ye hye prestes elder people forecourte ye hye prest called caiphas held cou sell howe myght take iesus deceate kyll hym sayde holy day lest ther shulde vproure people mar luce ioh anowe iesus bethany house symon leper ther came vnto hym woman hauynge alabaster box precyous oyntment poured vpon hys heade syttynge table disciple seynge dysdayned sayenge serueth thys losse thys myght haue solde much geuen poore iesus knowenge sayde vnto ye troublous vnto thys woman hath wrought good worke vpo deut b ye haue alwaye poore wyth shall ye haue alwayes pourynge thys oyntment vpon body dyd bury verely saye vnto euer gospell shalbe preached whole worlde shall thys also hath done tolde memory wente one twolue whyche called iudas iscariotes marc b luce ioh vnto chefe prestes sayde vnto wyll ye geue shal delyuer hym vnto offred hym thyrtye syluer pen thenceforthe sought oportunite myghte betraye hym mac b luce fyrste daye swete bread came disciple iesus sayeng wylt thou prepare eate easter lambe iesus sayde go cytie one say vnto hym master sayeth tyme honde wyl kepe easter wyth disciple disciple dyd iesus appoynted made ready easter lambe marc c luc b beyng euen sat downe table wyth twolue eatynge sayde verely say vnto ioh c one shal betray beynge exceadynge sorowfull beganne euery one saye lorde ame answerynge sayd dyppeth hond wyth dyshe shal betraye sonne man verely goeth forth wrytte hym wo vnto man ye sone shalbe betrayed good vnto hym yf man ben borne iudas betrayed hym answerynge sayde ame rabbi marc c luce b cor c eatynge iesus toke bread gaue thankes brake gaue hys disciple sayde take eate thys body takynge cuppe thanked gaue sayenge drynke ye therof thys bloude newe testamet shalbe shed many remissio synnes saye vnto wyl drynke hence forth thys frute ye vyne tyll daye shall drynke new wyth kyngdome father marc grace saydeluce c ioh wente forthe mounte oliuete sayde iesus vnto thys nyght shal ye offended wrytten zach b shal smyte shepherd ye shepe flocke shalbe scattered abrode math f marc ioh dbut shall rysen agayne actu marc ci wyll go galile peter answerynge sayde vnto hym luce c ioh though shall offended ye wyl neuer offeded iesus sayde vnto hym verely say vnto nyght cock synge thou shalt denye thryse peter sayde vnto hym though shuld dye wyth yet wil denye lykewyse also sayd disciple marc came iesus wyth village whiche called gethsemani sayde vnto hys disciple syt ye whyle go yonder praye peter taken wyth two sonnes zebede began waxe sorowfull anguyshed sayde vnto ihon c soule heuy eue vnto death tary ye watch wyth luce c beynge gone forth lytle fell vpon face prayenge sayenge father yf possible let thys cuppe passe fro neuerthelesse wyll thou came disciple founde aslepe sayde vnto peter coulde ye watch wyth one houre watch praye ye come temptacio gala c spret veryly ready flesh weake marc agayne wente seconde tyme prayed sayenge father yf cuppe passe excepe drynke thy wyll done came agayne founde aslepe theyr eye heuy lefte wente agayne prayed ye thyrde tyme wordes sayenge came hys disciple sayeth vnto slepe nowe rest beholde houre come neare sonne man shalbe delyuered hondes synners aryse let v go beholde come nye shall betraye marc c luc ioh yet spakynge lo iudas one twolue came wyth hym greate multitude wyth sweardes staues sent ye hye prestes elder people betrayed hym geuen toke sayenge euer shal kysse holde hym strayght waye commynge iesus sayd hayle master kyssed iesus sayd vnto hym frende wherfore art thou come came layed hondes vpon iesus helde hym beholde one wyth iesus stretchynge honde drwe swearde strykynge seruaunte hye prestes smote eare sayde iesus vnto hym turne thy swearde place gene ezech b apo b shall take swearde shall peryshe wyth swearde thynkest thou yt praye father shal delyuer twolue legio nombre vi thousade vi hudreth lxvilegions angel howe shulde scripture fulfylled luc thus must done mar f lu e houre sayde iesus vnto multitude ye come murtherer wt sweardes staues take sat dayly wt teachynge temple ye helde esay psal thys done scripture ye prophetes myght fulfylled mat c tha disciple hym left fled mar f holdynge iesus led hym cayphas chefe prestes ye scribe elder come together ioha b peter followed hym afarre vntyll hye prestes palace beyng gone sat wt seruauntes myght se ende marc f actu b ye hye prest coucel sought false witnesse agaynst iesus yt myght delyuer hym death foude whan many false wytnesses come last ther came two false wytnesses sayd thys hath sayd ioha c breake downe teple god buylde agayne thre dayes marc g hye preste standynge vp sayd vnto hym answerest thou nothynge vnto testifye agaynst iesus helde hys peace luce ye chefe ye prestes said vnto hym charge ye lyuyng god thou tel v yf yu christ sonne god iesus sayde vnto hym thou hast sayd neuerthelesse saye vnto ioh g act b g thys tyme forth shall ye se sonne man syttynge ryghte hande power god commynge cloudes heauen marc g luce e tha hye prest rent hys clothes sayenge hath blasphemed nede yet wytnesses lo ye herd blasphemye thynke ye answerynge sayd leui c gyltye death esa b ioh c spytted face smote wt buffettes gaue hym stroke vpo ye face wyth theyr palmes sayeng prophecye vnto v thou christ yt smote marc g luce ioh b peter sat pallace ther came vnto hym damsell sayenge thou wast wt iesus galile denyed al sayenge wote yu sayest goynge ye dore another damsel sawe hym sayd vnto yt thys also wyth iesus nazareth denyed agayne wt oth yt knowe ye lytle whyle stode came sayde vnto peter truly thou arte one also thy speche maketh manyfest began curse sweare knowen immediatlye cocke crew peter remebred ye worde iesu sayd math c ye cock crow thou shalt denye thryse beynge gone forth wept bytterly xxvii chapter bvt psa marci luc ioh mornynge beyng come chefe prestes elder people helde cousel agaynst iesus myght delyuer ouer death brought actu b delyuered hym boude vnto pontius pilate debite iudas whych betrayed hym seynge condemned repentynge brought agayne thyrty syluer pen vnto ye chefe prestes elder sayeng haue synned betrayenge ryghteous bloude sayd vnto v loke thou therto syluer pen cast teple auoyded goyng reg actu c haged hymself wt snare hygh prestes syluer pen take sayd lawfull put corbona chest wherin thinges halowed offered vp vp vnto god put corbona price bloude cou sell holden bought wyth potter felde burial strau gers cause feld called acheldemach bloude felde vntyl thys daye fulfylled spoken ieremy prophet sayenge iere zacha c toke thyrty syluer pen ye price hym valued bought chyldren israel gaue potter felde ye lord appoynted marci luce ioh iesus stode debite debite axed hym sayenge art thou kynge iewes iesus sayeth vnto hym thou sayest whan accused hygh prestes elder answered nothynge sayeth pilate vnto hym hearest thou many wytnesses saye agaynst esay b answered hym neuer worde ye debite maruayled greatly math luce b ioh c ye solemne feast daye debite vsed let louse one presoner vnto ye people wolde yt tyme notable prisoner called barrabas therfore beynge gathered pilate sayd wyl ye shal let louse vnto barrabas iesus called christ knewe yt betrayed hym thorow enuye whyle sat iudgemet seate hys wyfe sent vnto hym sayenge nothynge ryghteous man haue suffered many thynges daye vision hym marci ye hygh prestes elder persuaded ye people desyre barrabas iesu shulde destroye luce b debite answerynge sayd vnto whether twayne wyll ye haue lowsed vnto actu b sayd barrabas marci bpilate sayd vnto shal tha wt iesu called christ sayd al let hym crucifyed debite sayde vnto euel hath done cryed sayeng let hym crucifyed pilate seynge profyted yt ther vproure water taken wasshed hys ha de people sayenge vngylty bloude thys ryghteous loke ye people answerynge sayd actu hys bloude vpo v vpon chyldren marc b luc c ioh tha let lowse vnto barrabas iesus beynge scourged toke vnto crucifyed marc b ioh debites souldiers takynge iesus comune hal gathered vnto hym al ye company strypynge hym hys clothes put purple robe hym platynge crowne thornes set vpon hys heade rede hys ryghte hande knye bowed afore hym mocked hym sayenge hayle kynge iewes spyttyng vpo hym toke rede stroke head mocked hym stryped hym robe put hys clothes led hym crucified mar c luce cbut goynge forth foude cyrene name simo copelled shuld bear hys crosse cam place called golgotha ye place dead messkulles gaue wyne drynke myxte wyth gall taisted wold drynke marc ioh c crucifyed hym parted hys garmentes castynge lotte yt myght fulfylled yt spoken prophet sayenge psal b parted garmentes vnto cast lot vpon garmet syttynge kept hym luce ioh b set vp ouer hys head hys cause wrytten thys iesus kynge iewes esay b ther crucifyed wyth hym two murtherers one ye ryght hade one left marc c luc yt wente blasphemed hym waggynge theyr heades sayeng fy yt destroyest ye teple god buyldest agayn thre dayes saue thy selfe yf thou art ye sone god come downe fro ye crosse lykewyse also hygh prestes wt scribe elder mockynge sayde hath saued hymself saue sapi yf ye kynge israel let hym come downe fro crosse beleue hym psal trusteth god let delyuer hym yf wyl said ye sone god also dyd vpbrayde hym yt murtherers yt crucified wyth hym marc luc dfro syxte houre ther darkenesse vpon ye whole earth vntyl ye nyenth houre aboute ye nyenth houre dyd iesus crye wyth loude voyce sayenge heli heli lammazabachthani yt god god wherto hast thou forsaken standynge hearynge sayd thys man calleth helias ioh cand immediatly one runnynge sponge taken fylled wyth vynegre put vpo rede gaue hym drynke sayde let alone let v se whether helias shal come deleuerynge hym iesus cryeng agayn wyth loude voyce gaue vp ye goost behold ye vayle ye teple rente two partes fro aboue tyl beneth earth quaked stone ryuen ye graues opened many bodyes sayntes whych slepte rose vp goynge graues hys resurreccion came ye holy cytie appeared vnto many marci luce ebut ceturio yt wyth kepynge iesus seynge earthquake thynges done wer greatly afrayed sayenge verely thys sonne god marci e ther many woman afarre whych followed iesus galile ministrynge vnto hym amonge whych mary magdalene mary mother iames ioseph ye mother zebedees chyldren marci c luce e ioh whan become eue ther cam rych man arimathia name ioseph whych also disciple iesu came pilate requyred body iesu commaunded pilate body geuen body taken ioseph dyd wrappe clene lynne cloth layed hys new graue whych hewen rocke rolled great stone dore graue wente awaye marci ther mary magdalene mary sittynge ouer agaynst sepulchre nexte daye whych daye preparynge dyd resorte together vnto pilate chefe prestes pharises sayenge syr haue called remembraunce yt decauer yet lyuynge sayd math c marci luce dafter thre dayes shal ryse agayn comaunde therfore graue kepte vntyll thyrde daye lest per aduenture hys disciple come steale hym say vnto people rysen dead last erroure shalbe worse fyrst pilate sayd vnto ye haue watch go kepe ye goynge awaye made graue sure sealynge stone wyth watch men xxviii chapter vpon euenynge sabbatmarc luc ioh whych dawneth fyrste sabbat holy daye came mary magdalene mary se sepulchre beholde ther made great earthquake ye angell lorde descended fro heauen commyng neare rolled awaye stone sat theron hys countenaunce lyghtenynge hys clothyng lyke snowe watchman amased feare hym become dead marc luce angell answerynge sayd vnto wemen ye afrayed knowe ye seke iesus whych crucifyed rysen said come ye se place lorde layed goynge quyckly saye vnto hys disciple rysen beholde shal go afore galile ye shal se hym lo haue tolde marc b luce wente soone oute graue wyth fear great ioye runnynge shewe vnto hys disciple beholde iesus met sayenge hayle came neare helde hys fete worshipped hym sayd iesus vnto feare go shewe brother go galile actu bthere shall se whyche whan gone beholde watchman came cytie shewed chefe prestes thynges done beynge gathered wyth elder counsell taken gaue large money vnto souldyers sayenge say ye yt hys disciple came nyght slepyng haue stolen hym yf herde debite shal persuade hym make safe mony taken dyd taught ye worde noised iewes vntyll thys daye eleuen disciple wente galile moutayne iesus appoynted seynge hym worshipped douted iesus commynge neare spake vnto sayenge math ioha philip power geuen heauen earth mar b goyng therfore teache al nacios baptysynge name father sonne ye holy goost teachynge kepe al thynges soeuer haue comauded ioh b lo ame euery daye vnto worldes ende pthe ende gospell mathewe pthe holy gospell iesv christe marke fyrste chapter begynnynge ye gospel iesus christ sonne god wrytte esaye prophet mala b math b luce c beholde sende myne angell thy face whiche shall prepare thy waye esa math luce ioh b voyce cryer wyldernesse make ready waye lorde make pathes strayght ioh iho wyldernesse baptysynge preachynge baptyme penaunce remission synnes londe iewry wente forth vnto hym ierusale baptysed hym ye floude iordane confessynge theyr synnes mat iho clothed wt heeres camel lethre gyrdle aboute hys loynes dyd eate wyld hony locustes preached sayeng math b luce c ioha c ther commeth one stronger whose lachet hys shues stoupynge ame worthy lowse haue baptysed water shall baptyse ye holy goost math b luce c ioha dand happened dayes iesus came nazareth galile baptised iho iordan anone comynge vp water sawe heaues opened holy goost lyke doue descendynge abydynge vpon hym ther voyce made fro heaues thou art beloued sonne ame pleased math luce immediatly sprete droue hym ye desert deserte forty dayes forty nyghtes tempted satan deserte wt beastes angel dyd seruyce vnto hym math b luc b iho mat btaken iesus came galile preachynge gospell kyngdome god sayeng tyme fulfylled kyngdome god come neare repente beleue ye gospell math c luce goynge see galile sawe simon andrew hys brother castynge nettes ye see fyshers iesus sayde vnto follow wyll make become iere c ezec b fyshers men forthwyth theyr nettes lefte followed hym beyng gone lytle thence sawe iames sonne zebede ihon hys brother mendynge theyr nettes shyppe anone called theyr father zebede lefte shyppe hyred seruauntes followed hym math b luce ioh b go capernau anone sabbat dayes beynge entred synagoge taught math c astonnyed vpon hys doctrine teachyng hauyng power scribe luce ther theyre synagoge man hauynge vncleane sprete cryed oute sayenge vnto v iesu nazareth arte thou come destroye v knowe thou arte holy one god iesus threatened hym sayeng holde thy peace go vncleane sprete tearynge hym cryeng loude voyce wete hym men maruayled demaunded amonge selues sayeng thyng newe doctrine thys power commaundeth ye foule spretes obey hym hys feare wente forth anone al region galile math b luce forthwyth goyng synagoge came house simon andrew wyth iames iho simon mother law laye sycke feuers anone telle hym commyng near hyr hande taken lyfte vp feuer lefte immediatly ministred vnto math b luce eue beynge come whan sonne set broughte vnto hym syck possessed wyth deuels cytie gathered dore healed many diseased diuerse sycknesses cast many deuels suffered speake knew hym dawnynge early rysynge vp wente deserte place prayed simo hym followed hym whan foude hym sayde vnto euery man seketh sayde vnto let v go nexte townes cyties maye preach also therfore ame come preachynge theyr synagoges galile castynge deuels math luce b ther came vnto hym leper besekynge hym knye bowed sayeth yf thou wylt thou canst clense iesus pytyenge hym put forthe hys hande touchynge hym sayde vnto hym wyll thou cleane wha sayd anone dyd leprosy go awaye hym clensed mar charged hym anone sente hym forth sayde vnto hym se thou tell vnto noma leuit go shewe vnto chefe prestes offer thy clensyng moses hath commaunded wytnesse vnto beynge departed beganne publysh sprede forth worde somuch coulde go openlye cytie wythoute deserte place came vnto hym euerye waye ii chapter certayne dayes entred agayne capernaummath luc c ioh herd house immediatlye ther came many together insomuch coulde coteyned nother dore spake word vnto ther came vnto hym bryngyng one sycke palsy whych boren foure men whan could brynge thesame vnto hym ye people vncouered thacke openynge let downe bed wherin sycke palsye laye whan iesus sawe theyr fayth sayde vnto sycke palsye sonne thy synnes forgeuen scribe syttynge thynkynge theyr harte speaketh thys thus blasphemeth esay dwho forgeue synnes saue god iesus knowyng anone hys sprete yt thought wythin themselues sayde vnto thynke ye youre harte easyer saye vnto sycke palsye thy synnes forgeue say ryse take vp thy bed walke ye may knowe yt sone hath power earth forgeue synnes sayde vnto sycke ye palsy say vnto yt ryse take vp thy bed go thy house actu immediatly rose bed taken vp wente thence insomuch euery man maruayled dyd honour god sayenge neuer saw suche lyke math luce wete forth agayn vnto see people came vnto hym taught whan wente sawe leui sonne alpheus syttynge receate custome sayde vnto hym followe rysynge followed hym befell whan dyd syt meate hys house many publican synners sat also meate iesu disciple ther many also followed hym scribe pharises seynge hy dyd eate wyth ye publicanes synners sayde vnto hys disciple wherfore doth youre mayster eate drynke wyth publicanes synners iesus hearynge sayde vnto whole haue nede phisician syck timo cfor ame come cal ye ryghteous synners mat b luce e disciple ihon pharises fastynge come say vnto hym disciple ihon pharises faste thy disciple fast iesus sayde vnto chylderen weddynge faste longe ye brydegrome longe haue brydegrome wyth fast ye dayes shall come wha brydegrome shal taken shal faste dayes noman soweth newe pece cloth vnto olde garmente orels taketh away newe pece olde greater rente made noma putteth newe wyne old bottels orels shal wyne burste bottels wyne shalbe spylt ye bottels shal perysh newe wyne muste put newe bottels math luc befell agayne whan wente vpon sabbates thorow ye corne feldes disciple beganne go forth plucke ear corne ye pharises sayde vnto hym lo thy disciple vpon ye sabbat dayes lawful sayd vnto dyd ye neuer reade dauid dyd whan nede hongry wyth hym reg b entred house god vnder abiathar ye chefe prestes dyd eate ye shewbreades lawful noma eate saue ye prestes gaue also vnto wyth hym sayde vnto sabbat made man man sabbat therfore sonne man lorde also sabbat iii chapter entred agayne synagogemath b luce man hauynge wythered hande watched hym whether dyd heale vpo sabbat myght accuse hym sayde vnto man yt wythered hande ryse vp myddest sayde vnto lawfull good sabbates euell saue soule lose helde theyr peace lokynge aboute vpon wyth anger sory blyndnesse theyr harte sayde vnto man stretch forth thy hande stretched reg b hys hand restored math b ioh pharises goyng forth dyd immediatly holde counsell wyth herodes officer agaynst hym myght destroy hym iesus wente asyde see wyth hys disciple math c luce b ther followed hym muche people galile ierusalem idumea byonde iordane tyre sidon great multitude came vnto hym hearynge thynges dyd sayd vnto hys disciple yt shulde wayte vpon hym wyth lytle shyppe people lest shulde thronge hym healed many somuche preassed vpon hym touch hym many plage luce c whan vncleane spretes sawe hym fel downe hym cryed sayenge thou arte sonne god charged straytely shulde make hym manifeste math luce b acru b goynge vp mountayne called vnto whome wolde came vnto hym made yt ther shulde twolue hym shulde sende preach gaue power heale sycknesses cast deuels gaue vnto simon name peter iames sonne zebede ihon brother iames gaue name boanarges saye chyldre thonder andrew philippe bartholomew matthew thomas iames sonne alpheus thaddeus simon cana iudas iscarioth ye whych also betrayed hym came vnto house people came agayne together much yt coulde eate breade whan hys herde wet forth holde sayd become mad scribe whych come downe fro ierusalem sayde math c luce b hath beelzebub chefe ye deuels casteth deuels beynge called together sayd vnto parable sata dryue satan yf kyngdome shalbe diuided wythin selfe kyngdome stande yf house diuided vpo selfe ye house stande yf satan shall ryse agaynst hymselfe variauce stande hath ende noman beynge gone house stronge man take awaye hys vessel wythout fyrst shall bynde stronge man shall spoyle hys house verely saye vnto synnes shal forgeuen vnto chyldre blasphemy wherwyth shall blaspheme math c luce ioh c blasphemeth agaynst holy goost shal neuer haue forgeuenes shalbe gyltye eternall synne sayd hath vncleane sprete math c luce c hys mother hys brother come standynge wythout sente vnto hym callynge hym people sat aboute hym say vnto hym beholde thy mother thy bretheren beynge wyth seke answeryng sayde mother brother lokynge aboute vpon yt sat hym sayd behold mother brother euer doth ye wil god brother syster mother iiii chapter math luce began agayne teach see ther gathered much people vnto hym insomuche goynge vp ship sat vppon ye see ye people ye see vpon ye land taught many thynges parable sayd vnto hys doctrine herken beholde one sowyng went sowe whan soweth fell ye waye syde fowles ye heauen came dyd eate fel vpo stony groundes hadde much earth dyd soone sprynge vp depenesse earth wha sone ryse vp caught heate roote wythered fel among thornes thornes grewe vp choked yelded frute fell good grounde gaue frute comynge vp growynge broughte forth one thyrty folde one syxty folde one hundreth folde said hath eares heare let hym heare math b luce b whan alone twelfe wyth axed hym parable sayd vnto vnto geue know mystery kyngdom god vnto wythout thynges happen parable esay b ioh acru rom b seynge may se perceaue hearynge maye heare vnderstande lest ony tyme turne theyr synnes forgeuen sayd vnto knowe ye thys parable wyll ye knowe parable math che soweth soweth worde sowen waye syde whan worde sowen whan heare anone commeth satan taketh awaye worde sowen theyr harte also yt sowen stony groude whan heare worde anone receaue wyth ioye haue roote themselues temporall whan trouble persecucion wordes sak rysen forthwyth offended ther whych sowe amonge thornes heare worde trauaylles thys world deceate ryches lustes aboute thynges comyng choke ye worde made frutelesse sowen vpon good groude whych heare receaue ye worde brynge forth frute one thyrty fold another sixty fold hudreth folde sayd vnto math luce c cometh candell lyght may put vnder bushell vnder bedde yt maye set vpon cadelsticke math luce b ther nothynge hyd yt shall openlye shewed nother ony thyng made preuy yt shall come abrode hath eares heare let hym heare said vnto beware ye heare math luce measure ye shall meete shalbe measured vnto shalbe geuen ouer math b c luce b cfor hath vnto hym shalbe geuen hath also yt hath shalbe take fro hym sayd ye kyngdom god yf man cast sede grounde slepe ryse vp nyght day math sede sprynge vp growe wha knoweth ye earth bryngeth forth frute herselfe fyrst grasse afterward ye eare tha ful corne eare wha hath brought forth frut anone putteth syckle haruest come sayd wherevnto shall lyken kyngdome god lykenesse shall compare math luce c lyke graue mustarde sede whyche whan sowen earth lesse sedes yt earth wha sowe groweth vp waxeth greater herbes getteth greate braunches vnder shadow byrdes ayre maye dwell math aand many parable spake worde vnto coulde heare wythout parable spake nothyng vnto expounded thynges vnto hys disciple seuerally math c luce c sayd vnto ye daye wha become eue let v passe ouer v lettynge people go toke hym yt ship ther shippes wyth hym ther arose great storme wynde dashed waues shippe yt shippe fylled sterne shippe slypynge vpo pelowe wake hym say vnto hym master doth pertayne vnto ye perysh rysynge vp rebuked wynde sayd vnto ye see peace styll wynde ceassed ther made great calme sayd vnto ye fear full haue ye yet fayth dismade wyth great feare sayd ech trowe ye thys ye wynde see obey v chapter cam ouer ye arme seemath luce c contry gerasenites goynge ship dyd immediatly mete graues man vnclene sprete whyche dwellynge graues man coulde bynde hym nother wyth cheynes ofte boude wyth fetter cheynes pluckte cheynes asunder brake fetter peces man coulde tame hym alwaye nyghte daye graues mountaynes cryenge beatynge hymselfe wyth stone seynge iesus afarre ranne worshipped hym crynge loude voyce sayd actu c vnto iesu thou sonne moost hyghest god charge ye god thou tormet dyd saye vnto hym thou foule sprete go thys man axed hym thy name sayde vnto hym myne name legion many prayed hym greatlye wolde dryue hym oute contrye ther mou tayne greate heerde swynemath luce c fedynge ye feldes spretes sought hym sayenge sende v swyne may go iesus dyd forthwyth graut vncleane spretes goynge wente swyne wyth great rush heerd cast head lynges see aboute two thousande drowned see fed fled tolde cytie contry wente se happened came iesus sawe hym vexed wyth deuell syttynge clothed whole mynded afrayed sene tolde befallen vnto hym yt deuell swyne began praye hym wold depart theyr coastes wha wente vp ye shippe ben vexed wyth ye deuell beganne praye myght wyth hym wolde suffre hym sayd vnto hym go thy house vnto thyne shewe great thynges lord hath done vnto hath mercye vpon departed begane publysh ye ten cyties great thynges iesus done vnto hym men maruayled math c luce e wha iesus wente ouer arme see agayn ye ship much people ca together vnto ye see ther came one ye chefe synagoge name iairus seynge fell downe hys fete besought hym greatly sayenge doughter departynge come laye thy hande vpon yt may safe lyue went wyth hym much people followed hym thronged hym woman whych bene bloudy yssue twelfe yeares suffred much many phisicias spente al profyted nothynge rather worse case whan herde iesus came behynde amonge people touched hys garment sayd yf may touch hys garment shalbe safe immediatly fou tayne hyr bloude dryed vp felt hyr body healed ye plage forthwt iesus knowyng hymself ye power yt gone fro beyng turned ye people sayd touched clothes hys disciple sayde vnto hym thou seyst ye people throgyng ye thou sayest touched loked se yt done woma knowyng done came fearynge quakyng fel downe hym tolde hym truth sayd vnto doughter luce thy fayth hath made safe go thy way peace whole thy plage math luce f whyle yet spake ther came messaugers fro chefe ye synagoge sayenge thy doughter dead troublest yu master ony iesus worde yt spoke beyng herd sayd vnto ye chefe ye synagoge afrayed beleue suffred noma follow hym saue peter iames ihon ye brother iames come chefe ye synagoges house sawe busynes wept wayled greatly gone sayd vnto ye troubled wepe damsell dead ioh b slepeth laughed hym scorne reg al cast taketh ye father mother damsell go damsell layenge holdynge hande damsell sayd vnto thalita cumi whych interpreted da sell saye vnto aryse ioha c accu f immediatly damsel arose walked twelfe yeare age astonyed wyth great wo derynge charged greatly noman shulde knowe commauded geue eate vi chapter beynge departed thence wente co trymath g luce b hys disciple followed hym sabbat beynge come beganne teache synagoge many hearyng maruayled hys learnyng sayeng whence hath thynges wysedome thys geuen hym power wrought hys handes thys carpenter sonne mary brother iames ioseph iude simon also hys systers wyth v offended hym iesus sayde vnto math g luce c ioh e prophete wythout honoure saue hys contry hys house hys kynred coulde miracle saue healed sycke ye handes layed vpon maruayled theyr vnbelefe math luce b wente aboute teachynge ye townes rounde aboute math luce called twolue begane sende two two gaue power ouer ye vncleane spretes comaunded shulde take nothynge waye saue rodde scryppe breade nother money ye gyrdle shulde shod wyth sandales shulde clothed wyth two coates sayd vnto euer ye shall entre house abyde vntyll ye go thence math b luce euer wyl receaue heare goyng fro thence shake dust fro fete wytnesse vnto math goynge forth preached shuld penauce cast many deuels iacob c anoynted many syck wt oyle healed math luc kynge herode herde name made manifest sayd iho baptiste rysen agayn fro ye deade therfore miracle wrought hym sayd elia sayd prophet one ye prophetes whan herode herde sayd iho whome beheaded thesame rysen fro dead thesame herode sent forth held iho bounde preson herodias wyfe hys brother philippe maryed iho sayd vnto herode leuit b lawfull yt haue thy brother wyfe herodias layed wayte hym wolde slaye hym could neuerthelesse herode feared ihon knowynge hym iuste holy kepte el herd dyd many thynges herde hym gladly math whan conuenient daye come herode made gene c hys byrth dayes supper vnto hys prynces captaynes chefe galile wha doughter herodias come daunsed pleased herode also sat borde wyth hym kynge sayde vnto ye damsel axe thou wylt shall geue sware vnto whatsoeuer thou shalt axe shall geue yt though halfe kyngdome whiche whan gone forth sayde vnto hyr mother shall axe sayde heade ihon baptiste whan haystely come vnto kynge demaunded sayenge wyl yt thou geue strayght waye platter heade ihon baptiste kynge sory oth sat borde wyth hym wolde make sory hangeman sent commaunded brynge iho baptistes heade platter beheaded hym person brought hys heade platter gaue vnto damsell damsell gaue vnto hyr mother whyche beynge herde hys disciple came toke hys body layde graue math b luce b apostle commynge together iesus tolde hym thynges done taught sayd vnto come asyde deserte place rest whyle ther many came went space eate goyng vp shyppe wente asyde deserte place many sawe goynge knewe ranne thyther foote cyties preuented math iesus goynge sawe great multitude pytie vpon ezec shepe hauynge shepeherde beganne teach many thynges nowe whan waxed late hys disciple came hym sayenge thys deserte place houre gone math b let departe goynge nexte village townes maye bye meates eate answerynge sayde vnto geue ye eate sayde vnto hym wyll go bye two hundreth pen breades shall geue eate sayde vnto marci ahowe many loues breade haue ye go se whan knowen saye fyue two fyshes commaunded shulde cause al syt downe companyes vpon grene gras sat downe particios hundrethes fyftyes ye fyue loaues taken fyshes lokyng vp heauen blessed brake loaues gaue vnto hys disciple set two fyshes parted vnto al dyd eate satisfyed toke vp ye leauynges twolue basket full broken peces fyshes dyd eate fyue thousande men math c ioh b anone caused hys disciple go vp shyppe shuld go ouer arme see bethsaida whyle sent awaye people whan sente away wente mountayne praye whan late shyppe middes see alone vpon lande seynge labourynge rowynge wynde agaynst aboute fourth watch ye night came walkynge vpon see wolde haue gone whan sawe hym walkynge vpon ye see thought ben sprete cryed saw hym afrayed forthwyth spake wyth sayd vnto good cheare ame feare mat wente vp vnto shyppe wynde ceassed greatly astonnyed wythin themselues remembred marci b loaues theyr harte blynded whan shypped ouer came lande genezareth came neare ye shore whan come ye shyp immediatly knew hym runnynge thorowe region beganne euery syde brynge beddes sycke herde hym euer entred townes village cyties layed sycke vpon stretes prayed hym myght touch ye heme hys garment many touched made whole vii chapter ther come together vnto hym pharises certayne scribe comyng ierusalem whan sene disciple eate breade commune wasshen handes blaymed pharises iewes eate wythout ofte washe theyr handes kepyng tradicions elder whan come fro market eate wythout wash themselues many thynges ther geuen obserue washynge cuppes crus brasen vessel table pharises scribe axed walke thy disciple ye tradicions elder eate breade wyth commune handes answerynge sayde vnto wel hath esaye prophecyed hypocrite wrytten esay thys people honoureth theyr lyppes theyr harte farre fro vayne serue teachyng doctrine comaundementes men leauynge commaundement god ye kepe tradicions washyng crus cuppes many lyke thynges ye sayde vnto fulwell haue ye made commaundement god none effect ye shulde kepe youre tradicio moses sayde exodi b deu e honoure thy father thy mother exo b curseth father mother let hi dye death ye saye man shall saye vnto father mother corban whatsoeuer gyfte commeth fro shall profite ye ye suffre hym nomore vnto father mother makynge worde god none effecte youre tradicion ye haue ordyned many lyke thynges ye math b callynge people hym sayde vnto herken vnto ye al vnderstande ther nothyng man defyle hym entrynge hym go defyle yf ony man haue eares heare let heare whan entred house people hys disciple axed hym parable sayde vnto ye also vnwyse ye vnderstande thynge entrynge man fro wythout defyle hym entreth hys harte goeth belly voyded draught purgynge meates sayde thynges go man defyle man wythin harte men come forth euell thoughtes adulteryes fornication manslaughter theftes couetousnesses wyckednesses deceates vnclenesses wycked eye blasphemy pryde foolyshnesse euels come forth fro wythin defyle man math cand rysynge thence went border tyre sidon beynge entred house wolde noman knowe could hyd woman whose doughter vncleane sprete anone herde hym came fell downe hys fete gentile kynred syrophenissa besought hym wold caste deuell hyr doughter sayde vnto let chyldren fyrst satisfyed good take chyldres breade caste vnto dogges answered sayde vnto hym yee lorde whelpes also eate crommes fall chylderens table sayde vnto thys sayenge go thy waye deuell gone thy doughter whan came home fande damsel lyenge vpon ye bed deuell gone math luce b goynge forth agayne border tyre came sidon see galile betwene mydde endes ten cyties brynge vnto hym one deaf domme besought hym wolde laye hys hande vpo hym takynge hym asyde people put hys fyngers hys eares spyttynge touched tunge lokynge vp heauen syghed sayd vnto hym ephata yt opened forthwyth hys eares opened stryng tunge lowsed spake aryght marci comaunded shuld tell vnto noman forbad somuch dyd publysh maruayled much ye sayeng gene eccli c hath done al thynges well hath made ye deaffe heare domme speake viii chapter dayes math whan agayne ther much people nother ony thing eate disciple called together sayd vnto haue pytie vpo ye people lo forbeare thre dayes haue noughte eate yf shall let go fastynge home theyr house shall faynte way tobi b esa came farre hys disciple answered hym whence shall ony satisfye wyth breades wyldernesse axed marci e many loaues haue ye sayde seuen commaunded people syt downe vpon grounde takynge seuen loaues gaue thankes brake gaue vnto hys disciple set set people lytle fyshes also blessed commaunded set afore dyd eate satisfyed toke vp lefte broken meate seuen baskettes dyd eate ther aboute foure thousande let go strayghtwaye goynge vp shyppe wyth hys disciple came partyes dalmanutha math ioh pharises wente oute beganne dispute wyth hym requyrynge hym token heauen temptynge hym syghynge sprete sayde math luce cwhat doth thys generacion seke token verely saye vnto ther shall token geue vnto thys generacion leauynge goynge vp agayne shippe went ouer arme see math luce forgat take breades one loafe ye shippe commaunded sayeng take hede beware leuen pharises leue herode thought sayeng ech haue breades whych whan iesus knewe sayd vnto take ye thought ye haue taken breades ye yet knowe vnderstande haue ye harte yet blynded hauynge eye se ye hauynge eares heare ye remembre ye nother marci ioh wha brake fyue loaues among foure thousande many baskettes full broken meate toke ye vp sayde vnto hym twelfe math marci whan seuen amonge foure thousande many baskettes broken meates toke ye vp sayd seuen sayd vnto howe ye yet vnderstande come bethsaida brynge vnto hym blynde man prayed hym wolde touch hym hade ye blynde take led towne spytting eye hys handes beynge layde theron axed hym whether sawe ought lokynge vp sayd se men tree walkyng afterward layed hys hades agayne vpo hys eye began se restored sawe thynges clearly sent hym hys house sayenge go thy house yf thou comest ye town tell vnto noman math b luc iesus hys disciple gone townes cesaria philippi way axed disciple sayeng vnto whome men saye whych answered hym sayeng ihon baptiste elia one prophetes tha sayeth vnto saye ye peter answerynge sayd vnto hym io thou arte christ charged shuld tell man hym math c b began teach sonne must suffre many thynges reproued elder ye hyghe prestes scribe put death ryse thre dayes spake worde openly peter takynge hym began rebuke hym beynge turned aboute lokynge vpon hys disciple reproued peter sayenge go satanas thou sauourest ye thynges yt god men math luce c people beynge called together wt hys disciple sayd vnto wyll followe let hym denye hymselfe take vp hys crosse followe luc ioha c wyll saue hys lyfe shall lose wyl lose hys lyfe gospel sake shall saue shall auayle man yf wanne whole worlde yet suffre harme hys soule exchaunge shall man geue hys soule math luc c ashamed wordes thys aduouterous synfull generacion sone shall also ashamed hym wha shal come glory hys father holy angel ix chapter sayd vnto math luce c verely say vnto ther yt stande whyche shall se death vntyll se kyngdome god commynge power math luce dand syxe dayes toke iesus peter iames iho leadeth hygh mountayne asyde alone transfigured hys clothes made shynynge whyte snowe fuller vpon earth make whyte ther appeared vnto elia wyth moses speakynge wt iesu peter answeryng sayd vnto iesus mayster good v let v make thre tabernacle one one moses one elia knew sayd amased great feare ther ca cloude ouershadowynge voyce cloude sayenge math b marc c luce c thys moost beloued sonne deu cheare hym sodenly lokyng sawe man saue iesus wyth math b descendynge mounte marc commaunded shulde tell man sene saue whan sonne man shalbe rysen dead kepte sayenge selues axynge ech wha shalbe ryse agayne fro ye dead axed sayeng tha ye scribe pharises say malach elia must fyrst come answerynge sayd vnto elia whan shall come shall fyrste restore al thynges psa esay written sonne man may suffre much maye despysed saye vnto elia also come haue done vnto hym al yt wolde wrytten hym math b luce comyng hys disciple sawe great people scrybes disputynge wt anone al ye people seyng iesus astonnyed amased commyng hym saluted hym axed dispute ye among selues one people answerynge sayd mayster haue brought sonne hauynge dome sprete vnto whyche whan euer taketh hym teareth hym fometh gnasheth wyth teth pyneth awaye haue sayde vnto thy disciple shulde cast hym could answerynge sayd faythles generacyo loge shall wt loge shal suffre bring brought hym wha sene hi anone ye sprete troubled hym beynge fallen vpon grounde weltered fomynge axed hys father loge sence thys hapned vnto hi sayd fro hys youth tymes dyd cast hym water fyre yt shuld destroye yf yu cast hauynge mercy vpo v helpe v iesus sayd vnto hym yf yu canst beleue luce c c thynges possible vnto beleuynge father chylde continentlye cryenge wyth teares sayde lorde beleue helpe myne vnbelefe whan iesus sawe people runnynge together rebuked foule sprete sayenge vnto hym thou deafe domme sprete commaunde departe hym entre nomore hym cryenge tearynge hym greatly wente hym became dead insomuch many dyd saye dead iesus holdynge hys hande lyfte hym vp rose math c whan come house hys disciple axed hym secretly wherfore coulde cast hym sayde vnto kynde go nothynge prayer fastynge math marci luce c beynge gone thence wente galile nother wolde haue ony man knowe taughte hys disciple sayde vnto sonne man shalbe delyuered handes men shall put hym death put death shall ryse agayne thyrde daye vnderstode worde afrayed axe hym math aand came capernaum whych whan home axed dyd ye treate way helde theyr peace marci disputed ye way amoge theselues whych ye greatest syttyng downe called ye twelfe sayde vnto math yt wyll fyrst shalbe last seruaunte takynge chylde set hym myddest whome whan taken hys armes sayde vnto luce e b ioh c whosoeuer receaueth one child name receaueth receaueth receaueth sent ihon answered hym sayenge master sawe one castyng deuels thy name whyche doth followe v forbad hym iesus sayde forbydde hym cor ther noman worketh myracle name soone speake euell agaynste wyth math e geueth drynke one cup water name ye belonge vnto christ verely saye vnto shall lose hys rewarde math luce offe deth one lytle one beleue rather better hym yf mylstone hanged aboute hys necke cast ye see math yf thy hande offende cut better vnto go lame lyfe hauynge two handes go hell vnquecheable fyre theyr worme dyeth theyr fyre que ched yf thy foote offende cut hym better entre lyfe euerlastynge crepell hauyng two fete cast hell vnquencheable fyre esay ezech fwhere theyr worme dyeth theyr fyre quenched yf thyne eye offede cast hym better entre kyngdome god hauynge one eye hauynge two eye cast fyre hell theyr worme dyeth theyr fyre quenched euery man shalbe salted wyth fyre leuit euery offerynge shalbe seasoned wyth salte math b luce salt good yf salt shalbe vnsauerye shal ye season haue salt haue peace among selues x chapter rysynge thece came ye border iewry beyonde iordane people come agayn vnto hym wote taught agayn ye pharises coming vnto hym axed yf lauful man put away wyfe temptynge answeryng said vnto dyd moses byd sayd deute mala c math moses suffred wryte byll deuorcemet put awaye iesus answering sayd hardnesse hart dyd wryt comaudemet ye begynnynge ye creature dyd god make man woman gene thys cause shall man leaue hys father mother shal cleue vnto hys wyf shalbe two one fleshe therfore two one flesh god therfor hath ioyned together let separate house hys disciple axed hym agayne sayd vnto math b luce c putteth awaye hys wyfe maryeth another commytteth aduoutry aboue yf wyfe forsake hyr husbande maryeth another comytteth aduoutry math b luce b brought vnto hym lytle chyldre shulde touch disciple reproued bryngers whan iesus saw displeased sayd vnto let chyldre come vnto forbyd vnto suche lyke pertayneth kyngdome god verely say vnto receaueth ye kingdome god chyld shal entre therin takynge armes
