wolde go wherfore hys father beynge gone beganne intreate hym answerynge sayd vnto hys father lo thus many yeares serue neuer dyd trasgresse thy commaundemente thou neuer gauest kyd myghte mery wyth frendes thys thy sonne hath deuoured hys substaunce wyth harlottes come thou hast slayne hym fed calfe sayd vnto hym sonne thou arte alwaye wyth myne thyne thou oughtest haue ben mery reioyced thys thy brother dead reuiued loste founde xvi chapter sayd vnto hys disciple ther certayn rych man whych stewarde accused vnto hym waysted hys goodes called hym sayde vnto hym howe heare geue accompte thy stewardshippe thou mayest nomore stewarde stewarde sayde wythin hymselfe shall lorde taketh stewardship fro dygge begge ashamed know shall whan shalbe put stewardship may take theyr house euery one therfore hys lordes detters beynge called together sayd vnto ye fyrst howe muche owest thou vnto lorde sayd hundreth ne oyle sayd vnto hym take thy byll syt downe quyckely wryte fyftye sayde vnto another muche owest thou whych sayd hundreth quarter wheate sayd vnto hym take thy byl wryte fourescore lorde commended vnryghteous stewarde done wysely chyldre thys worlde wyser chyldren lyght theyr generacion saye vnto make frendes wyth mammon vnryghteousnesse whan ye shall haue nede may receaue euerlastynge tabernacle faythful leest also faythful greater vnryghteous lytle also vnryghteous greater yf ye therfore haue ben faythful vnryghteous mammon wyll truste true yf ye haue ben faythfull another ma busynesse wyll geue math cno seruaunte serue two maysters ether shall hate one loue el shal cleue vnto one despyse ye serue god mammon thinges herde pharises whych couetous mocked hym sayd vnto ye whych iustifye selues men god knoweth harte hyghe men abhominacion god math b lawe prophetes prophecied vntyll ihon fro thence kyngdome god preached euery one preasseth vpon violence esay math b easyer heauen earth passe awaye one tytle lawe fal math b marci euery one leaueth hys wyfe maryeth another commytteth aduoutry maryeth lefte hyr husbande committeth aduoutry ther certayne rych man clothed wyth purple fyne lynnen fared euery daye deliciously ther certayne poore man name lazarus laye hys dore beynge full sore desyrynge satisfyed wyth crommes fell fro rychmas table noma gaue hym dogges came lycked hys sore happened poore dyed caryed abrahas bosome angel rych man dyed also buryed hell whan payne lyftynge vp hys eye sawe abraha afarre lazarus hys bosome cryenge sayd father abraham haue mercy vpon sede lazarus dyppe typpe hys fynger water maye coole tunge payned thys flame abraham sayd vnto hym sonne gala remembre yt thou hast receaued good thy lyfe lazarus lykewyse euell comforted thou arte payned besydes al thys ther great space set betwene v yt wyl go hence vnto ca nother passe fro thece hether sayd praye tha father yu sende hym father house haue fyue brethre testifye vnto lest also come thys place tormetes abraham sayd vnto hym haue moses prophetes let heare sayd father abraham yf ony ye dead went shall penauce sayd vnto hym yf hear moses prophetes shall beleue though one rose fro dead xvii chapter sayd vnto hys disciple math marci impossible ye offeces shuld come wo vnto ye come better hym yf mylstone haged necke cast see tha shuld offede one lytle one take hede selues math b yf thy brother synne agaynst rebuke hym yf repente forgeue hym though synne seue tymes daye turned seuen tymes daye saynge repe teth forgeue apostle said vnto lorde increace fayth vnto v lord sayd math c c yf ye shall haue fayth grane mustarde sede ye shall saye vnto moulbery tre ro ted planted se shal obey hauynge seruaunte goynge plough fedynge oxe yt wyl say vnto beyng come felde go quyckely syt downe meate sayeth rather make ready yt may suppe gyrde vp thy selfe serue tyl haue eaten dronken thys shalte thou eate drynke doth thanke seruaunt hath done hath comauded hym thynke lykewyse ye wha ye haue done al thynges yt co maunded saye ye vnprofytable seruautes haue done deuty fortuned went ierusale passed thorow myddes samaria galile entred towne ther met hym ten leperous men whyche stode afarre lyft vp theyr voyce sayng iesu master haue mercy vpon v sawe sayde go leuit shewe selues vnto ye prestes chauced wet clensed one saw yt cle sed returned magnifyenge god wyth loude voyce fell vpon hys face hys fete geuyng tha kes thys samaritane iesus answerynge sayd ther ten clensed ye nyne ther none foude cam agayne gaue prayse vnto god saue thys straunger sayde vnto hym ryse go thy waye thy fayth hath saued whan demaunded ye pharises wh n kyngdome god commeth answerynge said kyngdome god shall come wyth waytynge mat b mar c nother shall saye lo lo beholde kyngdome god wythin sayde vnto hys disciple dayes shall come whan ye shall desyre se one daye sone ye shall se shal say vnto lo lo go ye nother followe lyghtenynge glysterynge vnder heaue shyneth vpo thynges vnder heauen euen shall sonne man day math c b marci luce fyrste muste suffre many thynges refused thys generacyon gen b mat befell dayes noe shall also dayes sonne man dyd eate drynke maryed wyues maryed vntyll daye noe entred arke floude came destroyed lykewyse also chaunced dayes lot gene dyd eat drynke bought solde planted buylded day lot went sodoma rayned fyre brymstone fro heauen destroyed thys maner shal daye ye sonne man shall appeare math b ye tyme vpo ye thacke hys vessel house let hym go downe fetch yt felde let hym lykewyse go backe gen e remembre lot wyfe math c marci e luce c ioha e shall endeuoure saue hys lyfe shal lose shall lose shal quycken saye vnto math ye nyght shall two one bedde ye one shal receaued shalbe lefte two shalbe gryndynge together one shalbe receaued left two ye felde one shalbe receaued shalbe left answerynge sayd vnto hym lorde whych sayd vnto soeuer dead carcase shal shal also aegles gathered xviii chapter tolde similitude vnto ye ought pray tessa alwayes leaue sayenge ther certayne iudge certayne cytie feared god stode awe noma ther certayn wedowe ye cytie cam hym sayeng auenge myne aduersary wolde great season thys said wythin hymselfe though drede god stade awe noma yet thys wedowe troublous vnto wyll auenge lest commynge last reuyle lorde sayd heare ye vnryghteous iudge sayeth shall god also auenge hys chosen cryenge vnto hym daye nyght though haue paciece wyth tell shall shortly auenge neuerthelesse sonne man comyng trowe ye shall fynde fayth earth vnto trusted selues ryghteous despysed tolde thys parable sayenge two men wente vp temple praye one pharise ye publicane pharise sta dynge prayed thys hymselfe deut c eccli thanke god men ye robber vnryghteous aduouterous ether publican fast twise ye weke geue tethes al yt possesse ye publicane standynge afarre wolde lyfte vp hys eyen heaue smote vpon hys brest sayeng god mercyfull vnto synner tell thys wet downe house iustifyed vnlyke ye math b luco b soeuer exalteth hymselfe shalbe brought lowe hubleth hymselfe shalbe exalted math b marc b brought yoge chyldre also hym yt shulde touch whych whan ye disciple sawe rebuked iesus callyng together sayde let ye chyldren come vnto forbyd vnto lyke pertayneth ye kyngdome god verely saye vnto euer taketh ye kyngdome god chyld shal entre math c marc b certayne ruler axed hym sayenge good mayster wyth doynge shal possesse lyfe euerlastynge iesus sayde vnto hym doest thou cal good ther noman good saue god knowest thou commaundemetes exodi c thou shalt kyl thou shalt commytte aduoutry thou shalt steale thou shalte beare false wytnesse honoure thy father mother whych sayd haue kepte fro youth vp iesus hauynge herde sayde vnto hym one thynge yet wantynge vnto sell thou hast geue vnto poore thou shalte haue treasure heaue come follow thys beynge herd sory rych iesus seynge hym made sorowfull sayd math c marci c hardly shall yt haue mony entre kyngdome god easyer camel go thorowe eye nedle rych entre kyngdom god herde said tha saued sayd vnto lu e thynges possible wyth men possible wyth god math mar peter sayd beholde haue lefte thynges haue followed sayd vnto verely saye vnto ther noman leaueth house elder brother wyfe chyldren kyngdome god shall receaue much thys lyfe worlde come lyfe euerlastynge math b marc iesus toke hym twelfe sayd vnto beholde go vp ierusalem al thynges yt wrytte ye sone shalbe fulfylled shalbe luce deliuered ye heythen shalbe mocked scourged spitted vpo shall haue scourged hym shal slaye hym shall ryse agayne thyrde daye luce vnderstode none thynges worde hyd perceaued thynges wer spoken math b marc chaunced whan came neare hierico certayne blynde man sat beggynge ye waye whan herde ye people goynge axed tolde hym iesus nazareth dyd go cryed sayeng iesu thou sone dauid haue mercy vpon wente afore rebuked hym shuld hold hys peace cryed much thou sonne dauid haue mercy vpon iesus standynge co maunded hym brought vnto hym wha come neare axed hym sayenge wylte thou shall vnto sayd lorde maye se iesus sayd vnto hym se thy fayth hath made safe forthwyth sawe followed hym magnifyenge god people sawe gaue prayse vnto god xix chapter beyng gone walked thorowe hierico beholde man name zacheus thys ruler ye publicanes ryche sought se iesus could ye people lytle stature runynge afore climmed vpon wylde fyggetre yt myght se hym come waye wha come place iesus lokinge vp sawe hym sayd vnto hym zache come downe haystyngly daye must abyde thy house came downe hastyngly receaued hym actu e ioyfully whan euery man sawe murmured sayenge gone vnto synner zacheus standyng said vnto ye lord beholde lord halfe goodes geue vnto poore yf haue begyled ony man geue foure double agayne iesus sayd vnto hym thys daye health happened vnto thys house yt also sonne abraha math c sone cam seke saue lost herd thys addyng therto tolde similitude near ierusalem supposed kyngdome god shulde shortely made manyfest sayd therfore math marci certayne noble man wente farre contry receaue hym kyngdome returne agaynt hys ten seruau te beynge called gaue ten pounde sayd vnto occupye vntyll come hys cytesins hated hym sente message hym sayeng wyl haue thys raygne ouer v fortuned yt came agayne receaued ye kyngdome comauded seruautes called vnto geuen mony myght know muche euery one occupyed fyrst came sayenge lord thy poude hath wone te poude said vnto ey thou good seruaut yu hast ben faythfull lytle yu shalt hauynge power ouer ten cyties seconde cam sayenge lorde thy poude hath gayned fyue pounde vnto hym sayd yu ouer fyue cyties thyrde came sayenge lorde beholde thy pounde whych layed vp napken afrayed yu art hard thou takest vp yu hast layed downe reapest yu haste sowen sayd vnto hym reg math thyne owne mouth iudge yu wycked seruaunte knewest yu hard takyng vp haue layed reapyng yt haue sowe wherfore gauest yu mony exchaunge bancke comynge shulde haue requyred myne wyth auauntage sayde vnto stode take poude fro hym geue hym yt hath ten poude said vnto lord hath ten poude saye vnto math c marc c luce bthat vnto yt hath shalbe geue shal haue abudauce fro hym hath shalbe taken also yt hath moreouer myne enemyes wolde haue raygne ouer brynge hether slaye wordes beynge sayd wente afore goynge vp ierusalem math marci fortuned whan cam near bethphage bethany vnto mounte called oliuete sente two hys disciple sayenge go towne ouer agaynste entrynge whych ye shall fynde ass foale tyed vpon whyche noman hath euer sytten lowse brynge hether yf ony man axe wherfore ye lowse saye ye vnto hym lorde requyreth hys vse sente wente theyr waye fande foale sta dynge sayde vnto lowsed foale ye owner therof sayd vnto ye lowse foale sayd lorde hath nede brought vnto iesus castynge theyr clothes vpon foale set iesus theron ioha b vnder hym goynge strowed theyr garmentes waye whan came neare goyng downe mounte oliuete multitude hys disciple reioycynge beganne wyth loude voyce prayse god ouer ye miracle sene sayenge luce blessed cometh kynge name lorde ephe c peace heauen glory ye heyght pharises co pany sayd vnto hym mayster rebuke thy disciple vnto sayd tell abac c yf holde theyr peace stone shal crye come neare beholdyng ye cytie ioh wept vpo sayeng yf yu also haddest knowe thy peace thys daye thyne thou woldest haue called mynde nowe hyd thyne eyen iere mich c mat marc luc dayes shall come vpo thyne enemyes shall cast banke aboute compasse put straytnesse euery syde throwe downe grounde th chyldren shall leaue one stone vpo another thou hast knowen tyme thy visitacion math b marc b ioha b beynge come temple beganne cast bought solde sayenge vnto wrytte reg esa b iere house house praier ye haue made dene murtherers daylye teachynge temple math luce b ioh c hygh prestes scribe ye chefest ye people sought destroye hym founde myght vnto hym people hagynge vpon hym hearynge xx chapter math marci fortuned one dayes taughte ye people temple preachynge gospell hygh prestes scribe wyth ye elder people came vnto hym spake vnto hym sayenge tell v authorite doest thou thynges gaue thys authorite iesus answerynge sayd vnto wyll also axe one worde answere ye baptyme ihon heauen men thought wythin themselues sayenge yf saye heauen shall saye dyd ye beleue hym yf saye men people shall stone v sure ihon prophete answered knewe whence iesus sayd vnto nother tell authorite thynges beganne tell thys similitude vnto people math marc certayne man planted vyneyarde let vnto husbandman hymselfe strauge cotry great season whan tyme sente seruaunte vnto husband men shulde geue hym ye frute vyne whych sente hym beaten awaye empty sente another seruaunte beatynge shamefully entreatynge hym sente hym awaye empty sente thyrde whych woudyng hym also cast hym lorde vyneyarde sayd shall shall sende ioha c rom phili welbeloued sonne perchauce wha shall se hym shall stande awe hym whan husbandme sene thought wythin selues sayenge thys heyre u dlet v slaye hym heretage may become hym beynge cast vyneyard slewe hym shall lorde ye vyne yard therfore vnto shal come destroye husbandme shall geue hys vyneyarde vnto whyche beynge herde sayd vnto hym god forbydde beholdynge sayd wrytten psal c esay c stone whych buylders refused ye become heade stone corner euer shal fal vpo stone shalbe broken peces dani vpon whome shall fall shal braye hym math e marc luce hygh prestes scrybes soughte laye handes hym houre feared ye people knewe wel ynough sayd similitude math b marc aand watchyng sent spyes shulde fayne themselues ryghteous myght take hym worde delyuer hym vnto power authorite debite axed hym sayeng mayster knowe thou sayest teachest ryght acceptest persone teachest waye god truthe lawfull v geue tribute vnto emperour perceauynge theyr craftynesse sayd vnto ye tempte shew ye peny whose ymage superscripcio hath answerynge sayd vnto hym emperours sayde vnto geue vnto ye emperoure ye thynges ye emperours vnto god ye thynges whych god could blame hys worde ye people hauynge maruayle hys answer held theyr peace math c marc b ther came hym saduces actu whych denye resurreccion axed hym sayeng master moses hath wrytten vnto v deu yf ony ma brother dead hauyng wyfe wythout chyldren yt hys brother take wyfe rayse vp sede vnto hys brother ther seuen brethre fyrst toke wyfe dyed chyldlesse nexte toke also dyed wythout chylde thyrde toke lykewyse also seuen haue lefte sede dyed last dyed ye woman also resurreccion therfore whose wyfe shal seuen wyfe iesus sayd vnto chyldren thys worlde mary maryed shalbe worthye worlde resurreccion dead shal nother mary men mary wyues nother able dye ony equall wyth ye angel ioha chyldren god seynge chyldren resurreccio dead ryse agayne hath moses also shewed bush calleth exod lorde god abraham god isaac god iacob god dead lyuynge lyue vnto hym scrybes answerynge sayde vnto hym mayster yu hast sayd well durst axe hym ony thynge math marc said vnto saye christ dauids sone dauid sayeth ye boke psalmes psal lord sayd vnto lord syt thou ryghte hande tyll set thyne enemyes stoole thy fete dauid tha calleth lord hys sone math marc luce people geuynge eare sayd vnto hys disciple beware scrybes whych wyll go loge garmentes loue gretynges market fyrste seates synagoges fyrst rowmes meales whych deuoure wedowes house faynynge longe prayer shal receaue greater damnacion xxi chapter beholdyng saw rych put mony god chestemarc sawe also certayne poore wedowe puttyng two mytes said tell truly cori b thys poore wedowe hath put tha haue put offerynge god abundaut vnto wantynge vnto hath put hyr lyuynge math marc vnto yt speakynge temple garnyshed wyth goodly stone iewels sayd reg iere b luce ye se dayes shall come wherein one stone shall lefte vpon another shall destroyed axed sayenge mayster whan shall thynges shalbe token whan thynges shall begyn come passe sayd take hede ye deceaued ioha many shal come name sayeng tyme come hande go wha ye shall heare warres vproures afrayed thynges must fyrste done ende yet soone sayd vnto esaie nacion shall ryse vp agaynst nacion kyngdome agaynst kyngdome ther shalbe earthquake pestilence derth fearfull thynges ther shalbe great token heauen math abut afor al thynges shal laye theyr handes shall persecut youmarc b luce b ioha b delyueryng vp synagoges wardes drawynge kynges debites name sake thys shall happen vnto wytnesse poynt therfore youre harte cast afore ye shal answer exodi c esay c actu bfor shal geue mouth wysdom al aduersaryes shal able wtstade gaynsay mich ye shalbe delyuered vp elder brother kynsfolkes fredes shall put death ye shalbe hated euery man name sake one heere heade shall perysh pacience shall ye possesse soules mat b marci b whan ye shall se ierusalem beseged wyth hoost sure waystynge come neare let iewry flye vnto moutaynes myddes let auoyde contryes let entre dayes vengeauce thynges maye fulfylled yt wrytten wo vnto wyth chylde geuynge sucke dayes ther shalbe greate anguysh vpon earth wrath vnto thys people shall fal thorowe edge swearde shal led presoners amonge nacios rom dand ierusale shalbe troden downe heythen vntyll tymes heythen shalbe fulfylled ezech c ce b mat c marc c apoc c ther shalbe token sonne moone starres vpon earth anguysh men confusion soude see floudes men pynynge awaye feare waytynge thynges whych shall come vpo al ye world ye power heauen shalbe moued esa luc c ioha e shall se sonne man come cloude wyth great power maieste thynges begynnynge befall loke vp lyft vp heades youre redemption draweth nye tolde similitude mat c mar beholde fygge tre al tree wha bring forth frute theselues ye sure ye somer hade euen ye also wha ye se thynges done sure yt kyngdo god hade verely saye vnto yt thys generacio shal passe tyl al thinges done heauen earth shal passe wordes shall passe eccli rom b take hede selues lest haply youre harte ouercharged wyth surfettynge dronkenesse care thys lyfe daye come sodenly vpo snare shal come vpon al yt dwel earth mat marc pet b watch therfore tyme prayenge yt ye maye worthy flye al thynges yt shal come stande ye sone ye daye tyme teaching ye teple ye nightes goynge abode ye mount called oliuete al ye people cam hym temple heare hym xxii chapter feast day exod math marc swete bread drue nye whyche called easter ioha c f ye hygh prestes scribe soughte howe myght put hym death feared people ioha c satan entred iudas whych surnamed iscariot one twelfe went hys waye communed wyth hygh prestes officer howe myght betraye hym vnto glad promysed geue hym mony promysed sought oportunite myght delyuer hym wythout company math b marc b daye swete bread came wherin easterlambe must kylled sente peter ihon sayeng ye goynge make ready easterlambe maye eate sayde wylte thou yt prepare sayd vnto beholde man shall mete goynge cytie bearynge pytcher water followe hym house goeth ye shal saye vnto ye good man house mayster sendeth ye worde gesthouse wherin may eat easterlabe wt disciple shall shewe great parloure paued make ready goynge dyd fynde sayd vnto made ready easterlabe whan houre come sat downe borde twelfe apostle sayd vnto haue entyerly desyred eate easterlambe wt suffre say vnto henceforth shal eate vntyl cor b fulfylled kyngdome god math c marc c co c cuppe beynge taken thanked sayd take parte amoge saye vnto shal drynke nomore frute vyne vntyll kyngdome god come breade beynge taken gaue thankes brake gaue sayeng thys body ioha fwhych geue thys remembraunce lykewyse also cuppe supped sayeng thys cuppe new testament bloude whych shal shed math b marc neuerthelesse beholde hade betrayeth wyth table surely sonne man goeth defyned wo vnto man whome shalbe betrayed began axe amonge themselues whych shuld shuld math marc e luce ther rose stryfe amonge whych shulde sene greater sayde vnto kynges ye nacions haue dominion ouer yt haue power ouer called gracious pet abut ye yt greater amonge let hym become yonger chefest seruaut greater sytteth table serueth sytteth borde myddes amonge mynistreth ye haue abyden wyth te tacios luce appointe ye kyngdome father hath appoynted vnto yt ye maye eate drynke table kyngdome math apoc syt vpo seates iudgynge xii trybes israel ye lord said vnto simo simo beholde sata hath desyred yt myght syfte lyke wheate haue prayed thy fayth fayle thou tyme beynge conuerted stablysh thy brethre sayd vnto hym math c marc c ioha lorde ready go wt preso death sayd peter tel ye cocke shall crowe daye tyl yu haue denyed thryse knowe sayd vnto math marc luce awha sent wythout wallet scrippe shues dyd wante ony thynge sayd nothynge tha sayd hath wallet let take vp lykewyse scrippe yt hath let hym sel hys coate bye sweard tel yt wrytten must yet fulfylled esa c couted euel doer thynges yt wrytte haue ende sayd lord holde two sweardes said vnto ynough math c ioha beyng gone wet luc according hys wot vnto mout oliuet hys disciple followed ca ye place sayd vnto math b praye lest ye fal temptacion math dand hymselfe much stone cast knelyng prayed sayng father yf yu wylt remoue thys cup fro neuerthelesse wyll ioha thyne done ther appeared vnto hym angell fro heauen cofortyng hym beyng wrestelyng wt death prayed ye longer hys sweate became droppes bloude trycklyng downe ye groud wha rysen fro ye prayer come hys disciple fande slepynge sorow sayde vnto slepe ye aryse praye lest ye come tetacio mat c marc c ioha awhyle yet spake beholde ye multitude one ye twelfe called iudas went cam neare iesu myght kysse hym iesus sayde vnto hym iudas doest thou betraye sonne man kysse yt hym seynge come sayd vnto hym lorde shall smyte wyth sweard one smote hyghe prestes seruaunt cut hys ryght eare iesus answeryng sayd let alone hetherto wha touched eare healed math f marc f iesus sayd vnto hygh prestes ruler temple elder yt come vnto hym ye gone forth wyth sweardes staues vnto murtherer whan daylye wyth teple ye put forth hades vpo thys houre power darkenesse ioha b takyng led hym ye house hygh prest peter followed hym afarre math g marc g kyndled fyre myddes palace syttyng peter myddest whome damsell saw syttynge lyght loked vpon said thys also wt hym denyed hym sayenge woman knowe hym lytle another seyng said thou also art peter sayd space houre another affyrmed sayenge truely thys also hym galilean peter sayde man know thou sayest forthwyth yet speakynge cocke dyd crowe lorde beynge turned aboute loked vpon peter peter reme bred worde iesu said math c marc luce c cocke crowe thou shalte denye thryse peter beynge gone forth wepte bytterly math c marc luce c c men helde hym mocked hym beatynge hym blyndfolded hym stroke hym face axed hym sayeng esa b prophecye smote many thynges sayde agaynst hym blasphemynge math f marc g whan become day ye elder ye people ye hygh prests ye scribe cam together brought theyr councell sayenge tel v art thou christ said vnto yf tell wyll beleue yf also axe ye shall answer nother wyl ye let go collo hebre b thys tyme forth shall sonne man syttynge ye ryght hande ye power god tha sayd arte thou sonne god said ye say sayd math g yet requyre wytnesse haue herde hys owne mouth xxiii chapter math ioha whole multitude rysynge led hym pilate thy began accuse sayeng haue foude fellow uertyng people math b forbyddyng geue tribute vnto ye emperour sayeng christ ye kynge math b pilate axed sayeng art thou ye kinge iewes answerynge sayd thou sayest pilate sayd vnto ye hygh prestes people fynde cause thys man fearce sayenge hath steared people teachynge thorow al iewry math b begynnynge galile vnto thys place pilate hearynge galile mencioned axed whether man galile whan knew luce herodes iurisdiccion luc sente hym herode whych also ierusale dayes herode seynge iesus reioiced greatly desyrous great whyle ago se luce ahe herde many thynges hym hoped se token done axed many thinges answered hym nothyng hygh prestes scrybes stode accusynge hym earnestly herode wyth hys hoost despysed hym mocked hym arayed wyth whyte garmente sente hym agayne pilate herode pilate made frendes daye enemyes ech afore actu cand pilate hygh prestes ruler people beynge called together sayd vnto math b marc ioha e ye haue brought thys man vnto peruertynge people beholde examinyng hym fynde cause thys man wherof ye accuse hym yet herode sente vnto hym beholde nothynge worthy death done vnto hym ioh wyll therfore let hym lowse beynge chastised must haue let lowse one vnto feast math marci b whole multitude cryed sayenge take awaye thys let barrabas lowse vnto v whyche vproure cytie manslaughter comitted put preson pilate wyllyng delyuer iesus spake vnto agayn cryed saynge crucifye crucifye hym sayd thyrd tyme vnto euel hath thys done fynde cause death hym shall therfore chastise let hym lowse lay earnestly vpon hym loude voice requirynge myght crucified voyces preuayled math c actu b pilate iudged theyr requeste shulde graunted let lowse vnto hym layd preson manslaughter insurreccion axed iesus toke theyr wyll math ioha b whan led hym toke one simon cyren commynge felde layed crosse hym bear iesus zacha c great multitude people wemen followed hym whych wepte bewayled hym iesus beynge turned vnto sayd ye doughters ierusalem wepe vpon wepe vpon selues vpon chyldre beholde dayes shall come shall saye happy baren wobes haue brought forth brestes haue geuen sucke iere osee b apoc c shall begynne saye mountaynes fall vpon v hylles couer v yf thynges vnto grene tre shal done vnto drye esaie c ther two wycked led wyth myght put death whan came place whych called caluary crucifyed hym murtherers ye one ryght hande lefte hande iesus sayd father actu g forgeue wote psal b mat c marc c ioha c diuidynge hys raymentes cast iottes people stode beholdynge math marc c ruler wyth mocked saynge hath saued let hym saue hymselfe yf thys christ chosen god souldyers also mocked hym comynge hym geuynge hym vynegre sayenge yf thou ye kynge ye iewes saue thyselfe math ioh b ther super scripcion wrytten aboue hym wyth greke latine hebrue letter thys kynge ievves one murtherers yt dyd hange dyd blaspheme hym sayenge yf thou art christ saue thyselfe v answerynge rebuked hym sayenge fearest thou god seynge thou arte lyke damnacion surely worthyly receaue worthy rewarde dedes thys hath done euell sayd vnto iesus lord remebre whan thou shalt come thy kyngdome iesus sayd vnto hym verely saye vnto daye shalt thou wyth paradyse math c marc neare hande ye syxte houre ther happened darknesse vpon ye whole earth vntyl nynth houre ye sone darkened vayle ye teple dyd clyue two euen thorow myddes iesus cryenge wyth loude voyce sayd psal actu g father thy handes commende sprete sayenge thys gaue vp ye goost mach f mar centurio seynge yt done glorifyed god sayenge truely thys ryghteous man copany together syght sawe thynges happened smytynge vpon theyr brestes turned agayne hys acquayntaunces stode afarre woman hadde followed hym fro galile beholdyng thynges math g marci e ioha behold name ioseph whych senatour good ryghteous dyd consent vnto theyr counsell dedes whych arimathea cytie iewry also wayted kyngdome god wente vnto pilate axed body iesu beynge take downe wounde lynnen cloth layed hym sepulchre wen wherein noman yet ben layed daye preparynge sabbat drue luce wemen come galile sawe graue hys body layde returnyng prepared spyces oyntmentes vpon sabbat styll accordynge comau dement xxiiii chapter bvt math marc ioha vpon fyrst daye sabbat early come sepulchre bryngynge spice made ready fande stone rolled graue beynge gone fande body lorde iesu ioha chaunced whan amased thys beholde two men stode shynynge garmente wha afeared bowed downe theyr face earth sayd vnto ye seke lyuynge wyth ye dead ryse remebre told yet galile sayeng luce cthe sonne man must delyuered handes synfull men crucifyed ryse agayne ye thyrde daye remembred hys wordes math marc b ioha b beynge gone ye graue shewed al thynges vnto eleuen vnto mary magdalene ioanna mary iames wyth tolde thynges vnto apostle wordes semed eue vayne tale vnto beleued peter rysynge dyd runne sepulchre bowynge downe sawe lynnen clothes layd alone went away maruaylynge hymselfe happened math b beholde two wente daye towne ierusalem space lx furlonges name emaus talked together al thynges happened math c befell comuned axed ech iesus approchynge went wyth theyr eye holden lest shulde knowe hym sayd vnto communicacions ye treat amonge walkynge sad one whose name cleophas answeryng sayd vnto hym art thou onely straunger ierusalem knowest thynges happened therin dayes vnto sayd said vnto hym iesus nazareth math e whych prophete myghty dede worde god people oure hygh prestes ruler haue deliuered vnto codemnacion death haue crucifyed hym hoped shulde haue redymed israel besydes thys daye thyrde daye sence thynges happened l ce ioha yee certayne woman copany made v afrayed graue daye hys body founde came sayeng yt sene visio angel whych saye hym lyue certayne went sepulchre dyd fynde wome sayd hym fande sayd vnto ye fooles slow hart beleue al prophetes haue spoken esay ought christ haue suffered thynges thys wyse entre hys glorye begynnynge moses prophetes expouded vnto hym scripture cam neare ye towne wherevnto wente fayned hymselfe go farther gene luce c co pelled sayeng abide wt v draweth towarde nyght ye daye wended awaye wente wt marc b happened whan sat borde wyth toke breade gaue thankes brake gaue theyr eye opened dyd knowe vanyshed awaye theyr syght sayd ech harte burnynge v whan spake waye dyd ope vnto v scripture rysynge vp returned ierusalem houre fande eleuen gathered together sayenge lorde truely rysen hath appeared vnto simo told thynges done ye waye knewe hym ye breakynge breade ioha c whyle spake thynges iesus stode myddest sayeth peace vnto feare beynge abashed afrayed thought sene spret sayd vnto ye troubled thoughtes ryse harte loke vpon handes fete selfe handle se sprete hath flesh bone ye se haue sayd shewed hys handes fete vnto yet beleuynge wonderynge ioy sayd ioha b haue ye ony thynge maye eaten brought pece broyled fysh hony combe whan eaten takyn ye leauynges gaue vnto sayd vnto math b wordes dyd speake vnto whan yet wyth thynges muste nedes fulfylled whych wrytten ye law moses prophetes psalmes opened vnto theyr vnderstandyng shulde vnderstande scripture sayd vnto actu thus wrytten thus behoued christ suffre ryse agayne dead thyrde daye repentaunce forgeuynge synnes preached hys name amonge nacions mich begynnynge ierusale ye wytnesses thynges actu shall sende ioh c c promyse father tarye ye cytie vntyll ye endued wyth power hygh marc c actu b led wythout bethany hys handes lyfted vp blessed came passe whan blessed departed caryed vp heauen worshippynge hym wente agayne ierusalem wyth great ioye alwaye temple praysynge geuynge thankes vnto god amen pthe ende gospell luke pthe holy gospell iesv christe ihon fyrst chapter begynnynge worde worde wt god god ye worde begynnyng god gene pro call thynges made hym wythout hym nothynge made yt made hym ioha c lyfe ye lyfe ioh b lyght men lyghte shyneth darknesse darkenesse dyd comprehende ther sente man god whose name ihon dyd come wytnesse yt myght beare wytnesse lyght thorow hym al myght beleue ioha light myght beare wytnesse lyght true lyghte lyghteth euery man commynge thys worlde worlde ye worlde made hym worlde knewe hym cam among hys owne hys owne receaued hym many receaued hym esay b oz rom b gala gaue power become chyldren god euen beleue hys name whyche borne bloude wyll fleshe nother ye wyl man god bar c worde become fleshe dwelte amonge v math pet c ioha haue sene hys glory glory ye begotten sonne father full grace truth math b marci iho beareth wytnesse cryeth sayeng thys whome spake shall come made yer haue receaued hys collo b fulnesse euen grace grace lawe geuen moses grace truth happened iesus christ deut b c ioh b noman hath sene god ony tyme begotten sonne whych father bosome hath declared hym ioha thys ye recorde ihon whan iewes sent prestes leuites vnto hym ierusalem shuld axe arte thou confessed denyed confessed ioha di christ axed hym arte thou elia sayde arte thou prophete answered sayd vnto hym art thou may geue answere vnto sent v sayest thou thy selfe sayd math marci luce voyce cryer wyldernesse make strayght waye ye lorde esai esaye hath spoke sente pharises axed hym sayd vnto hym doest thou baptyse yf thou arte nother christ elia prophete ihon answered sayenge math b marci luce c actu baptyse wyth water myddes amoge stode whome ye knewe shal come whych made whose lachet hys shue worthy yt may lowse thynges wer done bethabara beyond iordane ioha b ihon baptysyng nexte day dyd ihon se iesus comynge hym sayd beholde esai b co b lambe god beholde whyche taketh awaye synnes worlde thys dyd saye commeth whych made yer knewe hym might made knowen israel fore come baptisynge wyth water math b marc luce c ihon dyd beare recorde sayenge sawe sprete commynge downe heaue lyke doue abode vpon hym knewe hym sente baptyse wyth water sayd vnto upon whome euer thou shalte se sprete come downe abydynge vpon hym baptyseth holy goost haue sene haue borne recorde sonne god nexte daye agayne stode ihon two hys disciple seynge iesus walkynge said beholde exod esa blabe god two disciple herde hym speakynge followed iesus iesus beynge turned aboute seynge followynge hym sayeth vnto seke ye whych sayd vnto hym rabbi whyche interpreted saye mayster dwellest thou sayeth vnto come se came sawe dwelled abode wyth hym daye nearehade tenth houre andrewe ye brother simon peter one tweyne whych herde ihon followed hym dyd fyrste fynde hys brother simon sayeth vnto hym haue founde messias whiche interpreted anoynted brought hym iesus whan iesus dyd beholde hym sayd thou arte simon sonne ionas math cthou shalte called cephas whyche interpreted petrus morowe wolde haue gone galile fande philippe iesus sayeth vnto follow ioha c philippe bethsaida cytie andrew peter philippe fande nathanael sayeth vnto hym haue founde iesus sonne ioseph nazareth gene c c b deut cof moses hath wrytten lawe esa c b ye prophetes nathanael sayde vnto hym ioh ony good thynge nazareth philippe sayd vnto hym come se iesus saw nathanael commynge hym sayeth hym beholde true israelite whome gyle nathanael sayd vnto whence doest thou knowe iesus answered sayd vnto hym philippe called thou werest vnder fygge tre sawe nathanael answered hym sayde rabbi thou arte sonne god thou arte kynge israel iesus answered sayd vnto hym sayde vnto sawe vnder fygge tre thou beleuest thou shalte se greater thynge sayd vnto verely verely saye vnto ye shall se henceforth heauen open angel god goynge vp downe vpon ye sonne man ii chapter vpon thyrde daye ther weddynge chana galile mother iesu iesus also called ye weddyng hys disciple wyne faylynge iesus mother sayd vnto haue wine iesus said vnto luce woman haue wyth myne houre yet come hys mother sayd vnto mynisters soeuer sayeth vnto ther syxe waterpottes stone set accordynge purifyenge iewes conteynynge euery one two thre reca measure halfe fyrken euery pot conteyned fyrke fyrken halfe measure iesus sayd vnto fyll waterpottes wyth water fylled brymme iesus sayde vnto drawe nowe brynge mayster feaste dyd beare whan mayster feaste hadde taysted water made wyne knewe whence mynisters hadde drawen water knewe mayster feaste calleth brydegrome sayeth vnto hym euery man fyrste setteth good wyne whan dronke worse thou hast kepte good wyne hetherto thys begynnynge myracles hath iesus done chana galile hath shewed hys glorye hys disciple beleued hym math b marc b luce thys went downe capernaum hys mother hys brother hys disciple remayned many dayes math b marc b luce easter iewes hande iesus wente vp ierusale fande seller shepe ox doues mony chaugers syttynge wha made scourge small cordes cast al ye teple ye shepe also ox mony mony chaungers poured ouerthrewe table vnto solde doues sayd haue thynges hence make father house house marchaudise hys disciple remembred wrytte psal b zele thy house hath eaten iewes answered said vnto hym math ioha toke shewest thou v thou doest thynges iesus answered sayd vnto math f lowse thys temple wythin thre dayes shall rayse agayne sayd iewes esd forty yeare thys te ple abuyldynge wylt thou rayse vp thre dayes spake temple hys body whan therfore rysen agayne deade hys disciple remembred sayd beleued scripture worde iesus dydde speake whan ierusalem easter feaste many beleued hys name seseynge hys token dyd iesus dyd comytte hymselfe vnto knewe neded ony shulde testifye iere apoc knew man iii chapter ther man ye pharises name ioha nicodemus ruler amonge iewes came vnto iesus nyght sayd vnto hym rabbi knowe thou art come teacher god ioha b noman token thou doest wythout god wyth hym iesus answered sayd vnto verely verely saye vnto without man borne newe cannot se kyngdome god nicodemus sayd vnto hym howe borne agayne wha old entre agayne hys mother wombe borne agayne iesus answered ioha b b titu verely verrely saye vnto wythout man borne water holy goost entre kyngdome god rom athat whych borne flesh flesh whych borne sprete sprete maruayle sayd vnto ye must borne agayne wynde bloweth wyl hys voyce hearest thou eccles yu knowest whence cometh goeth euery man yt borne ye sprete nicodemus answered said vnto thynges iesus answered sayd vnto hym art yu master israel knowest thynges verely verely saye vnto speake knowe testifye haue sene ye receaue wytnesse yf haue tolde earthly thynges ye beleue shall ye beleue yf shal tel heauenly thynges ephes noman goeth vp heauen saue came downe heauen euen sone whych heauens nume b ioha c moses dyd lyfte vp serpent wyldernesse euen must sonne man lyfted vp euery beleueth hym peryshe haue lyfe euerlastynge rom ioha b god dyd loue worlde gaue hys begotten sonne mar b euery one beleueth hym perysh haue euerlastynge lyfe luce afor god sente hys sonne worlde iudge ye world worlde saued hym beleueth hym shal iudged beleueth iudged already dyd beleue name begotten sonne god iudgemente ioha f lyght come worlde men loued darkenesse lyghte theyr workes euel ephe b euery one doth euell hateth lyghte commeth lyght hys workes reproued yt doth truth cometh lyght hys workes may ope done god afterwarde came iesus disciple lande iewrye dwelled wyth ioh baptysed math marc luce ihon also baptysynge enno salim wer many water came baptised math b ihon yet put preson ther arose question amonge disciple ihon wyth iewes purificacion came vnto ihon sayd vnto hym mayster wyth beyonde iordane thou dyd dest beare wytnesse beholde ye baptyseth ioha men come vnto hym ihon answered sayd receaue nothynge wythout geuen heauen ye selues beare recorde ioha b sayd christ sent hym hath bryde brydegrome brydegromes frende stadeth heareth hym reioyceth greatlye brydegromes voyce thys ioye myne tha fulfylled must increace must minish commeth hygh aboue earth earthye speaketh earthe come heauen aboue testifyeth hath sene herd noma receaueth hys wytnesse shall receaue hys wytnesse hath set hys hande rom god true whome god hath sente speaketh ye wordes god esaie god geueth ye sprete measure father loueth sonne math luce c hath geuen al thynges hys handes ioh ioha b beleueth sonne hath lyfe euerlastynge beleueth ye sone shall se lyfe ye wrath god abydeth vpon hym iiii chapter whan iesus tha dyd know ye pharises herde iesus maketh baptyseth mo disciple ihon thoughe iesus baptysed hys disciple math b lefte iewry wente agayne galile neded hym go thorowe ye myddes samaria came therfore citie samaria called sycharnye pece lande gene iacob gaue vnto ioseph hys sonne well iacob iesus beynge weery hys yourney sat thus vpon well nearehande syxte houre ther came woman samaria drawe water iesus sayde vnto geue drynke disciple gone cytie myghte bye meates sayd woman samaria vnto hym howe doest thou seynge thou arte iewe axe drynke whych woman samaria reg c ioha c iewes medle wyth samaritanes iesus answered sayd vnto yf thou knewest gyfte god sayeth vnto geue drynke thou woldeste happely haue requyred hym shulde haue geuen iere b ioha lyuynge water woman sayd vnto hym syr thou haste wyth thou mayest drawe wel depe whence haste thou lyuynge water arte thou greater father iacob whych gaue v thys well chyldre hys cattell dyd drynke iesus answered sayd vnto euery man drynketh thys water shall thyrst agayne shall drynke water shall geue hym shall thyrst euer ioha titu water shall geue hym shall become vnto hym foutayne water spryngynge lyfe euerlastynge woman sayeth vnto ioha syr geue water thirst nother come hether drawe iesus sayde vnto go thy waye call thy husbande come hether woman answered sayde haue husbad iesus sayeth vnto thou haste sayd well haue husbande thou haste fyue husbandes thou hast thy husbande hast thou sayd truely woman sayd vnto hym syr luce bi se thou art prophete oure father haue worshipped vpon thys mountayne reg pat c ye saye ierusalem true place must worshippe iesus sayeth vnto woman beleue houre shall come whan ye shall worshippe father nother ierusalem vpon thys mountayne ye worship ye knowe worshippe knowe gen c saluacion co meth iewes houre commeth wha true worshipper shall worshippe father rom sprete truth father requyreth suche also maye worshippe hym cori c god sprete worshippe must worshippe sprete truth woman sayeth vnto hym knowe messias whych called christ commeth whan therfore shall come shall shewe v thynges iesus sayeth vnto f marc g luc c ioha c speaketh wt forth wyth came hys disciple maruayled spake wyth woman yet sayd noman axest thou speakest thou wt lefte woman hyr waterpot wente cytie sayd vnto men come se ye man hath tolde euer haue done christ tha wente cytie came vnto hym meane season prayed disciple hym sayenge mayster eate sayd vnto haue meate eate ye knowe sayd hys disciple ech hath ony man brought hym eate iesus sayd vnto meate wyll hym sente yt fulfyll hys worke ye say ther yet foure monethes tha cometh haruest beholde saye vnto lyft vp youre eye loke vpo ye contries math luce afor whyte vnto ye haruest yt reapeth receaueth rerewarde gathereth frute vnto lyfe euerlastynge soweth reapeth may reioyce together ye word true one soweth another reapeth haue sente reape vpon ye bestowed laboure men haue laboured ye entred theyr laboures manye samaritanes cytie beleued hym womas word bearynge recorde hath tolde haue done whan samaritanes nowe came hym prayed hym wold tary taryed two dayes many mo beleued hys worde sayd vnto woman beleue thy sayeng ioha b haue herd hym selues know thys truely saueoure ye worlde two dayes wente fro thece wente galile math g marci luce c iesus hymselfe testifyed prophete hath honoure hys cotry wha therfore cam galile galilean receaued hym hadde sene thynges done ierusalem feast also come feast daye came agayne chana galile ioha made water wyne ther certayne ruler whose sonne sycke capernaum whan herd iesus dyd come fro iewry galile wente hym besoughte hym wold come downe hea e hys sonne began dye sayd iesus vnto hym wythout ye se token wonder ye beleue ruler sayeth vnto hym syr come downe euer chylde dye iesus sayeth vnto go thy way thy sonne lyueth man beleued worde whyche iesus sayd vnto hym went away goynge downe hys seruautes met hym shewed hym sayenge sone dyd lyue tha axed houre wherein dyd mende tolde hym yesterdaye seuen clocke dyd ye feuer leaue hym dyd father knowe houre iesus sayd thy sonne lyueth actu aand al hys house dyd beleue thys seconde token dyd iesus wha came agayne iewry galile v chapter ther feast iewes iesus wente vp ierusalem ther ierusalem slaughter house poole whyche called bethseda hauynge fyue porch laye great multytude sycke blynde lame wythered waytynge stearynge water angel lorde came downe certaine tyme poole ye water steared fyrst gone downe poole stearyng water made whole euer disease vexed certayne man hauynge disease eyght thyrtye yeare whan iesus sene ye lyenge dyd anowe ben diseased greate whyle sayeth vnto hym wylte thou whole sycke answered hym syr haue man water steared maye put poole come another gone downe afore iesus sayeth vnto hym math marc luce c ryse take vp thy bed walke forthwyth man made whole toke vp hys bed walked math marci c luce b ioh ye sabbat daye therfore sayd iewes vnto hym made whole sabbat lawfull cary thy bedde answered made whole said vnto take vp thy bed walke axed man said vnto take vp thy bed walke yt made whol knew iesus ioha b gotten hymselfe awaye people place afterwarde dyd iesus fynde hym temple sayd vnto beholde thou arte made whole ioha synne nowe lest worse thynge happen vnto man wente shewed iewes iesus healed hym therfore dyd iewes persecute iesus dyd thynges ye sabbat iesus answered cori father worketh hetherto worke also therfore sought iewes much ye slaye hym brake ye sabbat math f mar g luce c called god also hys father makynge hymselfe equall wyth god iesus therfore answered sayd vnto verely verely saye vnto ioha sonne nothyng selfe seyth father thynges euer doth ye doth sonne lykewyse father loueth ye sone sheweth hym al thynges doeth shal shewe hym greater workes ye also maye maruayle father rayseth deade maketh lyue doth ye sonne also make lyue whome wyll nother doth father iudge ony man math e luce c hath geuen al iudgement vnto sonne al men shulde honoure sonne honoure father honoureth sonne honoureth father whych sente sonne verely verely saye vnto ioha heareth worde beleueth sente hath lyfe euerlastyng luce commeth iudgement gone death lyfe verely verely saye vnto marc e ioha e te c houre commeth whan dead shall heare voyce sonne god shall heare shall lyue ioha father hath lyfe hath also geuen vnto ye sonne haue lyfe hymselfe hath geuen hym power execute iudgement sonne man maruayle thys dan math houre commeth wherin graues shall heare voyce sone god shall go forth haue done good vnto resurreccion lyfe haue done euell resurreccion iudgement nothynge selfe heare iudge iudgement iust seke wyll hys wyll sente ioha b yf therfore beare wytnesse selfe wytnesse true ther another yt beareth wytnesse knowe yt wytnesse true beareth ioha ye sente vnto ihon dyd beare wytnesse truth neuerthelesse receaue recorde man saye thynges ye may saued ioha b burnynge shynynge lyghte ye wolde haue reioyced lytle whyle hys lyght ioh haue greater wytnesse ihon ioh c workes father hath geue yt shulde ye workes yt bear wytnesse father hath sente math b ioha b ye father yt hath sent beareth wytnesse nother haue ye euer herd hys voyce haue sene hys lykenesse deut c ioha b ye haue hys worde abydynge ye beleue hym whome hath sente ioha search scripture ye thynke haue euerlastynge lyfe actu b deu c beare wytnesse ye wyll come vnto ye maye haue lyfe ioha receaue prayse men knowe ye haue loue god come father name ye haue receaued ioha c ssa yf another shall come hys name shall ye receaue ye beleue whych receaue prayse ech seke glory god thynke shall accuse father ther ony accuseth eue moses ye trust yf ye beleued moses ye wold happely beleue also deut hath wrytte yf ye beleue hys wrytynges shal ye beleue wordes vi chapter thynges math b marc luce b went iesus ouer see galile nye ye cytie tyberias great multitude followed hym sawe token dyd vpon yt sycke therfore went iesus vp moutayne sat wyth hys disciple exodi easter iewes feaste hande whan iesus lyfted vp hys eye sene great multitude dyd come vnto hym sayde vnto philippe whence shall bye breades yt may eate thys sayde temptyng hym knewe shuld philippe answered two hudreth penyworthes breades suffise euery one maye take lytle one hys disciple sayd vnto hym andrewe ye brother simon peter lad whych hath fyue barly loaues two fyshes reg c amonge many sayd iesus cause men syt downe ther much grasse place tha dyd men syt downe nombre near hande fyue thousande dyd iesus take breades geuen thankes toke hys disciple disciple gaue vnto sat downe lykewyse fyshes muche wolde whan fylled sayd vnto hys disciple gather broken peces lefte ouer lest perysh gathered fylled twelfe baskettes broken peces fyue barly loues yt whych lefte ouer vnto eaten men sene token iesus done sayd luce b ioha c thys truely prophete shulde come worlde whan iesus knewe shulde come take hym make hym kynge ioha fled agayne moutayne alone math c marc e wha become euen hys disciple wente downe see whan gone vp shippe came ouer see capernaum become darke iesus come vnto see arose wyth great wynde whan therfore rowed vpo fyue twenty thyrty furlonges se iesus walkynge vpon see come neare afrayed sayde vnto feare wolde take hym shippe forthwyth shippe lande whych wente nexte daye people stode syde ye see sawe ther none shippe saue one entred shippe wyth hys disciple ye disciple gone alone neuerthelesse shippes came tyberias neare place eaten bread geuynge thakes god wha people tha sawe yt iesus hys disciple wente vp lytle shippes came capernaum sekynge iesus whan founde hym beyonde ye see sayde vnto hym mayster wha camest thou iesus answered sayd verely verely say vnto ye seke ye haue sene myracles ye haue eate breades satisfyed laboure ye breade perysheth yt abydeth euerlastyng lyfe whych sone man shal geue hym hath god father sealed sayde vnto hym shall myght worke workes god iesus answered sayd vnto thys worke god ye beleue hym set sayd vnto hym math marc b ioh c token doest thou may se beleue ye workest thou father haue eaten breade ye wyldernesse wrytten exodi psal c gaue breade heauen eate sayd iesus vnto verely verely saye vnto moses gaue breade heauen father geueth true breade heauen true breade came downe heaue geueth lyfe vnto worlde sayd vnto hym ioh b syr geue v alwaye thys breade iesus sayd vnto breade lyfe commeth vnto shall honger yt beleueth shall thyrst euer haue sayde vnto ye haue sene haue beleued father geueth vnto commeth vnto hym shal come vnto shall caste forth come downe heauen shall wyll luce hys wyll sente ioh c thys father wyll sente hath geuen shuld lese ought rayse vp agayn last daye thys father wyll whyche sente ioha c seyth sonne beleueth hym maye haue lyfe euerlastynge shall rayse hym last daye murmured iewes dyd say lyuyng breade whyche came downe heauen sayde math g thys iosephs sonne whose father mother knowe howe sayeth thys come downe heauen answered iesus sayd vnto murmure amonge math c ioha g tessa noman come vnto wythout father hath sente shal drawe hym shall rayse hym agayne last daye wrytten prophetes esa c iere f math luce c shall apte taught god euery one hath herde father hath learned commeth vnto deu b c ony man hath sene father saue god ye hath sene father verely verely saye vnto ioha e ioha bhe beleueth hath lyfe euerlastynge breade lyfe father haue eaten manna desert dead thys breade comynge downe heauen yf ony man shall eate dye lyuynge breade whyche ame come downe heauen yf ony man shal eate thys bread shall lyue euer breade luce shall geue lyfe worlde flesh stroue iewes amonge themselues sayenge geue v hys flesh eate sayd iesus vnto verely verely saye vnto excepte ye shall eate fleshe sonne man drynke hys bloude ye shal haue lyfe eateth fleshe drynketh bloude hath lyfe euerlastyng shal rayse hym vp agayne last daye fleshe meate dede bloude drynke dede ioha b eateth fleshe drynketh bloude abydeth hym lyuynge father hath sente lyue father sake eateth shall also lyue sake thys breade come downe heauen father dyd eate manna dead eateth thys breade shal lyue euer thynges sayd synagoge teachynge capernau many therfore hys disciple hearyng thys sayd thys harde sayenge heare iesus knowynge hymselfe hys disciple dyd murmure sayd vnto doth thys offende yf ye shall se sonne man math f actu b go vp fyrste sprete quyckeneth fleshe profyteth nothynge wordes haue spoken vnto sprete lyfe ther beleue iesus dyd knowe begynnynge whyche beleuynge shulde betraye sayd therfore sayde vnto ioha c noman come vnto wythout geuen hym father tyme forth wente many hys disciple backe dyd walke wyth hym tha said iesus vnto twelfe wyll ye also go awaye answered hym simon peter math c lorde whome shall go thou hast wordes euerlastynge lyfe beleue haue knowen thou arte christ sonne god iesus answered vnto haue chose twelfe ioha b one deuell spake iudas simon iscariots sonne ioha shulde betraye hym one twelfe vii chapter thys wente iesus aboute galile wolde walke iewry iewes soughte slaye hym ye iewes leui feast tabernacle hade sayd hys brother vnto hym get hence go iewry thy disciple also may se thy workes thou doest noman doeth ought secrete seketh hymselfe knowen openly yf thou doest thynges shewe thyselfe vnto worlde hys brethre dyd beleue hym nother tha sayd iesus vnto tyme yet come tyme alway ready ioh bthe world ca hate sap c hateth testifye yt workes euel go ye vp feast wyll go vp vnto tyme yet fulfylled whan sayd thys abode galile whan hys brother gone vp wente vp also ye feast openly secrete sought iewes hym feaste sayd ioha f ther great murmure amoge people hym sayde math ioha b good sayd myscaryeth ye people ioh f noma spake openly hym feare iewes myddest feast iesus went vp temple taught iewes maruayled sayeng scripture seynge hath learned iesus answered sayd doctrine myne hys sente wyll hys wyll shall knowe ye doctrine whether god whether speake myselfe speaketh hymselfe seketh hys owne prayse seketh hys prayse sente hym true ther vnryghteousnesse hym exo c le e hath moses geue lawe noman kepeth lawe ye seke slaye people answered said thou hast deuell seketh slaye iesus answered sayde vnto ioha haue done one worke ye al maruayle moses therfore gaue circumcision moses gene b father vpon sabbat ye circumcyse man yf receaue circumcision vpon sabbat ye lawe moses disanulled disdayne ye haue made man whole euery whyt vpo sabbat deut iudge ye vtter appearaunce iudge ryghteous iudgement sayde ierusalem thys whome seke slaye beholde speaketh openly saye nothynge hym ruler know dede yt christ math g luce c know whece whan christ shal come man shall knowe whece tha cryed iesus teachyng temple sayenge ye knowe whece ye know ioha b come selfe true sente whome ye knowe knowe hym yf shall saye know shalbe lyar like knowe hym hym hath sente luce b ioha b soughte take hym noman layed handes hym hys houre yet come ioha c e many people beleued hym sayd whan christe shall come shall miracle doth pharises herde people murmurynge thys reg math b marc b luce c ruler pharises sente seruauntes shulde take iesus sayd iesus vnto ioha b yet lytle whyle wyth go hym sent iere c ioha b ye shall seke fynde ca ye come sayde iewes amonge selues shall go shall fynde hym wyll go amonge gentyles lye scattered teach ye ge tils sayenge thys sayeth ye shall seke fynde ye come laste moost solemne daye feast stode iesus cryed sayenge esaye thyrsteth let hym come vnto drynke beleueth sayeth scripture hys belly shal flowe floudes esai ioel f ioha b lyuynge water sayd actu sprete beleuynge hym shulde receaue holy goost yet geuen iesus yet glorifyed whan many company herde hys sayenges sayd mat b e luce b ioh b b b thys truely prophete sayd mat c ioh g thys christ sayd ioh e doth christ come galile doth scripture saye christ commeth psa b dauids sede towne mich math bethleem therfore ther debate amonge ye people hys sake math e marci c luce ioh b wolde haue taken hym noman layed handes hym came seruautes ye hygh prestes pharises said vnto haue ye brought hym seruautes answered neuer man spake thys man doth answered pharises ye also myscaryed ioh f cor dhath ony ruler beleued hym pharises thys comune people knowe ye lawe cursed ioh nicodemus said vnto yt came vnto hym nyght one exodi leui doth lawe iudge man wythout haue fyrst herde hymselfe haue knowen doth answered sayd vnto hym art thou also galilean ioha search scripture se ther aryseth prophete galile euery man returned vnto hys house viii chapter iesus math b marc b wente vnto mounte oliuete early mornynge came agayne temple people came hym syttynge taught scribe pharises brought woman taken aduoutry set myddest sayd vnto hym mayster thys woman nowe taken aduowtry hath moses leui lawe comaunded v stone suche sayest thou therfore thys sayd temptynge hym myght accuse hym iesus stoupynge downewarde dyd wryte ye groude wyth hys fynger wha continued axynge hym lyft hymselfe vp sayd vnto yt wythout synne let hym throwe fyrst stone bowyng hymselfe agayne wrote vppon groude hearynge thynges went one another begynnynge ye eldest iesus remayned alone woman standynge myddest iesus lyftynge hymselfe vp sayde vnto woman yt dyd accuse ye hath noma codened ye said noman lord iesus sayd nother shal codene ye go thy waye ioh b synne heceforth nomore ioha e spake iesus agayne vnto sayenge ioha e lyght worlde followeth doth walke darkenesse shall haue lyght lyfe sayd vnto hym pharises thou bearest recorde thy selfe thy recorde true iesus answered sayd vnto ioha c though beare recorde myselfe yet recorde true ioha c knowe whence come whether go ioha ye knowe whence come whether go ye iudge fleshe iudge noman yf iudge iudgemet true alone father sent lawe wrytten deut c wytnesse two men true beare wytnesse selfe math b ioha ye father yt sente beareth wytnesse tha sayd vnto hym thy father iesus answered math e luce c ioha c ye know nother father yf ye knewe ye shulde happely knowe father also wordes spake iesus vpon god cheste teachynge temple ioha c noman toke hym hys houre yet come tha sayd iesus agayne vnto ioha go waye ye shall seke ye shall dye synnes go ye come sayd ye iewes wyl kyl himselfe sayeth go ye come said vnto ye beneth aboue ye thys worlde worlde therfore haue sayd vnto ye shal dye synnes math b ioha c f ioha yf ye shall beleue ye shal dye synne sayd vnto hym art thou iesus sayd vnto begynnynge whych also speake vnto haue many thynges speake iudge sente true speake world ioh bthose thynges haue herde hym knew called god hys father sayde iesus vnto whan ye num b ioha b shal lyfte vp sonne man ioh shal ye knowe nothynge ioh b f father hath taught thynges speake hath sente wyth hath lefte alone alway thynges yt please hym spake ioha c many beleued hym sayd iesus vnto iewes yt beleued hym yf ye shall abyde worde ye shalbe disciple ye shal knowe truth truthe rom b gala shal delyuer answered vnto hym sede abraham neuer serued ony man howe sayest thou ye shalbe fre iesus answered verely verely saye vnto rom b pet euery man doeth synne seruaunte synne seruaunt abydeth house euer sonne abydeth foreuer yf sone therfore delyuer ye shalbe fre dede know ye abrahas chyldren ye seke kyl worde hath hold speake haue sene father ye ye haue sene father answered sayd vnto hym abraham father iesus sayeth vnto yf ye chyldren abraham ye workes abraham ye seke slaye hath told truth ioh c b whyche haue herde god dyd abraha ye father workes sayd borne fornicacion haue father euen god sayd iesus vnto yf god father tha wold ye surely loue proceded come god come selfe hath sente ye know spech euen ye hear worde ye father ye deuell hys desyres wyll ye gene ioh b murtherer begynnynge dyd abyde truth ther truth hym whan speaketh lye speaketh hys owne lyar father yf tell truth ye beleue rebuke synne yf tell truth wherfore ye beleue ioh ioh ahe god heareth wordes god therfore heare ye ye god tha answered iewes sayd saye ryght thou arte samaritane ioh b hast deuel iesus answered haue deuel honoure father ye haue dishonoured seke myne owne prayse ther one doth seke iudgeth ioha cverely saye vnto yf ony kepe word shall se death euer sayd iewes knowe math c marc b ioha bthat thou hast deuell abraham dead prophetes thou sayest yf ony kepe worde shall se death euer arte thou greater father abraham whome doest thou make thy selfe iesus answered ioha c yf prayse selfe prayse nothynge father prayseth whyche ye say god ye haue knowe hym haue knowe hym yf saye knowe hym shalbe lyar lyke knowe hym kepe hys worde abraham father glad myght se daye gene hebr c sawe reioyced sayd ye iewes thou art yet fyftye yeare olde hast thou sene abraham iesus sayd vnto verely verely say vnto euer abraham ex ci ioh toke vp stone cast hym luce iesus hyd selfe went temple ix chapter iesus goynge sawe man blynde hys byrth disciple axed hym mayster hath synned elder yt borne blynde iesus answered nother thys synned hys elder ioha yt workes god shulde shewed hym ioh b muste worke ye work hym yt hath set whyle day nyght cometh wha noma worke longe ye worlde ioha b lyghte worlde whan sayd spitted vpo ye earth made clay ye spatle straked claye vpo hys eye sayd vnto hym go thy waye washe poole esaie b siloe interpreted sente tha wente washed hym came seynge hys neghboures sene begger afore sayd thys yt sat begged sayd sayde lyke hym sayd sayd vnto hym thyn eye opened answered man called iesus made claye anoynted myne eye sayd vnto go poole siloe washe wente washed se sayd vnto hym sayd tell brought ye pharises hym ben blynde math marci c luce c ioh b sabbat wha iesus made claye opened hys eye axed pharises hym agayne sawe sayd vnto put claye vpon myne eye washed se sayde pharises thys man god whych kepeth sabbat sayd ioh b bhow synfull man token ther diuision amonge sayd vnto blynde sayest thou hym hath opened thyne eye sayd ioha prophete dyd iewes beleue hym ben blynde sawe tyll dyd call elder hym sawe axed sayeng sonne whome ye saye borne blynde doth se hys elder answered sayd knowe oure sonne borne blynde doth se tell hath opened hys eyen tell axe hymselfe hath age ynough let hym speake hymselfe thys sayd hys elder feared ye iewes ioh f iewes conspyred already yf ony man dyd confesse hym christ shuld excomunicate therfore sayd hys elder hath age ynough axe hym called man agayne bene blynde sayd vnto hym iosue actu geue glory vnto god know thys man synner sayd vnto whether synner ca tell one thynge knowe blynde nowe se sayd vnto hym dyd vnto howe opened thyne eye answered told euen ye herde wil ye heare agayne wyll ye also become hys disciple cursed hym sayd thou hys disciple moses disciple knowe ye god hath spoke vnto moses knowe whence thys man answered sayd vnto maruaylous thynge yt ye knowe whence hath opened myne eye knowe god doth heare synners yf ony man seruer god doth hys wyll hym doth heare herde sence worlde beganne ony man dyd open eye one borne blynde yf god could ought answered sayde vnto hym thou arte altogether borne synne doest thou teach v cast hym iesus herde caste hym whan founde hym sayd vnto hym doest thou beleue ye sone man answerd sayd lorde may beleue hym iesus sayd vnto hym math f marc g ioha dthou hast sene hym speaketh wyth said lorde beleue fallynge downe worshipped hym iesus sayd vnto hym come iudgement thys worlde yt whych se maye se se maye made blynde pharises wyth hym herde sayd vnto hym also blynde iesus sayd vnto ioha c yf ye blynde ye shulde haue synne ye say se therfore doth synne remayne x chapter verely verely saye vnto entreth shepefolde dore goeth vp another waye thefe murtherer goeth dore shepeherde shepe vnto hym openeth porter ioha shepe heare hys voyce pro c calleth hys owne shepe name leadeth forth whan hath sente hys owne shepe goeth hem shepe followe hym knowe hys voyce straunger followe flye hym knowe voyce straungers thys prouerbe spake iesus vnto knewe spake vnto sayd iesus agayne vnto verely verely say vnto yt dore shepe many come theues murtherers shepe herde ioha dore soeuer goeth shalbe saued shall go shall fynde pasture thefe commeth saue maye steale kyll destroy come maye haue lyfe haue abudautly ezech mich good shepeherd good shepeherde geueth hys lyfe hys shepe hyrelyng shepeherde whose owne shepe seyth wolfe co mynge leaueth shepe flyeth wolfe catcheth scattereth shepe hyrelynge flyeth hyred seruaunte careth shepe good shepeherde tim b know shepe shepe knowe math luce ca father knoweth knowe father mar leaue lyfe shepe haue shepe thys folde must also brynge shal heare voyce ther shalbe one folde one shepeherd therfore doth father loue leaue lyfe take agayne noman taketh leaue haue power leaue haue power take agayne comaudemet haue receaued father ther dissencion agayne amonge iewes wordes math marc c many sayd hath deuel mad ye heare hym said ioh c b wordes one hauynge deuell deuel ope eye blynde mac bthe dedicacion ierusalem wynter iesus walked temple reg salomon porche compassed hym iewes sayd vnto hym loge doest thou kepe v doute yf thou art christ tell v openly iesus answered speake vnto ye beleue ioha workes father name beare record ye beleue ye shepe shepe heare voyce knowe follow geue euerlastynge lyfe shall peryshe euer noman shall take hande father gaue greater noman able take father hande ioha ci father one ioha c toke iewes vp stone agayne myght stone hym iesus answered haue shewed many good workes fro father ye whych worke ye stone iewes answered stone good worke ioh bbut blasphemy seynge thou arte man thou makest thyself god iesus answered wrytten lawe psal haue sayd ye goddes yf cal goddes vnto whome worde god happened scripture disanulled ye saye math g marc g luce e thou blasphemest vnto hym ye father hath halowed sente ye worlde sayd ye sone god ioh c yf father workes beleue yf yf ye wyll beleue beleue workes ye may knowe beleue father father math marc ioha b therfore soughte take hym escaped theyr handes wente agayne beyonde iordane vnto place ioh c ihon fyrst baptysynge abode many came hym sayde ihon dyd miracle ioha ihon spake thys man true many beleued hym xi chapter ther one sycke called lazarus bethany towne mary martha hys systers luce mary anoynted lorde wyth oyntement dryed fete wyth hyr heere whose brother lazarus sycke sente hys systers vnto hym sayenge lorde beholde whome thou louest sycke iesus hearyng sayde vnto thys syckenesse vnto death glorye god ioh sonne god maye thereby glorifyed iesus loued martha hyr syster mary lazarus whan herde sycke abode place two dayes afterwarde sayde vnto hys disciple let v go agayne iewry disciple sayde vnto hym ioh c c c mayster iewes sought lately stone goest thou thether agayne iesus answered hath daye twelfe houres yf ony man shall walke daye doth stomble seyth ye lyght thys worlde yf walke ye nyghte stombleth ther lyghte hym thys sayde thys sayeth vnto lazarus frende math c marc e luce f slepeth go rayse fro slepe sayd hys disciple lorde yf slepe shalbe safe iesus spake hys death thought spoke bodely slepe therfore sayde iesus openly vnto lazarus deade ame glad youre sake ye maye beleue let v go hym sayd thomas ioh whych surnamed didymus vnto ye fellowe disciple let v go also let v dye wyth hym came iesus fande hym hauynge lyen foure dayes graue bethany nye ierusalem aboute fyfte ne furlonges many iewes come martha mary comforte ouer theyr brother wha martha tha herde iesus dyd come met hym mary sat home tha sayd martha vnto iesus ioh lord yf yu haddest brother ben deade yet know yt soeuer yu shalt requyre god god shal geue yt iesus sayeth thy brother shall ryse agayne martha sayd vnto hym know shall ryse agayne ye resurreccion last daye iesus sayeth vnto resurreccion ioha lyfe ioh b f rom beleueth though dead shal lyue euery one lyueth beleueth shal dye euer doest thou beleue thys sayde vnto hym yee lorde haue beleued thou arte christ sone lyuynge god art come thys worlde wha sayd thys wente hir waye called hir syster mary secretly sayeng master calleth wha herde rose quyckely came vnto hym iesus yet come towne yet place martha met hym iewes house wyth comforted whan sawe mary rose quyckely wente forth followed sayenge goeth graue maye wepe whan mary came iesus seynge hym fell hys fete sayeth vnto hym ioha e lorde yf thou haddest ben brother shulde haue dyed whan iesus dyd se wepynge iewes come wyth groned sprete troubled hymselfe sayde haue ye layed hym saye vnto hym lorde come se luce iesus wepte sayde iewes beholde loued hym sayde coulde ioh awhych opened eye ye blynde borne haue made shulde haue dyed came iesus graue gronyng agayne hymself caue stone layed theron iesus sayd take awaye stone martha hys syster yt dead sayd lorde stynketh hath lyen foure dayes iesus sayd vnto sayd vnto yf thou beleuest thou shalte se ye glorye god toke awaye stone iesus eye beyng lyfte vpwarde sayd father thake thou hast herde knew thou hearest alwayes ioha dbut people whyche standeth aboute haue sayde maye beleue thou hast sente whan sayde thys cryed wyth loude voyce lazarus come forth ioh c strayght way came forth dead bounde hande foote wyth graue clothes hys face boude wyth napkyn iesus sayd vnto lowse hym let hym go ioh c many iewes therfore whych came mary martha sene done beleued hym wente pharises tolde thynges iesus done psal math marc luce tha gathered hygh prestes pharises councell sayd ac b thys man doth many token yf leaue hym men shall beleue hym dani romaynes shall come shall take awaye oure place people one name caiphas hygh prest yeare said vnto ye knowe nothynge nother consydre ioh b behoueth one man dye people people perysh thys sayde hymselfe much hygh preste yeare prophecyed iesus dye people people shulde gather together chyldre god whyche scattered abrode mat b marc ioh dtherfore dyd ymagyne day forth might slaye hym thys cause walked iesus openly amonge iewes wente contry ye deserte ytie called ephrem abode wyth hys disciple iewes easter hande many contrye wente vp ierusalem easter purifye themselues soughte iesus spake together standynge temple ioha thynke ye commeth vnto feast ioha c hygh prestes pharises geuen commau demente yf ony shal know shulde shewe myght take hym xii chapter syxe math marc luce dayes easter came iesus vnto bethany lazarus whome iesus raysed vp agayne ben dead dyd make hym supper martha serued lazarus one sat borde wyth hym luce dthan toke mary poude oyntmente pure costly nardus anoynted iesus fete dryed hys fete wyth hyr heere house fylled wyth sauoure oyntemente sayde one hys disciple iudas iscariot shulde betraye hym thys oyntmente solde thre hundreth penny geuen poore thys sayd cared poore thefe ioha c hauyng purse caryed geuen sayde iesus let alone maye kepe vntyll daye buryall ye haue alwayes poore wyth haue ye alwaye much people iewes hadde knowlege came onely iesus sake shulde se lazarus ioh cwhome raysed ye dead hygh prestes aduysed put lazarus death also many iewes went beleued iesus hys sake math marc luce c morowe much people come feaste whan herde iesus came ierusalem toke braunches palmes wente mete hym cryed hosanna psal c blessed commeth name lorde kynge israel iesus fande yonge asse sat thereon wytten esaie c zach b feare thou doughter sion behold thy kynge commeth syttynge vpon ass foale thys knewe hys disciple fyrste whan iesus glorifyed remembred thynges wrytten hym done suche thynges vnto hym people wyth hym whan called lazarus ye graue raysed hym deade testifyed hym therfore met people hym herd hym haue done myracle sayde pharises amonge themselues se ye preuayle nothynge beholde whole world gone hym reg f actu c ther heythen amonge ioh e come vp praye feaste came philippe whych bethsaida galile prayed hym sayenge syr wolde se iesus philippe came tolde andrewe agayne andrewe philippe tolde vnto iesus iesus answered sayeng ioh houre come sonne must glorifyed verely verely saye vnto esai c cor excepte ye wheat corne fallynge grounde deade abydeth alone yf deade bryngeth much frute math marc e luce c loueth hys lyfe shall lose hateth hys lyfe thys worlde shal kepe vnto lyfe euerlastyng serueth let hym followe shall minister also yf ony man shall serue father shall honoure hym math marc luce c nowe soule heuy shall saye father saue thys houre therfore ame come thys houre father make thy name gloryous came ther voyce heauen sayeng haue glorifyed wyll glorifye agayne people stode herde sayd haue thondered sayd ioha angell hath spoken vnto hym iesus answered sayde thys voyce come sake youre sake iudgement thys worlde nowe shall prince thys worlde cast ioh b cand whan shalbe lyfte vp earth shall drawe thynges selfe sayd sygnifye death shuld dye people answered hym psal esai b deut c math haue herde lawe christe abydeth euer sayest thou sonne man muste lyfted vp thys sonne man sayd iesus vnto ephe tessa alyght yet lytle whyle walke whyle ye haue ye lyght darknesse catch walketh darknesse woteth goeth longe ye haue lyght ioh b beleue lyght ye may chyldren lyght thys sayd iesus went hyd hymselfe though done great miracle beleued ye worde esaye myght fulfylled whych sayd esaye rom c lorde hath beleued preachynge vnto arme lord declared therfore coulde beleue cause esaye sayde agayne esa b hath blynded theyr eyen hath hardened theyr harte se wt theyr eyen vnderstande wyth theyr harte turned heale thys spake esaye whan sawe hys glorye spake hym ioha cneuerthelesse many ruler dyd also beleue ye pharises wold acknowe ioha c yt shulde thrust synagoge ioha loued prayse men tha prayse god iesus cryed said beleueth beleueth hym sent seyth seyth hym sente ioha c b come lyght worlde euery man beleueth abyde darkenesse yf ony man heare wordes kepe iudge ioha c come shulde iudge worlde shulde saue worlde yt despyseth receaueth wordes hath one iudgeth hym deut c word haue spoken shall iudge hym last daye ioh b haue spoken selfe father sente hath geuen commaundement shall saye shall speake knowe hys commaundement lyfe euerlastynge thynges speake therfore speake father hath sayde vnto xiii chapter iesus knowynge ye feaste easter hys houre come shulde passe thys worlde vnto father whan loued hys worlde loued vntyll ende supper beynge done math marc b luce awhan deuel put ye harte iudas iscariot simon sonne shuld betraye hym knowynge father math luce c geuen hym al thynges hys hades ioh come forth god goeth vnto god riseth supper layeth downe hys clothes wha taken towell gyrded hymselfe put water base beganne washe hys disciple fete drye wyth ye towel gyrded aboute came simon peter peter sayd vnto hym math b lorde doest thou wash fete iesus answered sayd vnto canst thou tell nowe thou shalte knowe afterwarde peter sayeth vnto hym thou shalte neuer wash fete iesus answered vnto hym yf shall psal wash thou shalt haue parte wyth simon peter sayd vnto lorde myfete also handes ye head iesus sayth vnto hym washen nedeth washe fete clene euery whytte ye clene ioha g knewe shulde trayt hym therfore sayd ye clene washen theyr fete toke hys clothes whan set agayne borde sayd vnto wote ye haue done vnto ye call mayster lorde ye saye well yf lorde mayster haue washen youre fete ye oughte also washe one anothers fete ephes pet c haue geuen ensample lyke haue done vnto may ye also verely verely saye vnto math c luce io seruaunt greater hys lorde messaunger greater sent yf ye knowe thynges math happye shall ye yf ye speake knowe whome haue chosen yt scripture maye fulfylled psal b yt eateth breade wt hath lyfte vp hys hele agaynste ioha c henceforth tel done yt wha done ye maye beleue math marc luce b verely verely say receaueth sende receaueth yt receaueth receaueth hym sente whan iesus sayd thys troubled sprete testifyed sayde math b marc c luce verely verely saye vnto ioh c actu one shal betraye loked disciple ech vpon doutynge whome spake ther one hys disciple leanynge iesus bosome ioha awhome iesus loued beckened vnto hym simon peter sayd vnto shuld axe whome speaketh wha therfore leaned vpon iesus bosome sayd vnto hym lorde iesus answered vnto whome shall geue ye dypped bread whan dypped bread gaue vnto iudas iscariot simon sonne morsell eaten satan dyd entre hym iesus sayeth vnto hym thou doest quickelye none sat borde dyd knowe sayd vnto hym thought ioha abecause iudas bagges hadde sayd bye thynges nede feaste shulde geue somthynge poore whan hadde receaued morsell wente forth strayght waye nyght whan therfore gone forth iesus sayd ioh c sonne man glorifyed god glorifyed hym yf god glorifyed hym god shall also glorifyed himselfe shal straight waye glorifye hym deare chyldre yet lytle whyle wyth ioha b ye shall seke told iewes go ye come saye vnto geue ioh b new commaundement ye loue eche haue loued loue ye amonge selues ioh bby shal al men know ye disciple yf ye haue loue one another simon peter sayd vnto hym lord whether goest thou iesus answered go canst thou follow ioh thou shalte followe afterwarde peter sayd vnto hym math c marc c luc c wherfore followe wyll yeoparde lyfe iesus answered vnto hym wylte thou yeoparde thy lyfe verely verely saye vnto ioh c cocke shall crowe vntyll thou hast denyed thryse xiiii chapter sayd vnto hys disciple let hart troubled yf ye beleue god beleue also father house many dwellynges yf wolde haue told go prepare place vnto yf shall go prepare place come agayne shall take myselfe yt ye also maye ioh b whether go ye tel waye ye know thomas sayd vnto lorde tell whether thou goest ca knowe way iesus sayeth vnto hym waye truthe ioha cthe lyfe ioh noman commeth ye father yf ye knowen ye shulde haue knowen father also ye knowe hym ye haue sene hym philip sayde vnto hym lorde shewe v father suffiseth v iesus sayeth vnto hym thus longe wyth haue ye knowen philippe seyth seyth also father sayest thou shew v father beleuest thou ioh cthat father father ioha b c f wordes whyche speake vnto speake selfe father abydynge doth workes beleue ye father father el beleue workes themselues verely verely saye vnto beleueth workes shal also shall greater go father math c marci c ioha c euer ye shall axe father name shall father maye praysed sonne yf ye axe ony thynge name wyll yf ye loue kepe commaundementes shall praye father shal sende another comforter may abyde wyth foreuer sprete truth whome worlde receaue seyth hym knoweth ye shal knowe shall abyde wyth shalbe math c wyll leaue comfort lesse wyll come vnto yet lytle whyle worlde seyth nomore ioh b c b ye se lyue ye shall lyue also daye shall ye knowe father ioha ioha ahe hath commaundementes kepeth loueth loueth shalbe loued father shal loue hym shall shewe selfe vnto hym actu c iudas sayd vnto iscariot lorde cause thou shalte shewe thy selfe vnto v vnto ye world iesus answered sayd vnto hym yf ony loueth shal kepe worde father shall loue hym shall come hym make dwellyng place wyth hym loueth kepeth sayenges ioha e b c f worde ye haue herde myne father whych hath sent thynges haue spoken vnto abydyng wt comforter ye holy goost actu tim awhome father shal sende name io b shall teach thynges shall brynge reme braunce thynges shal haue tolde peace leaue vnto geue peace vnto geue vnto world geueth let harte troubled nother feare ye haue herde sayde vnto go come vnto yf ye loued ye shuld reioyce go father father greater ioh b tell happen yt whan shalbe done ye may beleue wyl talke much wyth ioha prynce thys worlde cometh hath nothynge yt worlde maye knowe loue father father hath geuen ye commaundemente aryse let v go hence xv chapter ye true eccli vyne father ye husbandman euery braunch bryngynge forthe frute shal take awaye euery one bryngeth forthe frute shall clense maye brynge frute ye ioha b actu b clene worde haue spoken vnto abyde ye braunche brynge forth frute hymselfe wythout abyde vyne euen ye nother wythout ye abyde vyne ye braunches abydeth hym bryngeth forth muche frute wythout ye nothynge abydeth shalbe caste braunche shall wyther shall gather hym cast hym ye fyre burneth math yf ye shall abyde memarci c ioha b c wordes shall abyde ye shal axe euer ye wyl shalbe done vnto father praised ye bring forth much frute become disciple father hath loued euen haue loued continue loue ioha b yf ye shall kepe co maundementes ye shal abyde loue eue also haue kepte father commaundementes abyde hys loue thynges haue sayd vnto ioye maye abyde ioye may perfecte ioha ioha c comau demente ye loue together haue loued noman hath greater loue thys namely set hys
