lyfe hys frendes math e ye frendes yf ye shall thynges commaunde ephe c wyll call seruauntes seruaunte knoweth hys mayster doth haue called frendes ioh c al euer herd father haue made knowen ye haue chosen ephes haue chosen set ye go collo brynge frute frute remayne euer ye shall axe father name maye geue thys commaunde ye loue together ioha b yf worlde hate knowe ye hath hated yf ye ben world worlde wolde loue hys ye ye world haue chosen fro ye worlde therfore doth worlde hate call mynde worde sayd vnto math c luce ioha b seruaunt greater hys lorde yf haue persecuted shall persecute also yf haue kept worde shall kepe also ioha abut thynges shall vnto mynames sake knowe hym sente yf come spoken vnto shulde haue synne haue excusacion theyr synne hateth hateth father also ioha yf done workes amonge ye whych none hath done shuld haue synne haue sene haue hated father thys commeth sayenge fulfylled whych spoke theyr law psal c haue hated wythout cause whan coforter shal come ioha c actu awhome shall sende father sprete truth procedeth father shall beare wytnesse actu ye shall beare wytnesse also ye wyth begynnynge xvi chapter thynges haue sayd vnto yt ye shulde offended math b luce b shall excomunicate act yee houre cometh euery man ye putteth death shal thynke seruyce vnto god ioha c cor suche thinges shal vnto knewe ye father ioh b cbut thinges haue told wha ye houre shal come ye may remebre ye haue tolde thynges dyd tel begynnynge wt go hym ye sente man axeth whether goest thou tolde thynges heuynes hath fylled hart tel ye truth expedient go yf go comforter shall come vnto yf shall go ioh c c shall sende hym vnto wha shal come shal rebuke worlde synne ryghteousnesse iudgemet synne verely haue beleued righteousnes go father ye shal se iudgemet ioh prince thys world iudged haue yet many thiges say vnto ye beare whan ye sprete truth shall come ioha che shall teache al truth ioha f shal speake hymselfe euer shal heare shall speake thynges come shall shewe shall glorifye shall receaue myne shewe math luc c ioha c thynges father hath myne therfore sayde shall receaue myne shewe ioh yet lytle whyle nowe ye shall se agayne lytle whyle ye shall se go father sayde hys disciple eche sayeth vnto v yet lytle whyle ye shall se agayne lytle whyle ye shall se go father therfore sayde sayeth lytle whyle knowe sayeth knewe iesus wolde axe hym sayd vnto ye enquyre thys amonge sayde yet lytle whyle ye shall se agayne lytle whyle ye shall se verely verely say vnto ye shall wepe lamente worlde shall reioyce shalbe sory ioha c sorowe shalbe turned ioye esa c woman whan trauayleth hath sorowe hir houre commeth whan delyuered chylde remembreth anguysh nomore ioye man borne ye world ye also haue sorowe shall se agayne youre harte shall reioyce noman shall take ioye awaye daye shall ye axe nothynge math c marci c luce b ioha b verely verely say vnto yf ye shall axe father ought name shal geue hetherto haue ye axed nothynge name axe ye shall receaue ioye maye full thynges haue spoken vnto math marc prouerbes neuerthelesse houre commeth whan shall nowe speake prouerbes vnto shall shewe openly father daye shall ye axe name saye vnto shall praye father father hymselfe loueth ye loued haue beleued ioh b come forth god ame come oute god father came ye worlde agayne leaue worlde go father hys disciple saye vnto hym behold talkest thou openly speakest prouerbe ioha c nowe sure thou knowest thynges nede ony man axe hereby beleue thou arte come fro god iesus answerd beleue ye beholde zach b math c mac houre commeth come ye shalbe scattred euery man hys owne ye shall leaue alone ioha b yet ame alone ye father wyth thynges haue spoken vnto ye may haue rom peace ye shall haue trouble worlde good chere haue ouercome worlde xvii chapter thys sayd iesus hys eye lyfted vp heauen said ioha c father ye houre come glorify thy sone thy sonne glorifye thou hast ioha b geuen hym power flesh vnto thou haste geuen hym maye geue lyfe euerlastyng ioha thys lyfe euerlastyng knowe onely true god whome thou haste sente iesus christ haue glorifyed vpo earth haue ioha c tim fynyshed ye worke thou haste geuen shulde nowe father gloryfye thou thyselfe wyth glorye hadde worlde made haue declared thy name vnto ye men thou gauest fro ye worlde thyne thou gauest vnto haue kept word knowe thou hast geuen ioha wordes thou gauest haue geue haue receaued knowen truth come forth haue beleued thou hast sente praye praye ioh c worlde thou gauest thyne myne thyne thyn myne glorifyed nowe worlde ye worlde come vnto holy father saue thy name thou esaye gauest maye one wha wyth kepte thy name thou gauest haue kept ioh none peryshed saue ye sonne perdicio psal b scripture myghte fulfylled nowe come vnto thys speake worlde maye haue ioye fulfylled haue geuen thy worde ye world sap c ioha bhated worlde also worlde praye thou take worlde math b yt thou kepe euell world also worlde halowe truth thy worde truth ioh c yu hast sent worlde haue also sente worlde theyr sake sactify selfe maye also sanctifyed truth neuerthelesse praye also shall beleue thorowe theyr worde one thou father also gala done v worlde may beleue thou hast sent glorye thou gauest haue geuen may one also one thou maye perfecte one worlde may know thou hast sente haue loued thou hast loued ioha c father wyll whome thou hast geue also wyth maye se glorye thou hast geuen thou hast loued creacion worlde ryghteous father math c ioh c worlde hath knowen haue knowe haue knowen thou hast set haue declared thy name vnto shall declare loue wherwyth thou hast loued xviii chapter whan iesus hadde spoken wordesmath marc l c c wente forth wyth hys disciple beyonde broke cedro ther garden whych entred hys disciple iudas whyche betrayed hym knewe place also iesus resorted thyther ofte wyth hys disciple math marc c luce whan iudas hadde taken bende men mynisters ye hygh prestes pharises came thyther wyth lanternes creshettes weapens iesus knowynge al thynges come vpon hym wente forth sayd vnto ye seke answered hym iesus nazareth iesus sayeth vnto iudas betrayed hym stode also wyth whan sayd vnto wente backwarde fell ye groude axed agayn ye seke sayd iesus nazareth iesus answered haue told yf ye therfore seke let go ye word might fulfylled sayd ioha b yu gauest haue lost none dyd simon peter hauynge aswearde drawe smote hygh prestes seruaunte cut hys ryght eare seruaunt called malchus sayd iesus vnto peter put vp swearde sheeth cuppe father hath geuen wylt thou yt drynke math c marc f luce dyd bende men captayne seruauntes iewes take iesus boude hym brought anna fyrste father lawe caiphas whyche hygh prest ye yeare caiphas ioh e yt geue iewes ye cousel behoueth one dye ye people simo peter disciple followed iesus ye disciple acquainted wt hygh prest went wt iesu ye palace ye hygh prest peter stode wythout dore wente forth disciple whyche acquaynted wyth ye hygh prest sayd vnto damesel yt kept ye dore brought peter sayd porteresse vnto peter art thou thys man disciple sayd seruau te officer stode fyre made cole colde warmed peter also stadynge wyth warmynge hym axed hygh preste iesus hys disciple hys doctrine iesus answered hym ioh b haue spoke openly vnto worlde haue alwaye taught synagoge temple ye iewes come together haue spoke nothynge secrete axest thou axe haue herde haue sayd vnto beholde knowe haue sayd iere mat g ct whan sayd thynges one officer standynge smote iesus ye face saynge answerest thou ye hygh prest iesus answered yf haue spoken euel beare wytnesse euel yf haue spoken wel smytest thou anna sente hym bounde caiphas hygh prest math g marc g luce dand simon peter stadynge warmyng hym sayd vnto hym art thou also one hys disciple denyed sayd one hygh prestes seruautes ye cosin whose eare peter dyd cut sayd dyd se garden wyth hym denyed peter agayne ioh forthwyth dyd cocke crowe math marci luc broughte iesus caiphas comune hall mornyng theselues entred comune hal yt shulde defyled myght eate easterlambe therfore wente pilate forth vnto sayd accusacion brynge ye agaynst thys man answered sayd vnto hym yf none euell doer wolde haue delyuered hym vnto sayd pilate vnto take ye hym iudge hym lawe sayd iewes vnto hym lawful v put ony death worde iesus myght fulfylled whych ioh spake signifyeng death shuld dye math b marci luce tha entred pilate agayne commune hall called iesus said vnto hym arte thou kynge ye iewes iesus answered sayst thou thy self haue told pilate answered iewe thy people hygh prestes haue delyuered vnto hast thou done iesus answered kyngdome thys worlde yf kyngdome thys worlde mynisters wolde surely fyght shulde delyuered ye iewes ioh b kyngdome hence sayd pilate vnto hym arte thou kynge iesus answered thou sayest kyng born therfore therfore came worlde maye beare wytnesse vnto truthe euerye one truth heareth voyce pilate sayeth vnto hym truth whan sayd went forth agayne vnto iewes sayeth vnto math c marc b luc b fynde cause hym mat b ye haue costume shal let lowse vnto one eastermarc luce wyl ye therfore let louse vnto kynge iewes cryed agayne sayenge thys barrabas yet barrabas murtherer xix chapter mat c marci b luce b toke pilate iesus scourged hym ye souldyers platyng crowne thornes set vpon hys heade put purple garmente aboute hym came hym sayde hayle kynge iewes smote hym face pilate went forth agayne sayd vnto beholde brynge hym forthe vnto ye maye knowe fynde cause went iesus forth bearynge crowne thornes purple garment sayeth vnto beholde man whan hyghe prestes mynisters hadde sene hym cryed sayenge crucifye crucifye hym pilate sayeth vnto take ye hym crucifye hym fynde cause hym iewes answered haue l ui c lawe lawe muste dye ioh b hath made hymselfe sonne god whan pilate herde thys sayeng feared wente agayne commune hall sayeth vnto iesu whence arte thou iesus gaue answere said pilate vnto doest thou speake vnto knowest thou yt haue power crucifye haue power let lowse iesus answered thou shuldest haue power agaynst wythout sap ioh rom geuen aboue therfore delyuered vnto hath synne tyme forth soughte pilate let hym lowse ye iewes cryed sayenge yf thou lettest thys man lowse thou arte emperours frende actu b whosoeuer maketh hymselfe kynge gaynsayeth ye emperoure math marci c luce b whan pilate herde wordes brought forth iesus sat vpon iudgemente seate place called pauemente hebrue gabbatha daye preparynge easter nearehande syxte houre sayeth vnto iewes beholde kynge cryed awaye wyth hym away wyth hym crucifye hym pilate sayeth vnto shall crucify kynge hygh prestes answered haue kyng ye emperour therfore toke hym vnto yt myght crucifyed luce c toke iesus led hym forth bearyng crosse hymselfe hebr c wet forth vnto place called place dead me skulles called hebrue golgotha wher crucifyed two wt one ether syde iesus myddes math marci c luce pilate wrote title also set vpo ye crosse ther wrytte iesus nazareth kynge ye iewes thys tytle dyd many ye iewes reade place iesus crucifyed neare ye cytie writte greke latine hebrue tha sayd hygh prestes vnto pilate wryte kynge iewes hath sayd kynge iewes pilate answered haue wrytten haue wrytten math marc cwhan souldyers crucifyed hym toke hys raymentes made foure partes vnto euery souldyer parte cote cote vnsowen wrought vpo thorow therfore sayde eche let v cut let v cast lotte therevpon shal haue scripture myght fulfylled sayeng psal b haue parted garmentes vnto themselues vpon raymente haue cast lotte thys dyd souldyers dede ther stode ye crosse iesus hys mother hys mother syster mary wyfe cleophe mary magdalene whan iesus sawe hys mother disciple whome loued standynge sayde vnto hys mother woman beholde thy sonne afterwarde sayd vnto disciple beholde thys thy mother fro houre dyd disciple take hys prouision afterwarde iesus knowynge thynges fulfylled psal cyt scripture myght fulfylled sayd athyrst ther set vessell ful vynegre math c mac fylled sponge vynegre hysope wyndyng aboute rede put hys mouth whan iesus taken vynegre sayd fynished head beynge bowed gaue vp goost iewes much daye preparyng bodyes shulde remayne crosse vpon sabbat sabbat day great prayed pilate theyr legges myght broken taken downe came souldyers brake ye legges fyrst crucifyed wyth hym wha come iesus sawe hym deade dyd breake hys legges one ye souldiers opened hys syde wt spear zach continently ther wente oute bloude water sawe dyd beare recorde hys record true knoweth yt sayeth true ye ye also may beleue thynges done ye scripture myght fulfylled sayth exo g ye shall breake bone hym agayne another scripture sayeth zach c shall loke hym whome haue pearsed thorowe mat g marc c luce thys dyd ioseph arimathia praye pilate myghte take downe bodye iesu disciple iesu secretly feare iewes pilate grauted hym cam toke downe body iesu ther came also one ioha nicodemus whyche afore cam vnto iesus nyght bryngyng mirrhe aloe mixt together near hande hudreth poude toke body iesu bounde wt lynnen clothes wyth spice iewes maner burye place iesus crucifyed ther garden garden new graue wherin man yet ben layed layde iesus iewes day preparynge sepulchre hande xx chapter math marci luc fyrste daye sabbat came mary magdalene early sepulchre wha yet dark sawe stone taken awaye fro sepulchre therfore ranne came simon peter disciple ioha c whome iesus loued sayeth vnto haue taken awaye lorde ye graue wote haue layd hym luc therfore wente peter disciple came graue rane together disciple ranne afore sooner peter came fyrst graue whan stouped downe sawe lynnen clothes layde wente came simon peter followynge hym entred sepulchre sawe clothes layde napke ben vpo hys head layde wyth lynnen clothes place seuerally wrapped together wente also disciple came fyrst graue sawe beleued yet dyd knowe psal b actu c scripture yt ought ryse agayne fro deade tha wente ye disciple agayne together luce mary stode wythout sepulchre wepynge wha wepte stouped loked sepulchre sawe two angel syttynge whyte one att heade one att fete bodye iesus layde saye vnto woman wepest thou sayeth vnto haue taken away lorde tell haue layed hym whan sayde thys turned herselfe aboute sawe iesus standyng knewe iesus iesus sayeth vnto woman wepest thou sekest thou thynkynge bene gardener sayd vnto hym syr yf yu hast taken hym awaye tel thou hast layd hym wyl fetch iesus said vnto mary beynge turned sayd vnto rabboni whych saye mayster iesus sayeth vnto touche yet ascended vp father go vnto psa c brethre saye vnto ioha go vp vnto father father god god luce mary magdalene came shewynge disciple haue sene lorde thynges hath sayd vnto luce c whan late fyrste daye sabbat dores shut ye disciple fear iewes iesus came stode myddest sayd vnto peace vnto whan sayd shewed hys handes fete hys syde ioha c disciple glad seynge lorde sayde agayne vnto peace vnto esaye marc b luce ioha c lyke ye father hath sent also sende whan sayd brethed vpon sayeth vnto receaue ye holy goost whose sinnes ye shall forgeue forgeue whose synnes ye retayne ar retayned thomas one ye twelfe ioha b whych called didimus wt whan iesus came sayd disciple vnto hym haue sene lorde sayd vnto without shal se hys hades prynte nayles put fynger ye place nayles put hande hys syde wyl beleue eyghte dayes hys disciple agayne wythin thomas iesus came dores beynge shute stode ye myddes sayd vnto peace vnto ye sayde vnto thomas reache hether thy fynger se handes reach ther thy hande put syde vnbeleuyng beleuyng thomas answered sayde vnto lorde god iesus sayeth vnto hym thomas thou hast sene thou hast beleued blessed yt haue sene haue beleued ioh many token dyd iesus ye syght hys disciple wrytte thys boke thynges wrytte yt ye maye beleue ye iesus christe sonne god ye beleuyng maye haue lyfe hys name xxi chapter afterward dyd iesus shew hymselfe agayne see tyberias thys wyse dyd shew hymself ther together simon peter thomas whych called didymus ioh c nathanael cana galile chyldren zebede two hys disciple simon peter sayeth vnto go fyshe saye vnto hym come also wyth wente gat vp ship nyght toke nothyng whan become mornyng iesus stode shore neuerthelesse disciple knewe iesus sayeth iesus vnto chyldren haue ye ony meate answered hym sayde vnto luce cast net ryghtsyde ship ye shal fynde cast able drawe multitude fyshes tha ye disciple ioha c iesus loued sayde vnto peter lorde whan simon peter herde lorde gyrded hys matel hym naked lepte see disciple came ship farre lande two hudreth cubites drawynge nette fyshes wha came downe lande saw burnynge cole layde fysh layde theron breade iesus sayeth vnto luce brynge hether fyshes ye haue taken simo peter wente vp drue nette vpon lande full greate fyshes hundreth thre fyftye whan ther many yet brake nette iesus sayeth vnto come dyne none dyd eate durst axe arte thou knowynge lorde iesus came toke breade gaue fysh lykewyse nowe thyrde tyme iesus shewed vnto hys disciple wha rysen dead wha dyned iesus sayd vnto simon peter simon iona louest thou sayeth vnto yee lorde thou knowest loue sayeth vnto hym fede lambes sayeth agayne vnto hym simon iona louest thou sayeth vnto yee lorde thou knowest loue sayeth vnto hym fede lambes sayeth vnto hym thyrde tyme simon iona louest yu peter sory sayd thyrde tyme vnto hym louest yu sayd vnto hym ioh lord thou knowest thynges thou knowest loue sayeth vnto hym fede shepe ioh verely verely saye vnto wha thou werest yonge thou dyddest gyrde walkedest yu woldest actu whan thou shalte olde thou shalt reach thyne handes another shall gyrde lead whether thou wylte thys sayd sygnifyenge death shulde gloryfye god wha sayd sayd vnto hym followe peter beynge turned aboute sawe disciple iesus loued followynge ioh c whych also leaned vpo hys brest ye supper sayd lorde shal betraye whan peter sawe sayeth vnto iesu lorde shall thys iesus sayde vnto hym yf wyll hym tary vntyll come vnto follow thou wente thys sayenge abrode amonge brother disciple dyeth iesus sayd vnto dyeth yf wyll haue hym tary vntyll come thys disciple beareth wytnesse thynges know hys wytnesse true ioha ther many thynges also yt iesus dyd whyche yf wrytten one another suppose worlde shulde able conteyne bokes wrytten pthe ende gospell ihon pthe actes apostle whych seconde boke gospell luke fyrst chapter fyrst treatyse verely theophile haue made al thynges ye iesus began teach vntyll day commaundynge apostle dyd chose ye holy goost take vp vnto also ioh shewed hymselfe lyuyng hys passio many token appearynge vnto space fortye dayes speakynge kyngdome god lucey eatynge commauded shulde departe fro ierusalem wayte promyse father ioha c whych sayd ye haue herde mouth math b actu b iho verely baptysed wyth water ye shalbe baptysed wyth holy goost fewe dayes therfor dyd come together axe hym sayenge mat lorde shalte thou thys tyme restore kyngdome vnto israel said vnto mat c houeth knowe tymes seasos whych ye father hath set hys owne power luce actu ye shall receaue power ye holy goost commynge actu ioh ye shalbe wytnesses vnto ierusalem iewry samaria vntyll ende ye earth math b marc c luce wha said thinges take vp loked vpon hym cloude receaued hym theyr syght whan behelde hym goynge vp heauen beholde two men stode whyte garmentes also sayde ye men galile stande ye lokynge vp heauen thys iesus whyche taken vp heauen dani b math c marci c luce c shall come ye haue sene hym goynge heauen uened ierusalem mo te whych called oliuete whych nye ierusalem sabbat dayes ney c much man go sone hauynge sabbat iourney whan gone wet vp parloure abode math apeter ihon iames andrewe philippe thomasmarci b luce b bartholomewe mathewe iames sone alpheus simon zelotes iudas iames sone co tinuynge wyth one accorde prayer supplicacion wyth weme mary mother iesu hys brother dayes peter rysynge myddes brother sayd company men together nearehande hundreth twenty ye men brother scripture must fulfylled ye whych holy goost hath spoken mouthe dauid concernynge iudas whiche math ioh gyde toke iesus mat bred amonge v optayned rowme thys mynistracion math truely hath possessed felde rewarde wyckednesse beynge hanged burst myddes hys bowel gusshed made knowen vnto dwell ierusalem insomuche felde called theyr tunge aceldema bloude felde wrytten boke psalmes psal let theyr habitacion voyde let ther dwel therein psal hys bysshopryke another take wherfore men haue ben gathered wyth v whyle lorde iesus wente amoge v begynnynge baptyme ihon vntyll daye wherein taken vp v one muste wyth v wytnesse hys resurreccion actu appoynted two actu ioseph whyche called barsabas whose surname iustus mathias prayenge sayd thou lorde par c whych knowest harte al shewe one twayne thou hast chosen take rowme thys ministracyon apostleshippe fro whych iudas decyuered myghte go hys owne place gaue lotte lot fell vpon mathias couted wyth eleuen apostle ii chapter wha ye dayes loue c deut c luc wyt sontyde fulfylled together one place sodenly ther happened sounde heaue myghty wynde fylled house syttynge ther appeared vnto clouen tunges lyke fyre sat vppon euery one ioha actu fylled wyth holy goost mat cand beganne speake wyth sundery tunges holy gooste gaue vtter ther dwellynge ierusalem iewes deuoute men euery nacion vnder heauen whan thys voyce happened multitude came together abashed mynde euery man herde speake wt hys owne langage astonyed maruayled sayenge beholde speak galileas haue herd euery man langage wherin borne parthia medes ye elamite ye dwell mesopotamia iewry cappadocia po tus asia phrigia paphilia egipte ye party libia whyche aboute cyrene straugers rome iewes also math b proselyte cretians arabian haue herde speake greate workes god wt oure owne tuges astonnyed maruailed sayeng ech wyll mockynge sayd full swete wyne dyd peter lyfte vp hys voyce standynge wyth eleuen sayd vnto ye men iewry ye dwell ierusale thys knowen vnto perceaue wordes wt eares dronke ye suppose seynge thyrde houre ye daye thys spoken ioel prophete esai ezech ioel f shall come passe ye last dayes sayeth ye lord shall poure sprete vpo al flesh sone luce f actu b doughters shall prophecy yonge shal se vision actu b b olde men shal dreame dreames truely seruautes hademaydes shall poure forth sprete dayes shal prophecy math f luce shal geue woders heaue aboue toke earth beneth bloud fyre vapoure smoke sone shal turned darknesse ye moone bloud ye great manifest day ye lord come shal come passe yt rom b euery man yt shall cal vpon ye name ye lord shalbe saued ye men israel heare wordes iesus nazareth ye alowed god amoge wt miracle woders toke ye god hath wrought hym myddest ye knowe math beynge taken afore defyned counsell foreknowlege god haue ye punyshynge hym slayen handes wycked men actu e god hath raysed vp sorowes hell beynge loused much impossible hym holden wyth dauid sayeth hym psal b haue alwaye set lorde afore syght ryght hade lest moued therfore harte glad tunge hath reioyced moreouer flesh also shall rest hope thou shalt leaue soule hell nother shalt yu suffre thy holyone se corrupcion thou hast made wayes lyfe knowe vnto thou shalt make ful ioyfulnesse wyth thy countenaunce ye men brother let boldelye speake vnto dauid patriarke reg bfor also deade buryed hys sepulchre wyth v vntyll thys daye wherfore seynge prophete knewe god wyth othe sworne vnto hym psa b frute hys loynes syt vpon hys seate seynge aforehande spake resurreccion christ nother lefte hell hys flesh sawe corrupcion iesus hath god raysed agayne ioha actu whose wytnesses seynge phil exalted ryghthande god ye promyse holy goost beynge receaued father hath poured thys gyfte ye se heare dauid gone vp heauen sayeth hymselfe psal lorde sayde vnto lorde sytte ryghte hande vntyll set thyne enemyes stoole thy fete let house israell therfore knowe surely god hath made iesus ye haue crucifyed lorde christ zach thynges beynge herde pricked harte sayde vnto peter apostle ye men brother luce b actu shal peter sayd vnto repente let euery one baptysed name iesu christ remission synnes ye shall receaue gyfte holy goost vnto ioel promyse made vnto chyldren vnto farre euer lorde god shall call hetherto wyth many wordes dyd wytnesse exhorte sayenge saued thys wycked generacion dyd receaue hys worde baptysed daye ther added vnto thre thousande beleuynge soules continuynge doctrine apostle communion breakynge bread prayer ther came feare vpon euery soule many wonder token done apostle ierusalem greate feare euery one al beleued together actu thynges commune solde theyr possession substaunces parted vnto euery one euery one nede co tinuynge daylye one mynded temple esaye b breakynge bread house toke meate wyth ioye synglenesse harte praysynge god together hauyng fauoure wyth people lorde ioyned dayly vnto shulde saued iii chapter peter ihon wente vp teple ye nynthe houre prayer certayne man whyche halte fro hys mother wombe borne whome set daylye gate temple whyche called bewtyfull myght axe almesse goer temple whan saw peter ihon begynnynge entre temple axed myghte receaue almesse peter wyth ihon beholdynge hym sayd loke v loked hopynge shulde haue receaued thyng peter sayd syluer gold haue yt haue geue ioha name iesus christ nazareth ryse walke hys ryght hande taken lyfte hym vp strayght waye hys legges fete strengthed leapynge stode walked entred temple wyth walkynge leapynge praysynge god people sawe walkynge praisyng god knew hym yt sat almesse bewtyful gate teple fylled wt wonderynge astonnyed vpon happened vnto hym whan people sawe peter ihon wonderynge ranne vnto reg ioha c actu b porche whych called salomon peter seynge answered people ye men israel maruayle ye thys ye behold v though made walke oure owne strength power god abraham god isaac god iacob god father hath glorifyed hys sone iesus math c luce b whome ye truely haue delyuered denyed presence pilate iudgynge hym lette lowse ye haue denyed holy ryghteous haue desyred manslayer geuen author lyfe haue ye slayen god hath raysed deade whose wytnesses fayth hys name hath hys name confirmed whome ye se knowe fayth thorow hym hath geue hym thys whole strength syght brother knowe cor thorowe ignoraunce ye haue done lyke ruler also thynges god shewed afore mouth hys prophetes hys christe shulde suffre hath fulfylled repent therfore turned yt eccli b synnes may done away yt whan ye tyme refreshyng shal come fro ye presence ye lord sende vnto iesus christ yt preached vnto verely must receaue heaue vntyll ye tyme restorynge agayne al thinges yt god hath spoken ye mouthe hys holy prophetes sence ye begynnynge worlde moses truly dyd saye deut c actu lorde god shal rayse prophete amonge brethre lyke vnto selfe hym shal ye heare accordyng thynges whatsoeuer shall speake vnto shall come passe euery soule shall heare prophete shalbe rooted people prophetes samuel thenceforth haue spoken haue shewed dayes ye chyldren prophetes conuenaunte whych god hath made vnto father sayenge vnto abraham gen c thy sede shal al kynreds ye earth blessed math vnto hath god raysyng sone sent fyrst blessyng euery man turne hymselfe hys wyckednesse iiii chapter bvt spake vnto people prestes ruler temple saduces came vnto beynge greued taught people shewed resurreccion deade iesu layed ha de put holde tyll morowe eue tyde howbeit many yt herd worde dyd beleue nombre men fyue thousande chaunced ye morow theyr ruler elder scribe gathered ierusalem anna also ye hygh prest caiphas ihon alexader many prestes kynred settynge myddest axed math power name haue ye done thys peter fylled wyth holy goost sayd vnto ye ruler people elder israel yf thys daye examined ye good dede sycke man whereby made whole knowen vnto vnto al people israel actu name oure lorde iesus christe nazareth ye haue crucifyed whome god hath raysed deade standeth whole psal c math c pet thys stone whyche refused buylders whych become head corner ther saluacion ony math c phili nother ther ony name geuen vnto men vnder heauen wherein ought saued seynge peter stedfastnesse ihons beynge sure men wythout learnynge laye maruayled sore knew ben wyth iesu seynge wyth also man standynge made whole coulde saye nothynge agaynste comaunded go asyde ye coucel reasoned together sayenge ioh shall vnto men truely done token knowen al inhabiters ierusale manifest denye lest noysed abrode amoge people let v threaten speake nomore vnto ony man name actu c callynge charged wyse shulde speake teache name iesus peter iho answerynge sayd vnto whether ryghte syght god rather heare tha god iudge ye speake haue sene herde threatenynge let go fyndynge myght punysh people al praysed whych actu ben done happened man whome thys token health happened forty yeare olde beynge let go came theyrs shewed great thynges hygh prestes elder said vnto whych wha herde lyft vp theyr voyce wyth one accord vnto god sayd lorde god thou hast made heauen earth see thynges whych holy goost thorowe mouth oure father dauid thy seruaunte hast sayd psal wherfore haue heythen raged people haue ymagined vayne thynges kynges earth stode ruler agreed one lorde agaynst hys christe verely herode poncius pilate wyth heythen people israell come together thys cytie agaynste thy holy chylde iesus whome thou hast anoynted thyne hande thy counsel haue determined done lorde loke vpon theyr threatenynges graunte vnto thy seruauntes speake thy worde wyth confidece thou reach thyne hande healynges token woders done name thy holy chylde iesus actu wha prayed ye place gathered moued actu fylled wyth holy goost spake worde god wyth boldnesse actu c b multitude beleuers ther one harte one soule nother said ony ought hys thinges possessed al thynges commune wyth great power dyd apostle beare wytnesse resurreccion oure lord iesus christ ther great grace nother ther ony wanted amonge many possessers landes house sellyng brought ye pryces yt solde layed ye apostle fete vnto euery distributed euery nede actu ioseph also surnamed barnabas ye apostle whych interpreted ye son cosolacio leuite ye cotry cypre wha lande solde brought ye pryce layed ye apostle fete v chapter bvt certayne name ananias wt saphira hys wyfe solde felde kepte away parte ye mony hys wyfe beynge acousel therof bryngynge one part layed apostle fete peter sayd ananias ananias wherfore hath satanas tempted thy hart thou shuldest lye vnto holy goost wythdrawe pryce ye feld dyd vnsold wholy remayne vnto beynge solde thy power hast yu set thys thynge thyne harte thou haste lyed vnto men vnto god ananias hearynge wordes fel downe dyed ther happened great feare vpo yt dyd heare yonge men rysynge vp hym awaye bearyng buryed hym fortuned ye space nearehade thre houres wyfe knowynge happened came also peter sayde vnto tell woman dyd ye sell lande somuch sayd yee much peter sayd vnto ye agre tempt sprete ye lorde beholde ye fete yt haue buryed thy husbande ye dore shal beare also immediatly fell hys fete dyed ye yonge entring dyd fynde deade caryed buryed hir husbande ther happened great feare whole congregacion herde marc c ther many token wonder done apostle handes amonge ye people wyth one accorde regu ioha c actu b salomon porche none durst ioyne hymselfe vnto people magnifyed multitude men wemen beleuynge lorde augmented insomuch put forth ye sycke vpon stretes layed vpon beddes barowes peter came hys shadowe ye leest myght ouershadowe myght delyuered theyr disease ther came runnynge together ierusalem multitude cyties laye thereby bryngyng sycke vexed wyth vnclene spretes whych healed actu hygh prest rysyng vp ye wyth hym whych secte ye saduces fylled wyth enuye layde hades apostle put ye comune warde actu b angel ye lord openynge dores preson nyght leadynge sayde go ye standynge speake ye temple vnto people al wordes thys lyfe whych wha herd entred early ye temple taught comynge hygh prest yt wyth hym called together coucell elder chyldren israel dyd sende vnto preso yt shulde brought whan minister came preson beynge opened dyd fynde beynge returned shewed sayeng preson dede dyd fynde shut wt diligence kepers stadyng dores openynge founde noman therein whan ruler temple hygh prest herd wordes douted wolde become thinges one comynge shewed behold men whych ye haue put ye preson standynge temple teachynge people wente ruler wt minister brought wythout force math feared people lest shuld stoned wha brought set ye coucel hygh prest axed sayenge actu b dyd earnestly commaunde ye shulde teach thys name beholde ye haue fylled ierusale wt doctrine wyl brynge math e bloud thys man vpon v peter ye apostle answeryng sayde actu b ought obeye god tha men god father hath raysed iesus ye haue slayne hagynge hym tre prince saueoure hath god exalted wt hys ryghthande geue repentauce vnto israel forgeuenesse synnes ar wytnesses wordes holy goost whome hath geuen vnto obey hym whan herde thynges cut asunder thought slaye pharise name actu gamaliel rysynge vp councell doctor lawe honorable vnto people comauded apostle go forth lytle one syde sayd vnto ye men israel take hede vnto youre selfe concernynge ye shall afore dayes ther theudas sayenge hymselfe one vnto whome dyd agre nombre foure hudreth whych slayne beleued hym scattered brought naughte thys ther luce iudas galilean dayes taxe turned away people hym peryshed many consented vnto hym scattered saye vnto wythdrawe fro men let alone l math yf thys counsell worke men shalbe lowsed yf god ye shall able lowse leste perchaunce ye shall seme stryue agaynst god tha agreed vnto hym callynge together ye apostle comauded math c actu b beynge beaten ye nowyse shuld speake name iesu let go verely wente math reioycynge fro ye presence ye coucel yt couted worthy suffre rebuke ye name iesus ceassed teachyng preachyng iesus christ teple aboute ye house euery daye vi chapter dayes bre ye disciple growing ther hapned grudge grekes agaynst ye hebrues yt theyr wedowes wer despysed dayly handreachyng twelfe callyng together ye multitude ye disciple sayd mete v leaue worde god serue table spye therfore brethre amog seue tim b good reporte ful ye holy goost wysedom may set ouer worke wyll diligente prayer ministracion worde sayeng pleased al multitude dyd chose steuen ful fayth ye holy goost philippe prochorus nicanor timon parmenas apoc nicolaus straunger antioche num b actu tim b tim b set apostle prayenge layd theyr handes vpon worde god increaced nombre disciple multiplied greatly ierusalem great company also prestes dyd obey fayth steuen full fayth power dyd great token wonder amonge people arose ther synagoge called lybertines cyrenenses alexandrine cilicia asia disputinge wt steuen luce b coulde resyste wysedome sprete spake sent preuely men whych shulde saye math f haue herde hym speake wordes blasphemy agaynst moses god tha moued ye people ye elder scribe runnynge together caught hym brought hym councel set false wytnesses whych shulde say thys ceasseth speake wordes agaynst holy place lawe haue herde hym sayenge iesus nazareth shal destroy thys place shal chauge tradicios moses hath geuen vnto v sat coucel beholdynge hym sawe hys face face angel vii chapter sayd ye hygh prest thynges whyche sayd ye brethre father herke god glorye dyd appeare vnto father abraham whan mesopotamia afore dwelte ye lande charran sayd vnto hym get thy lande thy kynred come lande shall shewe genesi went lande caldees dwelt charran gene fro thence yt hys father deade broughte hym ouer thys lande dwel gaue hym heretage therein bredth foote gene promysed geue hym possession hys sede hym whan chylde god sayd vnto hym gene c thy sede shalbe indweller straunge lande shall make subiecte bo dage shall intreate euell foure hundreth yeare ye people whome shall serue shall iudge sayeth lorde therafter shall go serue thys place gen b gaue hym conuenaunt circumcision gene begat isaac circucised eyght daye gone c isaac iacob iacob gene f xii patriarkes gen e sap c ye patriarkes enuyenge ioseph solde hym egipte god wyth hym ryd hym al tribulacions gaue hym grace wysedom presence pharao kynge ye egipcians gene c ordyned hym geuernoure ouer egipte ouer hys house gene ther came derth al egipte chanaan great trouble oure father fande meates wha iacob herde corne egipte sente fyrst father gene seconde tyme ioseph knowen hys brother hys kynred made knowen vnto pharao ieseph sendynge called father iacob hys kynred thre score fyftene soules gene iacob wet downe egipte gene e dyed father gene c iosu f caryed ouer sichem layed sepulchre whych gene abraham bought mony chyldre emor sone sichem exod psal c whan tyme promyse drue nye whyche god confessed vnto abraham people dyd growe multiplyed egipt vntyl ther arose another kyng egipt knewe ioseph dealynge sutely wt kynred intreated father euel shuld put forth theyr yonge chyldren leste shulde made lyue exod tyme moses borne accepte vnto god whyche noryshed thre monethes father house whan put forth pharaos doughter toke vp rished sone herselfe moses taught al ye wysedo ye egipcias myghtye hys wordes workes wha ye tyme forty yeare fulfilled vnto came vp hys mynde visite brethre ye chyldren israel wha sene one suffrynge iniury delyuered hym auenged ye suffr wronge smytynge ye egipcia thought brethre vnderstad yt god dyd geue health hade vnderstode ye nexte daye shewed hymself vnto chydyng dyd reco cyle peace sayeng ye men ye brother ye hurte eche yt dyd hys neghboure wronge thrust hym awaye sayenge exodi bwho hath ordyned ruler iudge ouer v wylt yu slaye thou slewest ye egipcian yesterday moses fled thys worde became strauger ye lade madia engedred two sone exodi fortye yeares beynge fulended ther appeared vnto hym wyldernesse mounte sina angel ye fyre flame ye bush moses seynge maruayled ye syght whan came neare myght beholde voyce lord happened vnto hym sayenge god thy father god abraham god isaac god iacob moses beynge afeared durst beholde lorde sayd vnto hym iosue lowse shewe thy fete place wherin yu standest holy lande haue wel sene trouble people whyche egipte haue herde theyr gronynge come downe delyuer come wyll sende egipte thys moses refused sayeng exod bwho made ruler iudge hath god sente ruler redymer wyth hande angell appeared vnto hym bushe brought doynge great token wonder lande egipte ye reed see deserte forty yeare moses sayd vnto chyldren israell deut c actu prophete shal god rayse brethre lyke vnto ye shall heare hym exodi gala c whych cogregacyon ye wyldernesse wyth angell spake vnto hym mounte sina wyth father whych receaued wordes lyfe geue vnto vnto whome oure father wolde obey refused turned awaye wyth theyr harte egipte sayenge vnto aaro exod amake vnto v goddes maye go v moses led v lande egipte tel done vnto hym made calfe dayes offred sacrifice vnto ye ymage reioyced workes theyr handes god turned rom gaue serue vnto hoost heauen wrytten boke prophetes haue ye offred meate offerynges sacrifice forty yeares wyldernesse iere c amos ye house israel ye haue take vp tabernacle moloch ye starre god rempham fygures ye haue made worshippe wyl brynge ouer beyonde babilon tabernacle wytnesse wyth oure father deserte god dyd appoynt exodi hebr speakyng vnto moses yt shulde make fashion sene father takyng vp iosue broughte also wyth iosue possession heythen whych god droue presece father vntyl ye dayes dauid psa whyche founde fauoure wyth god desyred myght fynde tabernacle vnto god iacob reg salomon buylte hym house actu howbeit hyghest dwelleth temple made wyth handes sayeth prophete esai heauen seate vnto earth stoole fete house shall ye buylde sayeth lorde whych place rest hath hande made al thynges deut ye styfnecked vncircumcised harte eares ye haue alwaye wythstande ye holy goost father euen ye also whome ye prophetes haue father persecuted haue slayne dyd shewe afore commynge ryghteous whose traytours murthurers ye haue bene ioha b whych haue receaued law disposicion angel actu b ye haue kepte hearynge thynges cut asuder theyr harte gnashed theyr teth whan full holy gooste lokynge heauen math c sawe ye glorye god iesus standynge ryghthade power god sayd beholde se heauens open sonne standynge ryghthande power god cryenge oute wyth loude voyce psal helde theyr eares made rushynge wt one accorde vpon hym puttyng hym forth cytie stoned hym actu b wytnesses layed downe theyr clothes fete yonge man whych called saule stoned steuen cryenge sayeng lorde iesu psal receaue sprete hys knee beyng bowed cryed wyth loude voyce sayenge luce c lorde laye synne theyr charge whan hadde sayd fell aslepe saule consentynge vnto hys death viii chapter daye ther happened great persecucio cogregacion ierusalem mat c actu scattered abrode contrye iewry samaria excepte apostle feared god dressed steuen made great lamentacion ouer actu b cor gala b saul waysted ye cogregacio etryng thorowe house drawynge men wemen delyuered vnto iayle therfore actu b scattered abrode went thorow preachynge ye worde god philippe goynge downe cytie samaria preached christe vnto ye people gaue hede one accorde vnto thinges spoken philippe hearynge seynge token dyd ye vncleane sprets many cryenge wyth loude voyce marc c actu bthey wente many hauynge palsye haltynge healed therfore ther great ioye happened vnto cytie certayne man name simon actu awhych vsed wytchcrafte cytie myscaryenge people samaria sayenge hymselfe great man vnto whome euery man herkened leest greatest sayenge thys power god whych called greate gaue hede vnto hym great seaso made fooles wyth hys wytchcraftes whan beleued philippe preachyng kingdome god baptysed name iesu christ men wemen tha beleued simon hymselfe also wha baptysed dyd cleue vnto philippe seynge also greate token power done beynge astonnyed dyd wonder wha apostle ierusale herde samaria receaued worde god sente vnto peter ihon whych whan come prayed yt myght receaue ye holy goost yet come ony onely baptysed ye name ye lord iesus actu tim b c tim b tha layde theyr hades receaued holy goost wha simo sene yt holy goost geue layeng ye apostle hades offred mony sayenge geue also power vpo euer shal laye hades may receaue ye holy goost peter sayd vnto thy mony wt vnto perdicio yu hast thought math b gyft god possessed wt mony thou hast part fellowship worde thy hart ryght god repet therfore thys thy wyckednesse pray god yf haply thys thought thy hart forgeue ye perceaue yt ye gal bytternesse ye bode wyckednesse simon answerynge sayde num b praye ye vnto lorde nothynge come vnto thynges ye haue sayd verely hauynge testifyed spoken worde wente agayne ierusalem preached gospell vnto many partyes samaritanes angell lorde spake vnto philippe sayenge ryse vp go towarde south vnto waye commeth downe fro ierusalem vnto gaza ame deserte rysynge vp wente beholde man ethiopia gelded man authorite wyth candace quene ethiopia whych ouer hyr treasure reg fwas come worshippe ierusalem returned syttynge vpo charret readynge esay prophete sprete sayd vnto philip go neare ioyne charret philippe runnynge neare herde hym reade prophete esaye sayd thynkest thou thou doest vnderstande thou readest whych sayd howe yf man shewe prayed philippe wolde come vp syt wyth hym place scripture whych red thys esai b led shepe slaughter lambe wythout voyce hym sheareth hym hath opened hys mouth humblynesse hys iudgement exalted shall declare generacion hys lyfe shalbe taken earth gelded man answerynge philippe sayd praye whome sayeth prophete hymself another philippe openynge mouth begynnynge thys scripture preached iesus vnto hym whan wente waye came certayne water ye gelded man sayd beholde water actu hyndereth baptysed philippe sayde yf thou beleuest wyth thy harte may answerynge sayd beleue iesus christ sonne god commaunded charret stande styll wente water philippe gelded man baptysed hym whan gone vp water sprete ye lord caught philippe gelded man sawe hym nomore wente hys way reioycyng philippe founde azotus goynge thorow preached vnto al cyties vntyll came cesarea ix chapter saule actu b cor gala b breathyng yet threatenynges slaughter agaynste disciple lorde cam ye hygh preste axed letter hym damascus vnto synagoges yt yf founde ony thys waye men wemen myght brynge bounde ierusalem whan iournyed fortuned came neare damascus sodely dyd lyght heauen shyne rounde aboute hym fallynge ye groude herde voyce sayenge vnto hym saule saule persecutest thou mezach b math sayd art thou lorde sayd iesus whome thou persecutest harde kycke agaynst prycke quakynge beyng astonnyed sayde lorde actu wylt thou haue lorde sayd vnto hym aryse go cytie shalbe tolde thou muste men accopanyed wyth hym stode amased hearynge dede voyce seynge noman saul rose vp earth eye opened dyd se nothynge leadynge hym hande brought hym damascus thre dayes seynge dyd eat drynke ther damascus disciple name ananias lorde sayd vnto hym vision ananias sayd beholde lorde lorde sayde vnto hym aryse go strete called straight seke ye house iudas one name saule actu c tharsis beholde prayeth hath sene man name ananias entrynge layenge handes vpon hym may receaue hys syght ananias answered lorde haue herde many man actu many euels hath done thy sayntes ierusalem hath power fro hygh prestes bynde al whych call vpo thy name lorde sayde vnto hym go thy way gala c thys chosen vessell vnto may carye name heythen kynges chyldren israell wyll shewe hym howe greate thynges must actu b cori c suffre name sake ac ananias went waye entred house layenge hys handes vpon hym sayde brother saule lorde iesus whyche appeared vnto waye thou camest sente thou se fylled wyth ye holy goost forthwyth fell hys eye ben skales receaued syght rysynge baptysed whan taken meate coforted dayes wyth disciple damascus strayghte waye beynge entred synagoges preached iesus sonne god herde hym astonyed sayd thys droue ierusalem called vpon name cam hether therfore myght leade bounde vnto ye hygh prestes saule much strengthed confouded iewes dwelte damascus affirmynge thys christ whan many dayes fulfylled iewes helde councel together yt might kil theyr layeng wayte made knowe vnto saule cor kept gate daye nyght myght slaye hym iosue c regu c disciple takyng nyght let hym thorow wall puttynge hym basket gala band whan come ierusalem assayed ioyne hymselfe vnto disciple euery one feared hym beleuyng disciple barnabas takynge hym led hym apostle shewed sene lorde waye spake vnto hym done boldely name iesus damascus wyth goynge ierusalem doynge boldely name lorde spake vnto heythen disputed wyth grekes sought slaye hym ac u b whyche whan brother knowen conueyed hym cesarea sent hym tharsus ye cogregacio verely reste thorow iewry galile samaria edifyed walkynge feare lord fylled comforte holy goost fortuned whan peter passed euery one dyd come vnto sayntes yt dwelled lydda fande certayne man name eneas lyenge eyght yeare hys bed whych sycke palsye peter sayd vnto hym eneas lorde iesus christ make whole aryse decke bedde vnto thyselfe math marc luce c ioh strayght waye arose al dwelte lydda sarone saw hym whych turned vnto lorde ioppe ther certayne woman disciple name thabita interpreted called dorcas ful good workes almesses whyche dyd happened dayes beynge sycke dyd dye whych whan washen layde parloure seynge lydda nye ioppe ye disciple hearynge peter therein sente two men vnto hym prayenge let greue come vnto v peter rysyng vp came wyth wha come brought hym ye parloure wedowes stode aboute hym wepynge shewyng hym coates garmentes dorcas dyd make put forth peter knelyng prayed beynge turned bodye said thabita arise opened hyr eye peter beynge sene sat vp geuynge hande lyfte vp whan called sayntes wedowes shewed alyue made knowen thorow al ioppe many beleued lorde fortuned taryed many dayes ioppe one simon coryar x chapter ther certayne man cesarea name cornelius centurion copany called italian deuoute man fearynge god wyth hys house eccli bgeuynge many almesses vnto people prayenge god alwaye sawe manifestly vision nearehande nynth houre daye angell god comynge vnto hym sayenge vnto hym cornelius lokynge vpon hym beynge take wt feare said art thou lord sayd vnto hym eccli b thy prayer thyne almesses come vp remebrauce syght god sende men ioppe cal one simo whych surnamed peter lodged wt one simon taner whose house neare ye see shall tell behoueth ye whan angel yt spake vnto hym departed called ii hys household soldyoure fearynge god obeyed whomwha shewed al thynges sente ioppe ye next day neynge comynge neare ye cytie peter reg math luc b went vp ye lofte myght praye syxte houre wha dyd huger wolde eat made ready fell traunce sawe heauen open certayne vessel comyng downe lyke vnto great lynnen clothe wt foure endes letten downe fro heaue ye earth wherein al foure footed beastes crepynge beastes earth byrdes ye ayre ther happened voyce vnto hym ryse peter kyll eate peter sayd fro lord ui deu neuer dyd eate al yt comune vncleane agayne ye secode tyme spake voyce hym math b rom b tim ti call thou commune ye god hath puryfyed thys happened thryse anone ye vessel taken vp agayne heaue wha peter douted hymselfe ye vision yt sene beholde ye men yt sente fro cornelius enquyring ye house simo stode ye dore whan called axed whether simo yt surnamed peter ther hys lodgynge wha peter thought vpon vision sprete sayd vnto hym beholde thre seke ye aryse therfore go downe wyth doutynge nothynge haue sent peter going ye said beholde ye seke cause wherfore ye come whych sayd cornelius centurio ryghteous fearyng god hauynge good reporte al people iewes hath receaued answere holy angel cal ye hys house heare wordes wherfore gene pet b leadynge lodged rysynge vp next daye wente wt act brother ioppe dyd beare hym copany ye daye followyng entred cesarea cornelius hys kynsfolkes speciall fredes beynge called together wayted fortuned whan peter come cornelius met hym fallynge downe hys fete worshipped hym peter lyfted vp sayenge actu c apoc b b ryse vp myselfe also speakynge wt hym entred fade many come together sayd vnto ye knowe deut abhorred iewe ioyned come aleaunte god hath shewed call noma comune vncleane wherfore beynge called dyd come wythout doutynge axe therfore cause haue ye called cornelius sayde fourth daye hence fasted vntyll thys houre prayenge nynth houre house beholde man stode whyte garmente sayd cornelius thy prayer herde thyne almesses remebraunce syght god sende therfore ioppe call simon whych surnamed peter lodged house simo taner see therfore sente continently vnto thou hast done well commynge therfore thy presence heare thynges commaunded ye lorde peter openynge hys mouth sayde deut par b iob b sap b eccli b rom b ephesi colloss c petri c haue founde truth ye god accepter persos esa bbut amonge people yt feareth hym worketh ryghteousnesse accepte vnto hym god sente ye worde vnto ye chyldren israel preachyng peace thorow iesu christe ye lorde ye knowe worde happened thorow al iewry math bfor begynnynge galile ye baptyme ihon preached iesus nazareth esa god anoynted hym wyth holy goost power whych passed thorowe doynge good healynge al possessed wyth deuell god wyth hym wytnesses thynges dyd lande iewry ierusalem slewe hangynge tre dyd god rayse thyrde day gaue hym become manifeste vnto al people vnto v wytnesses ordyned god luce ioha bwhich haue eaten dronke wyth hym rysen deade mat c comauded v preach vnto people testifye ordyned god ye father iudge ye quycke deade vnto ye beare esay c iere dani prophetes wytnesse al receaue forgeuenesse synnes hys name beleue hym whyle peter spake wordes actu holy goost fell vpon al herde worde faythfull circumcision yt come wyth peter astonnyed grace holy goost also poured forth vpon heythen herde speakynge tunges praysynge god answered peter actu ony byd water baptysed whych haue receaued holy goost commauded baptysed name iesus christe prayed hym wolde tary certayne dayes wyth xi chapter apostle brother iewry herde yt heythen also receaued worde god whan peter come vp ierusalem circumcision disputed wt hym sayenge deut awhy art yu gone vnto yt haue forskynne hast eaten wt peter begynnyng declared order sayeng actu cytie ioppe prayenge sawe vision traunce certayne vessellyke vnto greate lynnen cloth foure corner let downe fro heaue came vntyl whereon lokyng perceaued saw fourefooted beastes ye earth wylde beastes crepynge beastes flyenge beastes ayre herde also voyce sayenge vnto ryse vp peter slaye eate sayd lord al yt leuit deut comune vncleane dyd neuer entre mouth ye voyce fro heauen answered ye seconde tyme sayenge thynges god hath clesed yu call vncleane thys happened thre tymes al thynges receaued vp agayne heauen beholde cotinently ther stode thre ye house sente vnto fro cesarea ye sprete said vnto yt shulde go wt doutynge nothynge actu c ther came wt also syxe brethre dyd entre ma house shewed v sene house angel stadynge sayeng vnto hym sede vnto ioppe cal simo surnamed peter shal speake wordes vnto ye yt yu shalt safe yu al thy house whan begon speake ye holy goost fel vpon actu vpo v also ye begynnynge remebred ye worde lord sayd actu ihon verely dyd baptyse wt water ye shalbe baptysed wyth ye holy goost yf god therfor haue geue lyke grace also vnto v haue beleued lord iesus christ yt myght wythstande god thynges beyng herd held theyr peace praysed god sayeng hath god geue vnto ye heythen also repetauce vnto lyfe actu truly scattred abrode fro ye trouble whych happened vnder steuen walked thorow vntyl phenice cipres antioche speakynge ye worde vnto noman saue iewes men cypers cyrene wha entred antioche spake vnto grekes shewynge lorde iesus ye hande lorde wt greate nobre beleuers dyd turne vnto ye lorde worde thynges came ye eares ye cogregacio yt ierusalem sente barnabas vntyll antioche whych wha came sawe ye grace god reioyced actu c exhorted euery one purpose harte abyde ye lorde good man full ye holy goost faith ther much people added vnto lorde actu went tharsus yt myght seke saule wha foude brought hym antioche co uersaunt cogregacion whole yeare taught much people insomuch ye disciple fyrst called christian antioche dayes came ther prophetes fro ierusalem vnto antioche rysynge vp one name actu b agabus shewed sprete great derth come whole copasse worlde whyche happened vnder claudius disciple purposed euery one sende cor cori handreachynge vnto brother iewry euery man whyche dyd also sendynge vnto actu elder ha de barnabas saule xii chapter tyme layd herode kynge handes myghte vexe certayne congregacio slewe math c c iames brother ihon wyth swearde seynge pleased iewes thought take peter also dayes swete breade whome whan taken put hym preson delyueryng hym vnto foure quaternio captayne iiii souldyers centurio hundreth quaternion souldyours kepe hym wyllynge easter brynge hym forth vnto ye people peter truly kepte ye preson actu c prayer made wythout ceassynge congregacion vnto god hym whan herode shulde haue broughte hym forth nyght peter slepynge betwene two souldyours bounde wyth two cheynes ye kepers dore kepte preso actu c dand behold angel lorde stode lyght shyned dwellyng peter syde smytten waked hym sayenge ryse vp quyckely cheynes fell hys handes angell sayd vnto hym gyrde pul thy hosen dyd sayd vnto hym put thy garmente aboute followe goyng followed hym knewe true done angell thoughte hym haue sene syght goynge fyrst seconde watch came vnto yro gate whych leadeth vnto ye cytie whych opened alone vnto goynge wente one strete sodenlye wente angel hym peter beynge come hymselfe sayde gene dani dnow know truly god hath sente hys angell hath delyuered hande herode waytynge people iewes consyderynge came house mary mother ihon whych surnamed marke many gathered actu band prayenge knocked entry dore ther came forth damesell name rhode se whan knewe peter voyce ioye dyd open dore runnynge shewed peter stade dore sayd vnto thou art mad affirmed sayd angell peter continued knockynge whan opened dore sawe hym astonnyed actu b beckenynge vnto wyth hande shulde holde theyr peace shewed lorde led hym forth preson sayd shewe thynges vnto actu b b iames brother beynge gone oute wente vnto another place whan become daye ther smal busynesse amonge souldyours become peter whan herode sought hym founde hym inquisicio beynge made kepers commaunded led awaye goynge downe iewrye cesarea abode wroth wyth tyre sidon came one mynded hym blastus kynges chamberlayne beynge persunded desyred peace theyr contryes noryshed apointed daye dyd herode beynge arayed wyth kyngly garmente syt vpon iudgemente seate made oracion vnto people cryed therto voyce god man strayght waye dyd angel lorde stryke hym geuen honoure vnto god beynge consumed wormes gaue vp goost worde god dyd growe multiplyed barnabas saule dyd returne ierusalem actu c hande reachynge beynge fulfylled takynge wyth actu ihon surnamed marke xiii chapter ther congregacion antioche prophetes teacher amonge whych barnabas simon whych called niger lucius cyrene manahen whych herodes one foure prince norsefellowe saule serued lorde fasted holy goost sayd vnto separate saul barnabas vnto worke actu b vnto haue taken prayenge fastynge layenge theyr handes vpon let go verely beynge sent ye holy goost wente vnto seleucia thence sayled cypers whan come salamina preached worde god sinagoges iewes actu ihon seruice whan walked thorowe ile vntyl paphos fande certayn sorcerer false prophet iewe whose name barieu whyche wt counsel debite sergius paule wyse man barnabas paule beynge called desyred heare ye worde god elimas exod b b actu sorcerer name interpreted wythstode sekynge wythdrawe counsuls debite fayth saule whych also called paule fylled wyth ye holy goost lokynge vpo hym sayd yu chyld deuel ful al gyle deceatfulnesse chylde ye deuel enemy al ryghteousnes doest thou ceasse subuert ye strayght wayes ye lorde nowe beholde ye hade ye lord vpo thou shalt blynde seynge sonne certayne tyme strayght waye ther fell myste vpo hym darknesse goynge sought one whych shulde geue hym ye hade ye cousels debite wha sene ye dede ioha beleued wo deringe doctrine ye lord wha paule sayled fro paphos wt hym came perge pamphilia actu ihon departynge fro returned ierusale passynge perge came antioche pisidia beyng gone ye synagoge vpo ye day ye sabbat sat downe ye lectur ye law prophetes ruler synagoge sede vnto sayenge ye brother yf ye haue ony worde exhortacion vnto people speake paule standynge vp actu commaundynge silence wyth hys hande sayde ye israelitysh men ye fear god herken god ye people israel hath chose father hath exalted ye people whan straungers lande egypte exod c hyghe arme led tyme forty yeare dyd suffre theyr maners deserte destroyenge uen nacions ye lande chanaan iosu b distributed theyr lade lot iu thys nearehande hu dreth fyfty yeares gaue iudges vntyl samuel prophete regu aand desyred kyng reg aand gaue saul sonne ci man tribe ben iamin forty yeare reg c hym beynge put downe raysed vnto dauid kynge whome bearyng wytnesse dyd saye psal c haue founde dauid sonne iesse man harte whych shall wylles thys man sede reg c psal b accordyng ye promyse hath god brought forth vnto israel saueour iesvs ihon preachyng presence hys commyng baptyme penaunce vnto people israel whan ihon fulfylled course sayd math b ye suppose beholde commeth whose shues hys fete worthy lowse ye men brother ye chyldren abraham kynred amonge feare god math vnto worde thys health sente dwelte ierusalem hir ruler cor knowyng voyces ye prophetes red euery sabbat iudgynge haue fulfylled luce fyndynge cause death hym axed pilate myghte slaye hym whan fulfylled al thynges wrytten hym luce ctakynge hym tre layed hym graue god raysed hym deade thyrde day ioha sene many dayes math bwhych came vp also wyth hym fro galile ierusale whych hetherto actu aare hys wytnesses vnto people shewe promyse made vnto oure father god hath fulfylled ye vnto chyldren raysynge iesus christ also wrytten seconde psalme psal heb c thou art sone thys daye haue begotte yt hath raysed hym deade hence forth nomore returne vnto corrupcion sayeth thus esay shall geue holy conuenauntes dauid faythfully therfore sayeth another place psal athou shalte geue thy holy one se corrupcion dauid hys generacion serued wyll god regu b fell aslepe layed hys father sawe corrupcion god raysed deade sawe corrupcion therfore knowen vnto ye men brother luce thorowe forgeuenesse synnes shewed vnto al thynges wherin ye coulde iustifyed law moses hym euery one beleueth iustifyed beware therfore come vpon sayde prophetes aba beholde ye despysers wonder perysh worke dayes worke ye shal beleue yf ony man shall shewe wente prayed yt wolde speake wordes vnto vpon sabbat followynge whan synagoge letten go many iewes many strau gers seruynge god followed paule barnabas whych speakyng actu exhorted shuld remayne grace god next sabbat came together near hande whole cytie heare worde god iewes seyng people fylled wyth indignacion gaynsayd thynges spoken paule blasphemynge tha sayd paule barnabas boldely math c vnto oughte fyrst worde god spoken seynge ye refuse iudge selfe vnworthy euerlastyng lyfe beholde math turned vnto ye heythen hath lorde commaunded v esai b math b luce haue set lyght vnto heythen thou saluacion vnto vtmoost earth esa b heythen hearynge reioyced praysed worde lorde dyd beleue many ordyned afore vnto lyfe euerlastynge worde lorde spred abrode thorowe region tim b iewes moued ye deuoute honest woman chefe cytie raysed vp persecucion agaynste paule barnabas caste forthe theyr coastes math b marci b luce shakynge duste theyr fete came iconium disciple also fylled wyth ioye holy goost xiiii chapter fortuned iconium wente together synagoge iewes spake insomuche great multitude iewes grekes dyd beleue iewes whych vnbeleuynge raysed steared ye soules heythe anger agaynst brother therfore taryed great seaso quytyng theselues boldely ye lorde bearyng wytnesse ye word hys grace marci c grautyng token woders done theyr handes ye multitude ye cytie diuided truely wt iewes wt apostle wha ther happened insurreccion ye heythe iewes wt theyr ruler myght put shame stone perceauynge math c fled vnto cyties lycaonia lys ra derbe al contry rounde aboute preachynge gospell ye multitude moued theyr doctrine paule barnabas dyd abyde lystra lystra certayne man weake hys fete sat actu acrepell hys mother wombe whych neuer walked herde paule speakynge lokynge vpon hym seynge fayth yt myght made whole sayd wyth loude voyce ryse vpryght vpon thy fete esay lept walked whan people sawe paule done lyfte vp theyr voyce lycaonysh speche sayenge actu goddes become lyke vnto men come downe vnto v called barnabas iupiter paule mercury spechman ye word preste also iupiter whyche cytie bryngynge oxe garlandes dores wolde haue done sacrifice wyth people whych wha apostle barnabas paule herde rentynge theyr cote ranne people cryenge sayenge actu c apo b b ye men ye thynges also mortall men lyke vnto shewynge turne awaye vayne thynges lyuynge god psal actu apoc b whyche hathe made heauen earth see thynges whych tymes past suffered nacions walke theyr owne wayes rom verely wythout wytnesse hath lefte hym selfe doynge well geuynge rayne frutefull season fyllynge theyr harte wyth meates ioye sayenge thys scarce stylled people shulde offre vnto ther came certayne iewes antioche iconium people beynge persuaded co stonyng paule dyd drawe cytie supposynge hym haue ben deade disciple standynge compasse aboute hym rysynge vp wente cytie nexte daye wente wyth barnabas vnto derbe whan preached gospell vnto cytie taughte many returned lystra iconiu antioche strengthynge soules disciple andactu c c exhortynge shulde continue ye fayth luce tim b many tribulacions muste entre kyngdome god whan ordyned elder thorowe euery congregacio prayed wyth fastynges commended vnto ye lorde whome dyd beleue goynge thorowe pisidia came vnto pamphilia speakynge worde perge wente downe attalia thence sayled antioche actu fro whence delyuered vnto grace god worke whych fulfylled whan come gathered together congregacion shewed great thynges god done wyth opened dore fayth vnto ye heythen taryed lytle tyme wyth disciple xv chapter certayne commynge iewry taught ye brother gala wythout ye circumcysed maner moses ye saued wha ther therfore small dissencio raysed vnto paule barnabas agaynst gala ordyned paule barnabas shulde go vp vnto apostle elder ierusalem vpon thys question therfore beyng brought theyr waye congregacion wente thorowe phenice samaria shewynge conuersion heythe caused great ioye vnto brother whan come ierusalem actu b receaued congregacion apostle elder shewyng greate thynges god done wyth ther rose pharises secte whych beleued sayenge muste circumcised commaunde kepe lawe moses apostle elder dyd come together loke vpon matter whan great triall made peter rysyng vp sayd vnto ye brother ye know god old dayes dyd chose amog v yt thorow mouth heythen shulde heare worde gospell beleue god actu knoweth harte dyd beare wytnesse actu e geuynge holy goost vnto v made discrecion betwene v purgynge theyr harte faythe nowe therfore tempte ye god laye yocke vpon disciple neckes actu g whych nother father coulde beare ephe tit beleue saued grace oure lorde iesus christe lyke also multytude helde theyre peace herde barnabas paule shewynge great token wonder god done amonge ye heythen yt held theyr peace actu c b iames answered sayenge ye men brother herken vnto simon hath shewed howe god hath fyrst visited take people heythen vnto hys name vnto agre wordes prophetes wrytten amos c thys shall returne buylde agayne tabernacle dauid fallen downe shall buylde agayne hys decayes rayse reste men maye seke lorde heythen whyche name called vpon sayeth lorde doynge thynges knovven vnto god hys vvorke begynnynge vvorlde wherfore sentence heythen disquieted couerte vnto god wryte vnto absteyne themselues exod fylthynesse idol ephesi aand fornicacyon gen strangled bloude moses hath olde tyme euery cytie whych preach hym synagoges red euery sabbat pleased apostle elder wyth congregacion chose men amonge sende vnto antioche wyth paule barnabas ioh b iudas surnamed barsabas silas principall men amonge brother wrytynge theyr hades apostle elder brother wysh health vnto brother heythen yt antioche syria cylicia gala muche haue herde goynge amonge v haue disquieted subuertynge soules wyth wordes commaundynge circumcised kepe lawe haue commaunded hath pleased v beynge gathered together chose sende vnto wyth moost beloued barnabas paule men whyche actu c chaue delyuered theyr lyues name lorde iesus christ haue sente therfore iudas silas whyche themselues also shall wyth wordes shewe hath pleased holy goost v lay nomore charge vpon tha necessary poyntes ye absteyne selues zach cor c thynges offered vp vnto ydols bloude stranguled fornicacion kepynge selfe whych ye shall well fare ye well therfore beynge letten go wente downe antioche multytude beynge gathered delyuered lettre whych wha red reioyced consolacion iudas silas seynge prophetes also comforted brother wyth much preachyng stabylyshed whan ben certayne tyme let go peace brother vnto sente silas thoughte good remayne iudas went alone ierusalem gala paule barnabas remayned antioche preachynge shewynge wyth many worde god certayn dayes sayd paule vnto barnabas let v returnyge visite brother thorowe cyties haue preached ye worde lorde barnabas wolde haue taken wt also ihon whyche surnamed marke paule desyred hym actu whych departed pamphilia hadde gone worke shuld receaued ther happened dissencion insomuch departed asunder barnabas truly marke beynge taken wyth hym sayled vnto cypers paule si la beynge chosen departed beynge delyuered vnto grace god brother walked thorowe syria cilicia stablyshynge cogregacions commaundynge kepe commaundementes apostle elder xvi chapter bvt came vnto der e lystra beholde certayne disciple name timotheus sonne faythfull iewyshe woman hys father greke vnto dyd brethre lystra iconium geue good reporte wolde paule haue go forth wyth hym takynge cor c gala circumcised hym iewes quarter knewe hys father heythen whan wente thorow cyties toke sentence actu dthat decreed ierusalem apostle elder kep congregacions truely strengthed fayth increased nombre dayly rom b goynge thorowe phrigia region galatia forbydden ye holy goost speake ye word asia whan came misia assayed go bethinia sprete iesu permitted wha gone thorow mysia went downe vnto cor troas aactu b vision shewed vnto paule nyghte ther certayne man macedonia standynge besekynge hym sayenge commynge ouer macedonia helpe v sene vision strayght waye sought go forth actu ainto macedonia beynge certaynly persuaded god called v preache vnto saylynge troas came strayght course vnto samothracia nexte daye neapolis thence philippi whyche chefe cytie macedonia fre cytie remaynynge cytie certayne dayes vppon day sabbattes went forthe gate water prayer semed syttynge spake vnto wemen come together certayne woman name actu lydia seller purple ye cytie thyatira seruynge god dyd herken ioh whose harte lorde opened geue hede vnto thynges spoken paule whan baptysed hyr house prayed sayenge yf ye haue iudged beleuynge vnto ye lord entre house abyde gene luce c compelled v fortuned whyle went vnto prayer certayne damesell hauynge reg aa soythsayenge sprete mete v whyche brought greate gaynes vnto hyr lordes wyth soythsayenge followynge paule v cryed sayenge marc luce men seruauntes hyghe god whyche shewe waye saluacion thys dydde many dayes paule beynge sory beyng turned sayde vnto sprete commaunde name iesus christe go forth marc wente houre hyr lordes seynge hope theyr actu vauntage gone oute tessa takynge paule silas broughte iudgemente place ruler bryngynge vnto officer sayde men actu b trouble oure cytie seynge iewes shewe costume whyche lawfull v receaue seynge romanes people ranne officer theyr clothes beynge rente co maunded actu b cor beaten wyth roddes wha layed many strypes put preson comaundynge keper shulde diligently kepe whyche whan receaued suche commaundemente put ynner preson put theyr fete stockes actu dand mydnyghte paule silas worshippynge praysed god preson herde sodenly dyd ther happen great earthquake insomuch fundacions preson moued actu c forthwith dores opened bandes euery one lowsed keper preson beynge waked seynge ye dores ye preson open swearde drawen wolde haue slayen hymselfe supposynge presoners haue bene runne awaye paule cryed wt loude voyce sayeng thyselfe harme lyght called wente quakynge fell paule silas fete bryngynge forth sayd actu dsyrs must may saued sayde marci b ioha f beleue lorde iesus thou thy house shalbe saued spake worde lorde vnto hym hys house takynge houre nyght washed theyr strypes continently hys house baptysed whan brought hys house set table luce reioyced wyth hys house beleuynge god whan become daye officer sente sergeautes sayenge let men go keper preson shewed wordes vnto paule officer haue sente ye lowsed therfore ye gettynge henc go peace paule sayde vnto haue put v preson beynge romanes beaten openly vncondemned nowe thrust v preuely let come theselues thrust v sergeauntes shewed wordes vnto offycers afeared whan herde romanes commynge besought bryngynge forth math prayed wolde go forth cytie goyng ye preson went vnto actu b lydia brethre beynge sene comforted went theyr waye xvii chapter whan walked thorowe amphipo apolonia came thessalonica synagoge iewes hys wonte dyd paule go vnto vpon thre sabbates expouned scripture math c luce dopenynge shewynge behoued christ suffre ryse deade thys christ whome shewe vnto actu cand beleued ioyned paule silas heythen seruyng god great multitude fewe ye chefe wemen iewes hauynge indignacyon takynge wycked men commune sorte company gathered set ye cytie rore standynge house iason sought bringe forth amonge people whan foude delyuered iason brother vnto ruler cytie cryenge luce actu c set worlde rore come hether also iason hath taken vp contrary statute emperoure ioha c sayenge another kynge iesus troubled people ruler cytie hearynge thynges sufficient answer receaued iason let go forth wyth ye brethre nyght sent paule silas awaye berrhea whych whan come entred ye synagoge ye iewes wer getler tha thessalonica whych dyd receaue worde wyth harty desyre ioha searchynge scripture dayly whether truely many beleued ye heythenysh wemen men tessa c whan iewes thessalonica knowen worde god preached berrhea also paule came thyther also settynge rore troublynge ye multitude dyd brother strayght waye sende awaye paule shulde go vntyll see silas timotheus remayned coueyed paule brought hym vntyll athens commaundemente receaued vnto ssa silas timotheus yt haystely shulde come hym wente theyr waye whan paule taryed athens hys sprete steared wythin seynge cytie geuen ydolatry therfore disputed ye iewes synagoge wyth ye religious wyth resorted daylye vnto hym market place certayne philosopher epicure stoikes secte reasoned wyth hym sayd wyll thys babler saye sayd semeth shewer new deuels shewed iesu resurreccion vnto hym taken led hym areopagus place matter specially cocernig lyfe death e handled areopagus sayenge maye knowe thys newe doctrine taught thou bryngest certayne new thynges eares wyl therfore know thynges wyll al athenian straugers gaue themselues nothynge saue ether say heare newe thynge paule standynge myddes areopagus sayd ye athes se supersticious nearehande thynges goynge seynge youre ymages haue founde also altare wrytte vnknowen god therfore whych ye worshippe vnknowen shewe psal actu god made ye worlde thynges therein seynge lorde heauen earth dwellleth temple made wyth handes nother worshippped wt me ha de nedynge ony thynge seyng geueth al men lyfe breth al thynges hath made one kynde men dwell vpon whole face earth defynynge appoynted season border theyr dwellynge seke god yf happely maye fele fynde hym thoughe farre euery one v hym lyue moued also certayne youre owne atus poetes haue sayd also hys kynde seynge kynred god oughte thynke godheade lyke vnto golde syluer vnto stone connynge grauynge inue cion man rom truely god ouer seynge tymes thys ignorauce luce dhe doth shewe vnto men euery one euery repente hath appoynted daye wherein shal iudge worlde ryghteousnesse whome hath purposed offerynge fayth vnto men raysynge hym ye deade whan herde resurrreccion deade truly dyd mocke hym sayd wyll heare agayne thys thys maner wente paule myddes men beleuynge hym dyd cleue vnto hym amonge whych also dyonisius areopagita woman name damaris wyth xviii chapter thys beynge departed athens came corinthus fyndynge certayn iewe name rom tim caqu la borne potus lately come italy priscilla wyfe claudius co maunded iewes departe rome came craft dyd abyde wyth wrought tente maker disputed euery sabbat daye synagoge settynge forth ye meane whyle name lorde iesus exhorted iewes grekes actu c whan silas timotheus come macedonia paule diligente worde testifyenge vnto iewes iesus christ vpon gaynsayenge blasphemynge math b luce actu shakynge hys clothes sayd vnto youre bloude vpon owne heade hence forth shall go blamelesse vnto heythen remouynge thence entred house one name titus ryghteous seruynge god whose house ioyned vnto ye synagoge crispus chefe ruler synagoge ioha cor b beleued lorde wyth hys house many corinthian hearynge dyd beleue baptysed actu b b lorde sayde vnto paule vision nyght feare speake holde thy peace wyth noman shall set vpon maye hurte th haue much people thys cytie abode yeare syxe monethes teachinge worde god amonge whan gallio consul debite achia iewes rose vp agaynst paule wyth one mynde brought hym iudgemente seate sayenge thys followe doth persuade men worshippe god agaynst lawe paule begynnynge open hys mouthe gallio sayd vnto iewes actu c verely yf wrongeous dealynge wycked dede ye iewes wold ryght well forbeare yf question worde name lawe loke ye therto selues wyl iudge thynges warned iudgement seate al takynge cori c sosthenes ruler synagoge bet hym iudgement seate gallio cared none thynges whan paule taryed yet many dayes byddynge brother fare well sayled siria wyth hym priscilla aquila whyche shoren hys heade cenchreis nume b vowe came ephesus lefte beynge gone synagoge disputed wyth iewes whan prayed hym wolde abyde longer season dydde consente byddynge farewell sayenge must nedes kepe feast hande ierusalem actu wyl returne agayn vnto hebre iacob bgod wyllynge wente waye ephesus goynge downe cesarea wente vp saluted congregacion went downe antioche certayne season beynge past wete forth walkynge order thorowe regio gallatia phrigia stregthynge disciple certayne iewe name corin b c b apollo alexandria wel spoken man came ephesus mighty scripture taught waye lorde beynge whote sprete spake taught diligently thynges belonge vnto iesu knowynge onely baptyme ihon therfore bega behaue hymselfe boldly ye synagoge whome wha priscilla aquila herde toke hym taught hym ye way lorde diligently whan wold go achaia brother exhortynge wrote vnto disciple shuld receaue hym whan come helped muche dyd beleue ouercame iewes myghtely shewynge openly ioh ye scripture iesus christ xix chapter bvt fortuned wha apollo corinthus paule vpper partes beynge walked thorowe came ephesus dyd fynde certayne disciple sayde vnto haue ye beleuynge receaued holy gooste sayde vnto hym yee haue herde whether ther holy gooste sayde wherewyth ye baptysed whyche sayde wyth baptyme ihon paule sayde math b marc luce c ioh c ihon baptysed people wyth baptyme repentaunce sayenge shulde beleue hym shulde come hym iesus thynges beynge herde baptysed name lorde iesus whan paule layd handes actu bthe holy gooste came vpon spake wyth tunges prophecyed together nearehande twelfe beynge gone synagoge spake boldely thre monethes disputynge persuadynge ye kyngdom god wha hardened beleued cursyng waye lorde ye multitude departyng fro separated disciple disputynge dayly ye scole one tyrannus thys done two yeares longe muche al yt dwelt asia dyd hear worde ye lord iewes heythen marc c god dyd small myracles hande paule somuche also vpon ye sycke napkens partlets broughte fro hys body disease wente wycked spretes departed certayne vagabounde iewes coniurers assayed call name lorde iesus vpon euel spretes sayenge charge iesus whome paule preacheth seuen sonnes iewe name sceua hygh prest whyche dyd thys wycked sprete answerynge sayde vnto iesus knowe paule knowe ye man whome wycked deuell leapynge vppon hauynge gotten power ouercame insomuch naked wounded dyd flye house thys made knowen vnto iewes gentyles whych dyd dwel ephesus ther fell feare al ye name ye lord iesus magnifyed math many also beleuynge came confessyng shewynge theyr dedes many vsed curious craftes iere brought gether theyr bokes burnt al men price beynge couted fande mony fyfty thousande penny myghtely dyd worde god growe stablyshed wha thynges done paule purposed sprete macedonia achia beynge gone thorowe go ierusalem sayenge whan shal haue ben must se rome also rom sendynge two yt serued hym macedonia timothe erastus hymselfe remayned asia tyme cori b ther happened small trouble ye tyme waye lord one name demetrius syluersmyth makynge syluer shrynes diana brought vnto craftesmen lytle vautage callynge together lyke craftesmen sayd ye men ye knowe thys crafte haue gaynes ye heare se yt paule persuadynge hath wythdrawe much people ephesus also nearehand al asia sayeng goddes yt made wt handes thys parte shall onely dauger vnto v come reprofe ye teple also great diana shal set naught yee hyrmaieste shal begyn destroyed also al asia worlde doth worshippe thynges beynge herde fylled wyth wrath cryed sayenge great diana ephesian al cytie fylled wyth rumore made rushynge wyth one mynde ope place rom c gaius aristarchus macedonian paules fellowes beynge taken paule wyllynge go people dyd disciple suffre also chefe asia whych hys frendes set vnto hym prayenge wolde put hymselfe ope place cryed one another thynge congregacion order many knewe cause come together people drue forth alexander iewes thrustynge hym forwarde alexander actu silence beyng requyred hande wolde haue geuen people answere whome knewe iewe ther arose voyce cryenge ye space nearehande two houres greate diana ephesian whan towne clarke hadde stylled people sayde ye men ephesus amonge men knoweth cytie ephesian worshipper greate diana chylde iupiter seynge therfore thynges gaynsayde ye ought styl nothynge rashly ye haue brought men nother robber holy thynges nother blasphemynge goddesse yf demetrius craftesme wyth hym haue matter agaynst ony man lawe open ther consul debites let accuse
