one body truely ther many membres one body eye saye vnto hande haue nede thy helpe agayne heade vnto fete ye nedefull vnto much ye mebers ye body seme febler necessarye mebers ye body thynke vyler vpo put worshippe partes oures dishonest haue honesty oure honest partes haue nede nothyng god hath tempered ye body geuyng worshippe vnto dyd wante ther variaunce body yt mebers carefull ech yf one membre suffer ought mebers suffer wyth ether yf one membre reioyceth membres reioyce wyth ye body christe membres membre truly hath god ordined congregacion fyrst math luce ephes apostle secondarly prophetes thyrdly actu teacher power thence forth grace healynge helpynges gouernauces kyndes speches interpretacions sayenges apostle prophetes teacher al power haue grace healynges speake wyth tunges interprete couet ye ye best gyftes yet shewe excellent waye xiii chapter yf shall speake wyth tunges angel shall haue loue become soudyng brasse tynclynge bell math b yf shall haue prophecye shall knowe mysteryes knowlege yf shal haue al fayth insomuch luce shall remoue hylles shall haue charite nothynge yf shall distribute goodes meates vnto poore yf shal geue body shall burne shal haue charite profyteth nothynge loue paciente curteous loue doth enuy doth wyckedly pufte vp couetous honoure phili bshe seketh thynges hyr owne prouoked anger thynketh euell reioyceth ouer wyckednesse rereioyceth wt truth suffreth al thinges beleueth al thynges hopeth al thynges beareth vp al thynges loue neuer falleth awaye whether prophecyes shalbe voyded whether ye tuges shal ceasse whether knowlege shalbe destroyed part know part prophecy wha yt perfecte shal come shall parte voyded whan chylde spake chylde vnderstode chyld thought chylde whan become man dyd voyde thynges belonged chylde se nowe glasse euen darke speakynge tha face face knowe parte tha shal knowe also knowe abide faith hope loue thre greater loue xiiii chapter follow vpon loue couete spirituall thynges rather ye maye prophecye speaketh wyth tunge speaketh vnto men vnto god noman heareth sprete speaketh mystery prophecyeth speaketh vnto men vnto edifyenge exhortacion consolacion speaketh wyth tunge edifyeth hymselfe ye prophecieth edifyeth congregacion god wyll haue speake wyth tunges rather prophecye ye prophecyeth greater yt speaketh wyth tuges wyth interprete ye cogregacion may haue edifyenge brother yf shall come vnto speakyng wyth tunges shall profyte wtout shall speake vnto ether reuelacio knowlege prophecy doctrine moreouer ye thynges geuyng soude wythout lyfe whether pype harpe wythout geue distinccion soundes howe shall knowen pyped harped verely yf trompe geue vncertayne soude shall make hymself ready battayle euen ye also excepte ye geue manifest soude wyth tunge shall knowen spoken ye shalbe speakynge ayre many kyndes namely tunges ther world nothyng ther wythout voyce yf therfore shall knowe power ye voyce shalbe vnto hym whome speake barbarous yt speaketh barbarous vnto euen ye also ye couetous spretes seke ye maye plenteous edifyenge congregacyon therfore speaketh wyth tunge let hym praye maye also interprete yf praye tunge sprete prayeth mynde wythoute frute therfore shall pray wyth sprete shall praye wyth mynde shall synge wt spret shall synge wyth mynde moreouer yf thou shalte blesse sprete shall yt supplyeth ye rowme ye laye saye amen vpo thy blessynge seynge knoweth yu doest saye thou dede thankest wel edifyed thake god yt speake wyth tunge euen ye co gregacion wolde leuer speake fyue wordes wyth myne vnderstandyng maye teach also tha ten thousande wordes wyth tuge ephe abrethren become chyldren vnderstandynges wyckednesse chyldren perfect vnderstadynges wrytte lawe esay b wyth tuges wyth lyppes wyl speake vnto people shal hear nother sayeth ye lord actu b therfore tunges token vnto faythful vnfaythfull prophecyes vnto ye vnfaythfull faythful yf ye whole cogregacio therfor come together speake wt tunges ther shulde entre vnlearned vnbeleuyng shal saye yt ye mad yf al prophecye ther entre ony infydele vnlearned ouercome iudged hyd thynges hys harte become manifeste fallynge downe vpon face shall worshippe god sayeng god truth amonge brother whan ye come together euery one hath psalme hath doctrine hath reuelacion hath tunge hath interpretacion let thynges done edifyenge yf ony man speake ye tunge let done twayne moost thre partes let one interprete yf ther interpreter let hym kepe silence congregacion let hym speake hymself god prophetes let two thre speake ioha let iudge yf shewed reuelacion vnto syttynge let ye fyrst holde hys peace ye maye al prophecye one yt al may learne maye exhorted spretes prophetes subiecte vnto prophetes god god disse sion rom peace teach congregacions sayntes cori tim blet wemen kepe silence ye co gregacions permytted vnto speake subiecte gene c lawe also sayeth yf wyll learne ought let axe theyr husbandes home vncoly vnto woman speake congregacion worde god come forth come vpon yf ony man semeth prophete spirituall let hym knowe thynges wryte vnto co maudementes ye lorde yf ony man knoweth shal knowen therfore brethre couet prophecye forbyd speake wyth tunges collo let al thynges done honestly order amonge xv chap gal b wete brethre ye gospel yt whych haue preached vnto yt whych ye haue receaued yt also ye stade ye also ye saued maner haue preached vnto yf ye kepe excepte ye haue beleued vayne fyrst delyuerd vnto yt also receaued ye esay christ dyed synnes accordyng scripture buried math b ioh rose agayne thyrde daye accordynge scripture luce b sene vnto cephas vnto eleuen sene fyue hundreth brother together whyche remayne yet hetherto aslepe sene iames ye apostle last al sene also one borne tyme ephe b leest apostle worthy called apostle actu haue persecuted cogregacion god grace god hys grace voyde haue laboured plentyfully grace god whether whether haue preached thus ye haue thus beleued yf christ preached yt rysen fro ye dead amoge say yt ther resurreccion fro ye dead yf ther resurrectio fro dead tha christ ryse nother yf christ ryse oure preachyng nought fayth also voyde foude false wytnesses god haue boren wytnesse god yt hath raysed christe whome hath raysed yf deade ryse yf dead ryse nother dyd christ ryse agayn yf christ dyd ryse agayn fayth vayne ye yet synnes therfor also yt falle aslepe christ peryshed yf hopynge christe onely thys lyfe wretched men nowe christe rysen deade collos bfyrst frutes slepynge man truely death man resurreccion deade dye adam euen shall made alyue christe euery one hys order fyrste frutes christe christes whyche haue beleued hys commynge shalbe ende whan shall haue geuen kyngdome vnto god father whan shall haue voyded rule superiorite power psal b hebr b bfor behoueth hym raygne vntyll put hys enemyes vnder hys fete last shal enemye death destroyed hath put thynges vnder hys fete wha sayeth math e luce c ioha e phili thynges put vnder hys fete wythout doute saue hym whych hath put thynges vnder hym wha al thynges shalbe put vnder tha shal ye sonne hym selfe also subiect vnto hym hath made al thynges subiecte vnto hym god may el shall yt baptysed ye deade yf ye dead ryse intente baptysed stande also yeopardy euery houre dye daylye cause reioycynge brother whych haue christ iesu lorde yf haue foughten wyth beastes maner man cori b ephesus profyteth yf deade ryse agayne esay b sapi alet v eate drynke tomorowe shal dye deceaued euell comunicacios corruppe good manersmenade awaken ryghtfully synne ignoraunt god speake shame vnto body wyll saye howe deade ryse agayne wt body shall come thou foole ioha cthat whych thou sowest quickened wythout fyrst dye sowest thou thou sowest body yt shalbe bare corne namely wheate ony ye god geueth bodye wyl vnto euery one sedes hys owne bodyall flesh one maner fleshe men beastes birdes fyshes ther heauenly bodyes earthy bodyes ther another glory truely heauely another earthy math ther one clearnesse sone another moone another clearenesse starres one starre differreth fro another clearnesse euen ye resurreccion deade sowen corrupcion shal ryse vncorrupcion sowe vylenesse shall ryse glory sowen weaknesse shal ryse power sowen naturall body shall ryse spirituall yf ther natural body ther spiritual also wrytten gen b fyrste adam made lyuynge soule laste adam quyckenynge sprete spirituall fyrst naturall spirituall fyrst man earth earthy seconde man heauen heauenly ye earthy suche earthy also heauenly suche heauely also therfore haue boren ymage earthy let v also beare image heaue ly saye brother fleshe bloude possesse ye kyngdome god nother shall corrupcion possesse vncorrupcion beholde tell mysterye te c shall slepe dede shall phil c chaunged momente twynclynge eye last trompe trompe shall blowe deade shall ryse rom col phili c ioh vncorrupte shalbe chaunged thys corruptible must put vncorrupcion thys mortall must put immortalite wha thys mortall shall haue put immortalite shal sayenge wrytte befall esay b death swalowed vp ye victory thy victory death osee c heb adeath thy stynge stynge death synne power synne lawe thankes vnto god ioha whych hath geuen v victory thorowe oure lorde iesus christe therfore beloued brethre stedfast vnmouable beynge alway rych euery worke lord knowynge yt laboure vayne lorde xvi chapter bvt ye rom cori gatherynges yt made ye sayntes haue ordined ye co gregacios galatia eue ye also vpon one sabbat let euery one laye asyde hymselfe layenge store doth please hym well yt whan shall come ye gatherynge done whan shalbe present whome ye shal alowe letter shall sende cary grace vnto ierusalem yf shalbe mete go shal go wt actu cor c wyll come vnto whan shal haue gone thorow macedonia shall go thorow macedonia shal perchauce abyde wyth wynter also yt ye maye brynge soeuer shal go wyl se passynge trust tary certayne seaso yf god shal suffre actu wyl tary ephesus vntyl wytsontyde great euident dore opened vnto cori many aduersaryes act c yf timotheus shal come loke yt wtout feare wt worketh ye worke ye lord also let noma therfore despyse hym coueye hym peace yt maye come vnto loke hym wt brethre ye brother apollo certifye yt besoughte much yt wold come vnto wt ye brethre verely hys wyl yt shuld come shal come wha shalbe oportunite watch ye stade ye faith quite like coforted let al thynges loue brethre besek ye know ye house cor stephana fortunatus achaicus yt ye fyrst frutes achia haue ordined theselues vnto ministracio ye sayntes yt ye also subiect vnto vnto euery one workynge labourynge wyth reioyce presence stephana fortunatus achaicus wantinge vnto haue supplyed haue refreshed sprete knowe therfore congregacions asia salute aquila prisca grete much lorde wyth hys householde congregacion wyth whome also lodged brother salute rom b salute one another holy kysse salutacion paule gala b wyth myne owne hande yf ony doth loue oure lorde iesus christ cursed vnto death anathe mamaranatha grace lorde iesus christ wyth loue wyth christe iesu amen pthe ende fyrst epistle paule ye apostle corinthian seconde epistle apostle paule corinthian fyrst chapter paule apostle iesus christ ye wyll god brother timotheus vnto congregacion god whych corinthus wyth al sayntes achia gala ephe grace wyth peace god father lorde iesus christe petri blessed god father oure lorde iesus christ father mercyes god consolacion whych comforteth v oure trouble able also comforte euery anguyshe exhortacion wyth also exhorted god col cfor sufferynges christe plenteous v euen also consolacion plenteous thorowe christe whether troubled exhortacion saluacion whether comforted consolacion whether exhorted admonicion health whyche doth worke sufferauce ye grefes whych also suffre oure hope sure knowynge ye partaker sufferynges shall ye also comforte wyll haue ignoraunte brother oure trouble actu c whych happened asia measure greued aboue power insomuche lothed v also lyue answere death ourselues yt trustynge ourselues regu b god whyche rayseth deade whych hath delyuered ryd v many parels whome trust shall yet also delyuer v phil yf helpe also youre prayer v cori c many person thankes maye geuen hym v gyfte v oure prayse thys namely ye wytnesse conscience haue conuersacion thys worlde synglenesse harte syncerenesse god carnal wysdome grace god plentyfully warde wryte none thynges vnto saue ye haue red knowe trust ye shall know v vntyll ende ye haue knowen v partely youre reioycynge daye oure lorde iesus christ phili b tessa c ye also cor thys confidence wolde fyrste haue come vnto ye myght haue seconde grace go macedonia come agayne macedonia brought iewry whan therfore thus mynded dyd vse ony lyghtnesse thynges yt mynde mynde flesh math iaco c wyth yee naye god faythful worde whych yee naye hym yee hym iesus christ sonne god whych hath ben preached amonge v namely syluanus timotheus yee nay hym hym yee many promyses god hym yee therfore saye amen vnto god hym vnto prayse rom b stablysheth v wyth christe god whyche hath also anoynted v whyche hath ephe c sealed v hath geuen earnest sprete oure harte rom take god recorde agaynste soule fauourynge came nomore corinthus pet lordes ouer fayth helper youre ioye ye stande fayth ii chapter bvt haue determined thys lest shuld come agayne vnto sorowfulnesse yf make sory ca make glad saue made sorowful thys haue wrytten vnto haue sorow whan shal come whome ought reioyce trustyng ioye ioye wrote vnto great trouble anguyshe hart wyth many teares ye sory ye maye knowe loue haue plentifully yf ony man hath made sorowful hath made sorowful partly charge cor rebuke done many suffiseth hym suche one contrarywyse ye rather forgeue comforted left one swalowed vp wyth ouer great heuynesse wherfore praye yt ye stablyshe loue hym therfore haue wrytte vnto may knowe ye profe whether ye obedient al thynges whome ye haue forgeuen oughte hym forgeue also also haue forgeuen yf haue forgeuen oughte sake haue forgeuen ye persone god begyled satan knowe thoughtes wha come actu b troada gospel christ dore opened vnto lorde rest spret dyd fynde titus brother byddinge farewell wente forth macedonia god thanked whych alwaye geueth v victorye christ iesu collos c maketh manifeste odoure hys knowlege euery place thorowe v ye good sauoure christe vnto saued vnto perysh luce cvnto truely sauoure death vnto death vnto sauoure lyfe vnto lyfe mete vnto thynges many counterfaytynge worde god speake syncerenesse god god christ iii chapter begynne agayne praise ourselues nede letter comendacion vnto ye oure lettre wrytte harte whych knowen redde men beynge made knowen yt ye lettre christ mynistred v wrytten wt ynke sprete ye lyuyng god exod c table stone iere e fleshy table harte haue truste vnto god thorowe christe sufficient thynke ought selues v phili bbut sufficiecy god also hath made v mete cori cor minister newe testamente ye letter sprete ye lettre deute c kylleth sprete quickeneth yf ministracion death wrytte wyth letter ye stone vnto glory exodi insomuch chyldre israel coulde loke face moses glory visage yt whych made voyde shall actu ministracion ye spret glory yf ministracion damnacion vnto glory much doth ye ministryng ryghteousnesse excede glory shynynge behalfe glorifyed nother excellent glory yf yt whych done awaye thorow glory much abydeth glorye hauynge therfore hope vse greate confidece moses exod dyd put couerynge vpon hys face chyldre israel shulde loke hys face whyche done away theyr myndes esay b math b made dull vntyll thys daye remayneth thesame couerynge vntake awaye readynge olde testamente christe take awaye vntyll thys daye whan moses red couerynge put vpon theyr harte rom cbut whan shalbe turned vnto lorde couerynge shalbe taken awaye ioh cfor lorde sprete sprete lorde lybertye beholdyng glory lorde wyth open face chaunged ye lykenesse clearenesse clearnesse euen ye sprete ye lord iiii chapter therfore hauynge thys ministracion accordynge haue optayned mercy faynte put awaye secretes dishonesty walkynge suttylty counterfaytyng worde god commendynge oure selues euery conscience men vtterynge truth god yf gospell also hyd hyd vnto perysh amonge god thys worlde esay b ioh ehath blynded myndes ye vnfaythful lyghtenynge gospell ye glory christ col b whych ye ymage god shyne vnto preach ourselues iesus christ lorde v youre seruauntes thorowe iesus christ god gene dyd comaude lyght shyne darkenesse petri hath shyned oure harte shynynge clearnesse knowlege god ye face christ iesu haue thys treasure cori aearthen vessel excellecy power god v suffre trouble place put distresse enpoueryshed destituted suffre persecucio forsaken brought lowe brought confusion thrust downe perysh gala b bearynge alway dyenge iesu christ body ye lyfe iesus also made manifest bodyes rom c lyue alway delyuered death iesus yt lyfe also iesus may shewed mortal flesh death therfore worketh v lyfe hauyng ye sprete fayth wrytte psal haue beleued wherfore haue spoken also beleue wherfore speake also knowyng yt hath raysed iesus shal rayse v also wt iesus shal set v wt al thynges done sake yt cor b abundaut grace may plenteous geuyng thakes many vnto glory god ye cause faynte though outward man corrupe ye yt inward renewed daye daye psal rom cfor trouble yt whyche teporall lyghte worketh v weyght glorye ye heyght measure vnto v beholdynge ye thinges yt sene yt ar sene ye thinges yt sene teporal yt sene eternal v chapter know yf cori b erthy house dwellynge lowsed haue buyldyng god house made wyth handes euerlastynge ye heauens rom c therfore sygh desyrynge clothed wyth habitacion heauen apo yf leest founde clothed naked also petri c thys tabernacle syghe beynge laden desyre spoyled clothed vpon mortall swalowed vp lyfe yt doth ordyne v therto god rom b cor cwhych hath geue v ye earnest ye sprete therfore alway bold knowynge yt longe body ar absent fro ye lord wader thorow fayth syght good harte haue good wyl rather absent fro ye body preset wt ye lorde therfor endeuour ether beyng absete preset please hi math c rom b al must appeare ye iudgemete seate christ yt euery man receaue deseruinges ye body hath done ether good euel therfore knowyng ye fear god speake fayre vnto vnto god ar manifest trust yt manifest coscieces also cori ado agayn prayse ourselues geue occasion reioyce v yt ye may haue answer yt reioyce ye face ye hart yf past mynde vnto god yf measurable ye loue christe doth costraine v thynkyng yt yf one dead al tha al dead te b christ dyed al also yt lyue liue vnto theselues vnto yt dyed ryse agayn therfore also henceforth knowe noma ye flesh though haue knowe christ ye flesh tyme know yf ther therfor ony creature christ newe creature ye olde past esa c apo behold al thynges become new al thynges god hath reco ciled v vnto thorow christ hath geue vnto v ye office reco cilyng col b god christ rom c collo b ioha b settyng ye worlde atone wt hymselft imputyng theyr synnes hath put v worde recocilynge go therfore embassage christ though god dyd exhorte v pray christ sake recociled vnto god esay hym yt knowe synne dyd make rom hebre c synne v shulde become ryghteousnesse god hym vi chapter bvt helping exhort yt ye receaue ye grace god vayne sayeth esay b tyme acceptable haue herd ye day saluacio haue holpen ye behold acceptable tyme daye health geuynge vnto ony occasio stoblyng yt office blamed thynges let v behaue selues cori cori minister god much paciece tribulacios necessittes anguish strypes prisometes vprours laboures watchinges fastinges chastite knowlege loge suffrauce kyndnes ye holy goost loue vnfayned ye word truth ye power god ye armoure ryghteousnesse ye ryghtsyde ye leftsyde glory vylenesse euel report good report deceauers yet true yt vnknowe yet knowe esay c dyenge behold lyue beynge chastened kylled sory yet alwaye reioycynge hauyng nede yet making many rych hauyng nothyng possessynge al thynges mouth open vnto ye corinthian hart enlarged ye straytnesse sake ye straytnesse inwarde mocion say vnto vnto chyldre hauynge lyke reward set yourselues large also deut adraw yocke wt ye infidel partakyng hath ryghteousnesse wt wyckednesse fellowship hath lyght wt darknesse math agremet hath christ wyth belial part hath ye beleuyng wt ye vnbeleuyng cosetynge hath ye teple god wt idol cori b c ye ye te ple ye lyuyng god god sayeth leui b ezech wyll dwell wyll walke amoge shalbe theyr god shalbe people vnto esay b wherfore go ye fro ye myddes separate sayth ye lord touch vncleane thynge shal receaue shalbe father vnto ye shalbe sone vnto doughters sayeth lord almygty vii chapter let v therfore ye beloued hauyng promyses clense v fro al fylthynesse ye flesh sprete fulfyllyng ye hallowyng ye feare god vnderstade ye v haue hurt noma haue corrupte noma haue begyled noma say co denacion haue said afore ye oure harte dye lyue together haue greate boldnesse warde haue much reioycynge youre behalfe fylled wyth comforte ouerflowynge wyth ioye trouble actu b whan come mac donia also ou fleshe reste suffred tribulacion outwardly fyghtynges inwardly feares ye cor god yt comforteth lowly coforted v also comynge titus onely hys comynge also ye cosolacion wt coforted shewynge v youre desyre wepynge youre zele reioyced though haue made sory epistle repeteth though dyd repente glad seynge yt letter hath made sory although season ye made sory ye ar made sory repetauce ye made sory god yt nothynge ye shulde suffre harme v pet cfor ye sorowe yt god worketh stedfast repetauce saluacion eccli c worldly sorow worketh death behold sorowyng god carefulnes worketh nothynge defence displeasure feare desyre feruete mynde punyshmet al thynges haue ye declared youreselues vnblameable thys busynesse therfore though wrote dyd hym yt dyd ye hurt yt suffred declare ye carefulnesse yt haue befor god therfore also comforted cosolacio coforted fullyer ouer ye ioye titus yt sprete refreshed yf haue made ony boast hym ame ashamed haue spoken al thynges truth vnto euen reioycyng towarde titus become truth hys inwarde affeccion plentifully towarde remebryng obedience howe ye receaued hym wyth feare tremblynge glad thynges bolde youwarde viii chapter certifye brother grace god yt whych geuen co gregacions macedonia abudauce theyr ioye much triall tribulacion theyr moost extreme pouerte dyd ouerflowe ye ryches theyr synglenesse beare recorde wyllynge accordynge theyr power aboue theyr power requyrynge v wyth great instauce grace comunion actu rom cori cor handereachynge done vnto ye sayntes supposed yelded themselues fyrst vnto ye lorde vnto v wyll god insomuch yt prayed titus dyd begynne thys grace amonge wolde lykewise make ende ye ple teous thynges fayth hope worde knowlege carefulnesse moreouer loue also v warde ye wyll ryfe thys grace also saye commaundynge carefulnesse assayeng good nature also rom b ye knowe liberalite lorde iesus christe youre sake became poore whan rych hys pouerte ye myght rych geue counsell profytable vnto whych yeare ago haue begonne also wyll nowe accomplyshe wyth dede also lyke wyllynge mynde readye lykewyse fulfyll petr b prouer b whych ye haue luce yf wyl ready accepte accordyng hath accordyng hath let abudauce supplye theyr nede set large ye smarte equalite thys tyme let abundauce supply theyr nede theyr abundaunce also supplyenge nede ther maye equalite wrytten exod gathered much gathered lytle dyd wante geue thakes vnto god whych hath geuen carefulnesse harte titus toke ye admonicion dede whan carefull wente vnto hys owne wyll haue sent wyth hym also brother whose prayse gospell thorowe congregacions also ordined congregacions companion yourney thys grace whych ministred v vnto glory lorde oure appoynted wyll beynge ware thys namely noma blame v fulnesse whyche ministred v vnto glory lord rom c prouyde good thynges god also haue sente wyth brother also whome haue ofte proued many thinges careful muche carefull cause greate boldnesse towarde whether titus whyche companion helper amonge brethre ye apostle ye glorye congregacions christ shewe therfore vnto ye syght cogregacions ye declarynge loue tessa c reioycynge ix chapter wryte vnto rom cori cori athe handreachynge done vnto ye sayntes superfluous knowe ready mynde whych boast macedonian sayenge achaia also ready sece ye yeare last past feruent desyre hath prouoked many haue sent brother thyng wherof reioyce made voyde thys behalfe yt haue sayd ye may ready lest wha macedonia shal come fynde ready wyl saye ye ashamed thys substaunce thought therfore necessary desyre brother yt come vnto prepare blyssynge yt ready though blessynge couetousnesse thys saye prou c gal soweth sparyngly shal also reap sparyngly yt soweth blessynges shal also reape blessynges euery hath purposed harte euell wyll compulsion exod god loueth chearefull geuereccli god able make euery grace plenty hauynge alwaye sufficiecy ye maye plenteous euery good worke wrytten psal b hath sparsed abrode hath geuen vnto poore hys righteousnesse abydeth euer yt geueth sede vnto ye sower shall also geue breade eate actu e shal multiplye sede shal augmente ye increase ye frutes ryghteousnesse thynges beynge made rych ye maye pletous al synglenesse whych worketh geuynge thakes vnto god v seruice thys office doth supplye ye thynges sayntes wante also abundaunt geuynge many thankes vnto lorde praysynge god profe thys seruyce obedience knowlegyng gospell christe synglenesse distributynge vnto men theyr prayer longynge abundaunte grace god thanke god hys vnoutspeakeable gyfte x chapter paul beseke thorowe mekenesse softenesse christe whyche beynge presente amonge reputacion beynge absente ame bolde towarde pray beynge presente bolde wyth thesame boldnesse ame supposed bolde agaynst thynke v walke ye fleshe walkyng flesh warre flesh ephe b weapens warre fleshlye myghtye god destruccion stroge holdes bryngynge nought counsel heyght auauncynge selfe agaynst knowlege god bryngyng bondage vnderstandynge vnto obedience christ beynge readye auenge disobedience whan obedience shalbe fulfylled loke thynges vtter appearauce yf ony trusteth hymselfe christes let hym thynke thys agayn hymself christes also though shulde boaste myselfe somewhat power cor whych lorde hath geuen v edifienge destruccion wyl ashamed lest shulde supposed fraye wyth letter letter saye weyghty stronge ye presence body weake speche vnregarded let suche one thynke thys suche worde letter beynge absent also dede beynge presente dare interpryse compare v prayse themselues measurynge comparynge ourselues oureselues wyll reioyce ouer ephes measure accordynge ye measure rule wherewyth god hath appoynted vnto v rule reache vnto stretch oureselues reachynge vnto come vntyl gospell christ reioycynge measure men laboures hauynge hope increasynge fayth shall become great accordynge oure rule ouer flowynge intende also preache vnto yt beyonde myndynge reioyce laboures prepared another ma measure esay c iere cor reioyceth let hym reioyce lorde pro prayseth alowed whome god prayseth xi chapter wolde god ye wolde suffre lytle foolyshnesse forbeare also gelous ouer wyth godly gelousy haue maryed vnto one man bryng chaste virgine vnto christ feare left gene serpent dyd begyle eua wyth hys craftynesse eue wyttes corrupte also fal awaye synglenesse christ iesu gala yf co meth preacheth another christ haue preached yf ye receaue another sprete whome ye haue receaued another gospell whyche ye haue receaued ye myght ryght well haue suffered suppose haue done nothynge lesse hygh apostle though rude worde knowlege thynges manifest vnto haue synned hublynge myselfe yt ye shulde e alted haue preached gospell paragraph frely vnto haue spoyled congregacions takyng wage seruyce vnto actu cand wha nede chargeable vnto noma phil c wantyng vnto dyd brother supplye came fro macedonia thynges kept selfe wythout charge wyll kepe truely truth christ thys reioycynge shall disanulled region achaia wherfore loue god knoweth shall maye cut awaye occasion couet occasion reioyce founde also suche false apostle deceatful worker trasfigurynge themselues messaungers christe maruayle satanas doth trasfigure hymselfe angell lyght therfore maruayle yf hys minister transfigured minister ryghteousnesse petri whose ende shal accordynge theyr workes agayne saye lest ony thynke foole el take foole also maye boast lytle whyche speake speake god foolyshnesse thys reasonynge boastynge many reioyce flesh wyll reioyce also ye suffre fooles gladly insomuche ye wyse yourselues ye suffre yf ony man brynge bondage yf ony man deuoure yf ony man robbe yf ony man auaunce hymselfe yf ony man beate face saye rebuke though ben weake thys behalfe actu phil wherein ony dare bold speake foolyshnesse dare bolde also hebrues also israelite also sede abraham also cori minister christ also foole speake many trauails presonmentes abudauntly strypes aboue measure death ofte ye iewes haue receaued deut fyue tymes forty strypes one lesse act haue thryse ben beaten wyth roddes actu ci haue bene stoned act c haue thryse suffred shipwracke haue nyght daye depth see yournyes oft peryls floodes peryls murtherers peryls kynred peryls heythen peryls cytie peryls wyldernesse peryls see peryls false brother laboure trauayle many watchynges honger thyrste many fastynges colde nakednesse besyde thynges outwarde actu dayly combraunce care congregacions cori weake weake offended burne yf must reioyce wyll reioyce thynges yt weaknesse god father lord iesus christ whych blessed euer gal cknoweth lye actu damascus dyd gouernoure people kynge aretas watche cytie damascene myght take wyndow let downe basket thorowe wall escaped hys handes xii chapter yf must boast truely nedeful wil come vision reuelacions lorde knowe christ fourtene yeares ago whether body whether wythout body tell god knoweth thesame haue ben taken vp vntyll thyrde heauen know thesame man whether bodye whether wythout body tell god knoweth taken vp paradyse herde secrete wordes whych leafull man speake thynge wyl reioyce nothynge weakenesses although wold reioyce shall foolysh shall tell truthe refrayne lest ony man estyme aboue yt seyth heare ought ioh b leste greatnesse reuelacions exalte ther geuen vnto stynge fleshe messaunger satanas buffet ye whyche haue prayed lorde thryse shulde departe fro sayd vnto grace suffiseth strength made perfect weaknesse wyll therfore gladly reioyce sycknesses power christe maye dwell whych cause contente sycknesses rebuke nedes persecucions anguyshes christe whan anie weake anie stronge become foole ye haue compelled ought praysed cor aseynge haue done nothyng lesse apostle measure although nothynge yet ar ye toke apostle wrought vpon pacience token wonder power ye haue lesse congregacions saue myselfe haue ben chargeable vnto forgeue thys wronge beholde thys thyrd tyme ready come vnto shal greuous vnto actu c seke thynges nother ought ye chyldren gather treasure vnto elder elder vnto chyldren wyll gladly bestowe wyll myselfe bestowed soules though louynge ouermuch lytle loued agayne let haue charged much crafty toke wyth gyle haue begyled ony sente vnto desyred titus wyth hym sente brother hath titus begyled haue walked one sprete haue gone lyke footesteppes ye thynke excuse v speake god christ thynges moost beloued done edifyenge feare lest perchaunce wha shall come shall fynde suche wold founde one ye wolde gala lest happely ther among stryfes enuyes hyghmyndes debate backbytynges whisperinges swellinges vprours leste whan shall come agayne god brynge lowe amoge bewayle many whych haue synned afore haue repeted ouer theyr corin vnclennesse whoredome fylthynesse haue commytted xiii chapter beholde thys thyrde tyme come vnto deut c mat b ioha b heb c mouthe two thre wytnesses shal euery matter stande haue sayd tell present nowe absente vnto haue synned vnto rest yf shall come agayne shall spare ye seke profe hym math c speaketh namely christe whyche weake amonge myghtye amonge though crucifyed thorowe weaknesse yet lyueth ye power god also weake hym lyue wt hym power god cor proue ye youre selues whether ye fayth make search selues knowe ye selues yt christe iesus wythout happely ye castawayes trust ye knowe castawayes praye god ye euell seme alowable ye good castawayes nothyng agaynst ye truth wyth truth reioyce yt weake ye stronge thys also wish namely perfectnesse therfore wryt thynges beynge absente beynge presente vse myselfe hardlye accordynge power cor b lorde hath geuen edifyenge destruccion farthermore brother reioyce perfecte exhorte yourselues one mynde haue peace ye god peace loue shalbe wyth rom bsalute ech wt holy kysse ye sayntes salute grace lorde iesus christe loue god ye fellowship holy goost wyth amen pthe ende ye secode epistle paule ye apostle corinthian epistle apostle paule galathians fyrst chapter paule apostle iesus christe god ye father whych hath raysed deade brother wyth vnto congregacions galatia cor ephe pet grace wyth peace god oure father oure lorde iesus christe whych hath geuen selfe oure synnes shulde drawe v thys presente euell worlde accordyng wyll god father vnto glory euer euer amen maruayl ye soone turned fro hym whych hath called vnto ye grace christ vnto another gospell whych nothyng el saue ther trouble tu wyll turne gospell christ though angell heaue preach ought vnto saue haue preached vnto thesame cursed cori haue sayd saye agayne yf ony preache ought vnto besyde ye haue receaued thesame cursed speak fayre vnto vnto god seke please men ioha f iacob yf dyd yet please men seruaunte christe te b certifye brother gospell preached dyd receaue learned man reuelacion iesus christe ye haue herde conuersacion somtyme iewyship actu dyd persecute congregacion god measure droue preuayled ye iewyshyppe aboue many fellowes nacyo ph l beynge feruente louer tradicions father whan hadde pleased hym hadde sundered fro mother wombe actu b b hadde called hys grace myght declare hys sonne shulde preache hym amonge gentyles strayght waye dyd graunt vnto math c flesh bloude nother dyd come ierusalem vnto predecessours ye apostle wet arabia come agayne damascus afterward thre yeare dyd come ierusalem se peter abode wt hym fyftene dayes haue sene none apostle saue iams ye brother lorde thinges wryte vnto beholde cori god knoweth lye dyd come partes syria cilicia face vnknowen congregacion iewry whyche christe neuerthelesse herde dyd somtyme persecute v doth nowe preach fayth whyche destroyed somtyme praysed god ii chapter fourtene yeare actu went vp ierusalem agayne wyth barnabas titus also beynge taken wyth wente vp reuelacion dyd compare wyth gospell preach among heythen specially semed oughte leste shulde runne runne vayne actu cori c neuerthelesse nother titus whyche wyth heythen compelled circumcised certayne false brother preuelye broughte whych came secretly spye oute lyberte whyche haue christe iesu myght bryng v bondage vnto whome gaue rowme ye space houre truth ye gospell remayne wyth dyd seme somwhat haue ben somtyme maketh matter actu rom b ephes god doth accepte persone yt semed ought auayled nothyng contrarywyse whan sene gospel heythenshippe comytted vnto vnto peter also circu cisio wrought peter gospell circucisio wrought also amonge heythe whan iames cephas ihon whyche semed stayes dyd perceaue grace geuen actu dthey gaue ryghthades fellowshippe vnto barnabas amonge heythen amonge circumcision onely shulde myndefull ye poore actu c cori athe whyche thynge also carefull whan peter came antioche wythstode hym face blameable afore yt dyd come iames dyd eate wyth heythen whan come wythdrew separated hymselfe fearyng circumcision vnto hys dissemblynge dyd reste iewes consente insomuche barnabas also drawen simulacion wha sene yt dyd walke ryghtly ye truth ye gospell sayd ynto cephas yf thou wha thou art iewe doest lyue heithenyshly iewishly doest yu copel ye heythe lyue ye iewes phili awe iewes nature synners heythen rom b knowynge yt man iustified workes lawe saue fayth iesus christ also beleue iesus christ may iustified ye fayth christ ye dedes ye lawe ye dedes lawe shall flesh iustifyed yf sekyng made ryghteous christ founde synners also christ ye minister synne farre yf buyld agayne ye thinges yt haue destroyed make myselfe trespasser rom c ye law dead vnto ye lawe yt may lyue god wyth christ crucifyed lyue christe lyueth lyue nowe fleshe lyue fayth ye sonne god ephe whych hath loued hath geuen hymselfe cast awaye grace god gal bfor yf ryghteousnesse ye lawe dyed christ nought iii chapter ye wytlesse galathians gala hath bewitched obey truth whose eye christ iesus despysed amonge crucifyed wolde learne haue ye receaued sprete workes lawe hearynge fayth ye vnwyse wha ye haue begon ye sprete ye nowe ende ye flesh haue ye suffred great thynges vayne yf el vayne therfor yt gaue ye sprete worketh miracle amog doth ye dedes lawe hearynge fayth wrytten gene b rom iacob c abraham dyd beleue god counted hym vnto ryghteousnesse knowe therfore fayth abraham chyldren ye scripture knowynge afore god iustifyeth heythen fayth tolde abraham gene c shal nacions blessed therfore fayth shalbe blessed faythful abraham workes lawe vnder curse wrytten u c cursed euery one shall abyde thynges wrytten ye boke lawe noman iustifyed god lawe manifest abacuc rom b ryghteous lyueth fayth law fayth leui shall shall lyue rom achrist hath redimed v fro ye curse lawe beynge become curse v wrytten deut cursed euery one hangeth tre amonge heythen blessynge abraham shulde christ iesu maye receaue ye promyse sprete fayth brother speake heb c testament man beynge confirmed doth noman despyse doth adde thervnto vnto abraham hys sede promyses graunted sayeth sedes many sedes one thy sede whych christ thys testamet saye beynge confirmed god hath lawe exodi f iudith b actu whych geuen foure hudreth thyrty yeare made none effecte make promyse voyde rom c yf enheritaunce lawe promyse vnto abraham hath god geuen promyse doth lawe serue rom c b cit ordyned transgression vntyl sede shulde come vnto whome promysed beynge ordined angel hande mediator mediator one god one ye law agaynst promyses god farre yf ther bene geuen lawe coulde haue quickened ryghteousnesse shuld truely lawe rom b scripture closed thynges vnder lawe promyse faythe iesus christ shuld geuen vnto faithfull afore fayth dyd come kepte shut vnder lawe fayth whyche disclosed therfore ye law scoolemayster vnto christ iustified fayth whan fayth dyd come vnder scoolemayster ioha ye chyldren god fayth whych christ iesu rom b col b baptysed christe ye haue put christ ther iew nother greke ther bondman nother fre ther woma ye ioh c one christ iesu ephe b hebre c yf ye christes tha ye sede abraham accordynge promyse enheritours iiii chapter bvt saye longe ye heyre chylde differreth nothynge seruaunte though lorde vnder tutor gouernours vntyll tyme appoynted father euen also whan chyldre seruynge vnder tradicions worlde wha ge e b dani fulnesse ye tyme come god sente hys sone borne woman mat b put vnder lawe shulde redime yt vnder lawe might receaue adopcion chyldre rom b ye chyldren god god sent sprete sone youre harte cryenge abba father therfore nowe seruaunte sonne yf sonne heyre also thorow god tha truely knowyng god ye serued cori nature goddes ye haue knowen god yee ye knowe god collo chow ye turne agayne ye weak beggerlye tradicions vnto whych ye wyll serue agayne ye obserue dayes monethes tymes yeares feare lest haue laboured vayne amoge ye brother praye also ye haue hurte nothyng ye know whyle ago dyd preach vnto gospel thorow weaknesse ye flesh temptacio fleshe haue ye despysed nother haue ye refused lyke mala angell god dyd ye receaue yee christe iesu therfore happynesse beare recorde yf ben possible ye put eyen geuen vnto therfor become enemy vnto tellynge truth gelous ouer amysse wyl shut ye gelous ouer couet ye alwaye good thynge feruently goodnesse whan presente wyth lytle chyldre whome ioha c trauayle cor c byrth agayne vntyll christ fashioned wolde wyth also chaunge voyce ame ashamed tell ye wyll vnder lawe haue ye red lawe ther wrytten abraham two chyldre gene one hademayden gene one fre rom yt borne hademayde borne ye flesh borne frewoman promise yt thynges spoken allegory two testametes one truely monte sina engendrynge vnto bondage whych agar sina mountayne arabia whych ioyned vnto ierusale bondage wt hyr chyldren apo ierusalem hygh fre whych mother wrytte esay glad thou bare whych bearest breake forth crye bryngest forth desolate hath many mo chyldren hath husbande v brother ye chyldre promyse isaac ge e g tha borne ye flesh dyd persue hym borne sprete euen also sayeth scripture gene b cast ye hande mayden hyr sonne sonne handemayde shal heyre wyth sonne frewoman therfore brethre ye chyldren handemayden frewoman wyth whych fredome christ hath made v fre v chapter stande faste holden agayne wyth esa yocke bodage beholde paule tell actu yf ye circumcysed christ shall profyte nothynge agayne testifye vnto euery man circumcisyng hymselfe detter kepe ye whole lawe ye voyded christ whych made ryghteous lawe ye falle grace sprete fayth wayte hope ryghteousnesse gal b christ iesu doth nother circumcisio auayle oughte foreskynne fayth whyche cori worketh charite ye ranne well gal hath let obey truth agre vnto noman thys persuasion hym doth calle cor lytle leuen sowreth whole lompe dowe trust lorde ye shall mynde none thynge troubleth shall beare hys iere ezech iudgement euer yf brother yet preach circucision yet suffre persecucio tha ye sklauder ye crosse voyded wolde god also cut away whych trouble ye brother called vnto lyberte geue rom corin liberte occasion ye flesh serue ech loue sprete lawe fulfylled one worde leuit math c rom b thou shalt loue thy neghboure thy selfe yf ye byte eate one another take hede yt ye co sumed eche saye christ walke sprete ye shall fulfyll pet b lustes flesh ye flesh lusteth agaynst ye sprete sprete agaynst flesh contrary ech yt thynges ye wyll ye thesame yf ye led sprete ye vnder lawe tim c dedes flesh manifest whych fornicacion vnclennesse vnchastite lechery worshippe idol wytchcrafte cori c debate stryfes hatredes wrathes chydynges dissension sectes enuyenges manslaughter dro kennesses bankettynges suche lyke whych tell afore haue sayd cori ephes apo c suche shall optayne ye kyngdome heaue ephe b frute ye sprete loue ioye peace pacience gentlynesse goodnesse logesufferynge softnesse fayth mekenesse temperauce chastite tim b agaynst suche lawe ro b pet b christes haue crucifyed theyr flesh wyth vice concupiscence yf lyue sprete let v also walke sprete let v become desyrous vayne glorye prouokynge one another enuyenge ech vi chapter brother yf shal ouertaken ony faute ye spiritual instruct one wyth soft spret consyderynge thyselfe thou tempted also ioh b rom beare ye ye burthen one another shall ye fulfyll lawe christe yf ony man thynketh hymselfe oughte whan nothynge deceaueth hymselfe let euery man proue hys owne worke shal reioyce hymselfe another rom bfor euery man shal beare owne burthen rom cori b let hym instructe wyth worde ministre al hys goodes vnto hym doth instructe hym erre god mocked luce thynges shall sowe thesame shall reape also soweth hys fleshe hys flesh shal also reape corrupcion soweth sprete sprete also shall reape euerlastynge lyfe te b doynge good let v faynte hys tyme shall reape ceassynge whyle haue tyme therfore let v good vnto men tim moost vnto householdes fayth beholde wyth letter haue wrytten vnto cori c wyth myne owne hande wyll please ye flesh constrayne circumcised suffre persecucion crosse christe nother yt circucised kepe lawe wyll haue circucised may reioyce flesh farre fro reioyce saue crosse oure lorde iesus christ ye whyche worlde crucified vnto vnto world gal christ iesu doth nother circucision auaile ought vncircumcision new creature psal whosoeuer followe thys rule peace vnto mercy vpo israel god henceforth let noma trouble cori b beare markes lorde iesus body grace oure lorde iesus christ sprete brother amen pthe ende epistle paule apostle galathians epistle paule apostle ephesian fyrst chapter paule apostle iesus christe wyl god vnto ye sayntes ephesus faythfull christe iesu cori gala grace vnto peace fro god father lord iesus christ pet ablessed god father lorde iesus christ whyche hath blessed v euery spiritual blessing heauely thynges christ ioha b tim b hath chose v hym makynge ye world yt shuld holy vnspotted hys syght loue hath predestinate v adopcion chyldren iesus christ hymselfe accordynge purpose hys wyll vnto prayse ye glory hys grace ye whych hath made v accepted hys math b beloued sonne coll b heb whome haue redempcion throughe hys bloude remission synnes accordynge ryches hys grace whych hath ben exceadynge plenteous v wysedome prudence coll c myght declare vnto v mystery hys wyll accordynge hys good pleasure whych purposed selfe dispensacion gala fulnesse tymes set vp thynges christ thynges heauen earth eue hymselfe also lykewyse called lot rom predestinate accordynge purpose hym whych worketh thynges counsell hys owne wyll maye vnto prayse hys glory euen whych afore haue hoped christ also beleued whan ye herde worde truth ye gospell saluacion also ye beleuynge rom b cor c sealed wyth holy sprete promyse whych earnest oure inheritaunce redempcion purchacynge vnto ye prayse hys glory phili b coll te b wherfore also hearynge fayth whych christ iesu loue vnto sayntes ceasse geuynge thankes makynge mecyon prayer god glory ioh father lorde iesu christ maye geue vnto sprete wysedome reuelacion ye knowlege hym eye youre harte beynge lyghtened yt ye may knowe whych hope hys callynge ryches glorye hys inheritaunce sayntes whych exceadynge greatnesse power toward v haue beleued accordynge workyng myght hys power hath wrought christe iesu raysynge hym vp deade psal settynge hym hys ryghthande heauenly thynges aboue dani b rule power myght dominion euery name named thys worlde also ye worlde come psal thynges hath subdued vnder hys fete made hym ephe b c col b heade ouer congregacion whych hys body fulnesse hym fylleth ii chapter collos b b hath quyckened whan ye deade thorowe trespass synnes whych ye walked somtyme accordynge ye course thys worlde ye prince power ayre sprete worketh chyldre vnbelefe coll ye whych also haue led couersacion somtyme lustes flesh doynge wyll flesh thoughtes nature chyldren wrath euen aswell god whych rych mercy exceadynge loues sake wherwyth hath loued v whan deade also thorow synnes hath quyckened v christ esa b actu b whose grace ye saued hath raysed v vp wyth hym made v syt heauenly thynges christ iesu tymes come myghte shewe abundaunte ryches grace goodnesse vpo v christ iesu grace ye saued thorowe fayth selues gyft god workes lest ony man shuld reioyce hys workemaship created christ iesu titu b good workes whych god hath prepared shulde walke wherfore ye myndefull somtyme ye heythen ye flesh whych called vncircumcision called phili collo b circumcision made wyth hande fleshe whyche tyme wente astraye wythoute christe separated conuersacion israell straungers testametes hauynge rom b hope promyse wythoute god thys worlde christe iesu ye somtyme went astraye afarre nowe made nye bloud christ esay b col b peace whych hath made one broken downe myd wall ye stoppe euen enimities hys flesh puttynge awaye iudgementes ye law commaundementes hymselfe myght make two one newe man makynge peace one bodye myghte reconcile vnto god thorowe crosse kyllynge enemities hymselfe commynge esay c luce b hath preached peace vnto whyche afarre peace vnto nye hym haue intrauce one sprete vnto father iohan therfor ye gestes straungers ye cytesens sayntes householde god buylded vpon corin b foundacion apostle prophetes petri iesus christe beynge hye corner stone euery buyldyng beynge made groweth holy temple lorde ye also buylded together habitacion god holy goost iii chapter thys thynges sake paule actu b presoner iesu christ heythen yf yet ye haue herde office grace god actu b whyche geuen vnto amonge accordynge gala reuelacion mystery declared vnto wrote afore fewe wordes lyke readynge may vnderstande prudence ye mistery christe whyche mistery generacions hath ben knowen vnto chyldren men opened vnto hys holy apostle prophetes ye holy goost yt heythe lyke heyres bodye lyke partaker hys promise christ iesu thorow ye gospell whereof made minister accordynge gyfte ye grace god whych geue vnto ye workynge hys power vnto cor leest sayntes thys grace geue preach amoge ye heythen vnsearcheable ryches christ make al se ye comission coll c mystery hyd sence worlde beganne god whych created thynges vnto ruler power heauenly thynges myght knowen congregacion manyfolde wysedome god accordynge eternal purpose hath shewed christ iesu lorde whome haue trust intraunce boldenesse thorowe fayth hym phili b te wherfore desyre ye faynt trouble coll c whych youre glorye thys thynges sake bowe knee vnto father lorde iesus christ whome al fatherhode hath name heauens earth accordynge ryches hys glorye maye geue vnto power strengthed hys sprete inwarde man christ maye dwell thorow fayth harte beynge rooted grou ded loue may comprehende wyth sayntes bredth length heyght depth knowe also exceadynge loue knowlege christe ye maye fylled fulnesse god hym whyche able thynges abundauntly desyre vnderstande according power worketh v hym glorye congregacion christe iesu generacions worlde worldes amen iiii chapter therfore presoner ye lord beseke gene cori b phil coll te ye walke worthely callynge wyth ye called wt humblenesse mekenesse pacience forbearyng one another loue beynge carefull kepe vnite sprete ye bode peace one body one sprete ye called one hope youre callynge one lorde one fayth one baptyme one god father whyche aboue thorowe al v rom cori vnto euery one v geuen grace ioh c accordynge measure gyfte christ wherfore sayeth psal c esay ahe goynge vp hye ledde awaye captiuite captiue gaue giftes vnto men wente vp also came downe fyrst ye lower partes ye earth ioha bhe came downe thesame also went vp aboue heauens myght fulfyll thynges cor c made truly apostle prophetes euangelistes shepeherdes teacher perfourmaunce sayntes worke ministracion edifyenge body christ tyll al come vnite fayth knowlege sonne god perfecte man measure age ye fulnesse christ cori c shulde nowe chyldren col waueryng caryed aboute wyth euery wynde doctrine wyckednes sutylte deceatfulnes erroure perfourmynge truth let v thynges growe hym ephe c c ye heade eue christ whome bodye beynge coupled knyt together thorowe euery ioynt rom cori b subministracion accordynge operacion measure euery mebre maketh increace bodye edifyenge selfe loue saye therfore testifye lorde ye walke nowe rom c petr heythen also walke vanite theyr owne mynde hauynge vnderstandynge blynded darknesse beynge farre waye god thorow ignoraunce blyndnesse theyr harte fallynge dispayre haue geuen ouer themselues vnclennesse workynge fylthynesse vnto gredynesse ye haue learned christe yf yet ye haue herde hym instructe hym truthe iesu rom coll put ye olde conuersacion olde man whyche corrupte accordyng lustes erroure ye renewed sprete mynde put newe man whyche shapen god ryghteousnesse holynesse truth ch c pet wherfore puttynge awaye lyenge speake ye truth euery man wyth hys neghboure membres one another psal ye angrye synne let sone go downe vpo wrath geue ye place ye deuel yt dyd steale let hym nowe steal rather s let hym labour workynge wyth hys handes whych good maye haue geue vnto hym suffreth nede math ephe let euery euell comunicacion procede youre mouth yf ony good edifyenge fayth maye geue grace vnto hearer greue ye holy sprete god ye corin c sealed agaynst daye redempcion let bytternesse wrath indignacion coplaynynge blasphemye remoued awaye wyth malyce col bbut curteous one another mercyfull mat b forgeuyng one another lyke god also hath forgeuen christ v chapter ye therfore mat c ioh b follower god deare chyldren walke loue lyke christ also hath loued v gala ephe c geue ouer hymselfe v oblacion sacrifyce vnto god odoure swetnesse fornicacion vnclennesse couetousnesse exod b let named among becometh sayntes eccli c fylthynesse foolysh talkynge iestynge thynges pertayne matter rather geuing thankes cori b col vnderstandyng ye sure thys yt euery fornicatour vnclene person couetous perso whych seruice idol hath inheritauce ye kyngdom christ god coll let noman deceaue wyth vayne wordes thynges commeth wrath god vppon chyldren vnbelefe ye therfore partaker ye somtyme darkenesse tessa nowe lyghte lorde walke ye chyldren lyght gala cfor frute lyght goodnesse ryghteousnesse truth prouynge wel pleasyng vnto god haue ye fellowshippe wyth vnfrutefull workes darknesse rather reproue shame also speake thynges done secrete ioha c al thynges manifest rebuked lyght euery thynge yt manifest lyghte wherfore sayeth esay rom b vp thou slepest aryse deade christ shall geue lyght coll take hede therfore brethre howe ye walke circuspectly vnwyse ye wyse redeminge ye tyme dayes euel wherfore ye vnwyse vnderstandyng rom te athe wyl god eccli c ye dro ken wt wyne wherein voluptuousnesse ye actu b fylled wyth holy goost col talkynge vnto selues psalmes hymnes spiritual songes psal asyngynge playenge youre harte vnto lord te c geuynge thankes alway vnto god father al thynges ye name lord iesu christ submyttyng yourselues one another ye feare christ coll c petri alet ye weme subiectio theyr husbades ye lord cor ye husbande heade woma christ ye head ye cogregacio ye sauiour body lyke congregacyon subiecte vnto christ let ye weme also theyr husbandes thynges ye men loue wyues christe also loued cogregacion ephes gala gaue hym selfe myght sactifye titum petri cclensynge wyth foutayne water worde lyfe myght make vnto hymselfe glorious cogregacion hauynge blemysh wrynkle ony thyng myght holy vndefyled euen ought also loue theyr wyues theyr owne bodyes loueth hys wyfe loueth himselfe noma hath hated owne flesh ony tyme doth noryshe cherysh euen christe doth also congregacion membres hys body hys fleshe hys bone gene math marci thys cause shal man leaue hys father mother cleue vnto hys wyfe shalbe two one flesh thys greate mystery say christ cogregacion neuerthelesse also let euery one loue hys wyfe hymselfe let wyfe feare hir husbande vi chapter ye coll c chyldren obeye youre father mother ye lorde right exodi bhonour thy father thy mother whych fyrst comau demente promyse thou mayest prospere lyue longe vpo earth ye father prouoke chyldre vnto wrath exodi deute b c psal bryng vp nurtoure informacion lorde col titum b pet c ye seruauntes obey bodely maysters wyth feare tremblynge symplenesse harte vnto christ seruynge vnto eye pleasynge men seruau te christ doynge ye wyll god mynde wyth good wyl doynge seruyce vnto lorde vnto men knowynge euery good thynge euer doth shal receaue lorde whether bonde fre eccli coll c maysters ye euen vnto puttynge away threatenynges knowynge theyr lorde heauen actu rom b collos c pet b ther acceptynge personnes wyth god fynally brother ye stronge lorde power hys strength put ye armour god ye maye stande agaynst assaultes deuell wrestle flesh bloude ruler power agaynst gouernours ye world darkness spiritual thynges wickednesse heauely thynges wherfore take ye ye armoure god ye maye resyst euell daye stode perfect thynges exod deut b psal esay sap c cori stode ye therfore beynge gyrded aboute loynes truth hauynge brestplate ryghteousnesse youre fete shod preparynge gospell peace thynges takynge shylde fayth wyth ye may quenche fyry dartes moost wicked take ye also helmete saluacion heb c swearde sprete whych worde god luce te c prayenge maner prayer supplicacion alwaye ye sprete watchynge al instaunce supplicacion al sayntes collo te worde may geuen openynge mouth boldnesse declare mystery gospell ye whych messaunger thys cheyne actu c may bold speake ought yt ye also may know thynges aboute tichicus ye moost deare brother faythful minister lorde shall shew haue sente vnto purpose ye maye knowe ye thynges aboute v maye comforte harte peace vnto brother loue wyth fayth god father lorde iesus christ grace wyth loue lord iesus christ syncerely amen pthe ende epistle paule apostle ephesian epistle paule apostle philippian fyrst chapter paule timothe seruautes iesus christ vnto sayntes christe iesu ar actu bphilippis wyth byshops actu minister cor grace vnto peace god oure father lorde iesus christ coll te thanke god euery remembraunce makynge alwaye prayer instaunte prayer wyth ioye co cernynge youre fellowshippe gospell christ fyrst day hetherto trustynge one hath begonne ioha ye good worke shall fule de vntyll day christe iesu due vnto thynke haue partaker ioye harte bandes defence confirmacion gospell god te recorde longe euen fro harte roote iesu christ ephe c col te b thys praye loue maye increace knowlege al vnderstandynge ye maye alowe best ye may pure without offence daye christ fylled wyth ye frut ryghteousnesse thorowe iesus christ vnto glorye prayse god ephe b wolde haue wyte brother thynges aboute ye profyte gospell insomuche bandes made manifeste christ euery iudgement house place many brother hauynge trust lorde bandes bolde plentyfully wythout feare speake ye worde god truely enuy stryfe preache christe good wyll loue knowynge yt ame layde defence gospell shew christe contencion syncerely supposynge rayse persecucio vnto bodes tha whan euery meane christ preached ether thorow occasio ye truth reioyce shall also reioyce know yt shal befal vnto saluacion cor b prayer ministracio ye sprete iesus christ accordynge waytynge hope shalbe ashamed nothynge wyth boldnesse alway shal also christ magnifyed body ether thorow lyfe death christ lyfe vnto death auautage yf lyue flesh frute labour shall chose also tel distresse two thinges cor hauynge desyre lowsed wyth christ whych much better abyde ye flesh necessary sake trustynge thys knowe shall remayne continue wyth vnto ende profite reioycynge fayth youre reioycynge maye plenteous christ commynge agayne vnto neuertheles walke ephe col te worthy gospell christe whether shall come shall se beynge absente shall heare ye stande stedfast one sprete labourynge together one mynded fayth gospell nothynge ye afrayde aduersaryes vnto occasion perdicion vnto saluacio god vnto geue christes sake onely ye shulde beleue hym ye also suffre hym hauynge lyke fyghte ye sawe also heare ii chapter yf ther therfore ony co solacion christ yf ther ony comforte loue yf ther ony fellowship ye sprete yf ther ony entier mocion pytie fulfyll ioye rom c ye mynde one thynge hauynge one loue one mynde meanynge one thynge let nothynge done thorow cor stryfe vayne glory humblynesse estymynge ech superiores euery one consyderynge thynges yt theyrs thynges pet c let mynde yt whych also christ iesu whych whan ye shape god thought robbery equal god psal bbut made hymselfe reputacion takynge vpon hym shape seruaunte hebr made ye lykenesse men apparell founde man dyd humble himselfe became obedient vntyl death euen death crosse math c heb b yt whyche cause god dyd also exalte hym gaue hym name yt aboue euery name esay c dani c rom b ye name iesus euery ane bowed thynges heauen thynges earth thynges vnder ye earth euery tuge knowlege lorde iesus christ ye glory god father therfore beloued ye haue alway obeyed actu b presece muche myne absence worke health wt feare tremblyng deut ezech cor hebr god worketh wyll perfourme ye good wyll pet b ye al thynges wythout grudgynges doutynges yt ye wtout coplaynt symple chyldre god pet wtout rebuke myddest ye euell peruerse generacion math b amoge yt whych ye shyne lyghtes ye worlde holdynge fast word lyfe vnto cor c te c reioycyng ye daye christe haue runne vayne nother haue laboured vayne col c although offered vp vpon ye sacrifice wyllynge seruyce fayth rom b ame glad reioyce wyth ye glad also thesame reioyce wt trust lorde iesus actu sende timotheus shortly vnto te bthat also may good coforte knowynge thynges yt aboute haue noman one mynded whych carefull wyth syncere affeccion cori al seke thynges theyrs iesus christes ye knowe profe hym chylde vnto father dyd serue wyth gospel thesame therfore truste sende vnto soone shall se thynges aboute philip trust lorde myselfe also shall come shortly vnto neuerthelesse thoughte expediente sende brother epaphroditus fellowe workeman fellowsouldyer youre apostle seruaunt nede longed sory ye herd hym haue ben sycke sycke vntyll death god hath mercy vpon hym vpon hym also lest shulde haue sorowe vpon sorowe haue sente hym therfore spedely wha ye haue sene hym ye maye ioyfull agayne wythout heuynesse receaue hym therfore lorde wyth gladnesse mat rom te c haue honoure wente euen vntyll death worke christ geuyng ouer hys lyfe myght fulfil wantyng vnto towarde wyllynge seruyce iii chapter moreouer brother reioyce lorde wryte one thynge vnto truely grefe vnto necessary vnto esa c phili bbeware dogges beware euel workman beware diuision rom c col bfor circumcision euen whych serue god ioha c rom sprete reioyce christ iesu hauynge cofidence flesh though also haue confidence flesh cor yf ony man semeth haue cofidence flesh haue beynge circumcised eyght daye nacio israel trybe beniamin hebrue hebrues lawe actu c pharise feruetnes actu c gala bi persecutyng congregacion god accordynge ryghteousnesse whyche lawe haue walked wythout blame math f thynges auauntage vnto haue counted losse christes sake neuerthelesse counte thinges losse exceadyng iohan col knowlege iesus christ lorde whose sake haue cou ted thynges losse counte douge may wynne christ foude hauyng ryghteousnesse whiche law fayth christe iesu whych ryghteousnesse god fayth knowe hym power hys resurreccion fellowshippe hys passion rom beynge lyke fashioned wyth hys death yf ony meanes maye attayne vnto resurreccion deade haue attayned vnto already yt perfecte followe vpo yf ony meane may coprehende wherein copreheded christ iesu brother suppose haue gotten holde one thynge forgettynge thynges truely behynde stretchyng myselfe ye thynges afore preasse ye appoynted marke ye rewarde hygh callyng god christ iesu let v therfore many perfecte thus mynded yf ye otherwyse mynded god shall open thys vnto also neuerthelesse vnto come yt one mynded continue one rule cor c dbe ye follower brother marke walke ye haue ensample many walke whyche haue ofte tolde ut also tell wepynge enemyes crosse christ whose ende death r bwhose god belly theyr glorye shame whyche mynde earthly thynges col conuersacion heauen whence also wayte saueoure lorde iesus christ cori f whych shal restore oure vyle bodye beynge lyke fashioned vnto hys cleare body accordynge workynge hys power whych also maye able subdue thynges vnto hym selfe iiii chapter wherfore beloued brother moost loged ioye crowne stande ye stil ye lorde ye moost beloued praye euodias beseke syntiche mynde one thynge lorde praye germayne cor yockefellowe helpe wome whych haue laboured wyth gospell wyth clement myne helper luce b apo bwhose name boke lyfe te creioyce ye ye lorde alwaye agayne saye reioyce let softenesse knowen vnto men lorde nye nothynge carefull euery prayer suplicacion let youre requestes knowen vnto god wyth thankesgeuynge ioh c rom peace god whyche passeth vnderstandynge kepe harte vndersta dynges christ iesu moreouer brother soeuer thynges true soeuer thynges ar honest whatsouer thynges ust whatsoeuer thynges holy whatsoeuer thynges louynge whatsoeuer thynges good reporte yf ther ony vertue yf ther ony prayse learnynge thynges myndefull thynges yt ye haue learned receaued haue herde haue sene god esay b peace shalbe wt reioyce greatlye lorde last ye floryshynge agayne regarde ye regarded ye occupyed saye nede haue learned case yt tim contente lowe full taught euery thynges satisfyed hongry ouerflowynge suffre scarcenesse thynges comforteth neuerthelesse ye haue done well bearynge parte wyth tribulacio ye philippian knowe also begynnynge gospel whan wente fro macedonia congregacion bare parte wyth waye gyfte receate saue ye alone ye sente twyse vnto thessalonica also behofe seke gyfte requyre plentyfull frute rekenyng haue full fylled wha receaued epaphroditus yt ye sente vnto sauoure swetnesse rom hebr c acceptable offerynge pleasynge vnto god god acco plysh euery request accordyng ryches glory christ iesu vnto god father prayse euer euer amen salute euery saynte christ iesu brother wyth salute sayntes salute specially cesars householde grace lorde iesus christe wyth youre sprete amen pthe ende epistle paule apostle philippian epistle apostle paule colossian fyrst chapter paule apostle iesus christe wyll god brother timothe vnto sayntes faythfull brethre christ iesu colossa gal ephes grace vnto peace god oure fatherphil te geue thankes vnto god father oure lorde iesus christe prayeng alwaye hearynge fayth christe iesu loue ye haue towardes sayntes hope layde vp heauens whych ye haue herde ye worde truthe gospell come vnto also ye whole world marci bryngeth frute groweth doth also amonge sence daye yt ye haue herde knowen grace god truth ye haue learned col b epaphras oure moost beloued fellow seruaut whych minister christ iesu also hath shewed vnto v youre loue sprete ephe c phil b te b therfore also sence day herde ceasse prayenge axyng ye may fylled wyth knowlege te hys wyll spirituall wysedome vnderstandyng ye may philip walke worthely pleasynge god al thynges ioh bryngynge forth frute euery good worke growynge knowlege god beyng strengthed power accordynge ye myght hys loue pacience longsufferynge geuynge thankes vnto god father wyth ioye whyche hath made v worthy parte enheritaunce sayntes lyghte whych hath drawen v power darkenesse hath translated v kyngdome hys beloued sone ephes haue redempcion remission synnes cor heb awhich ye ymage tim c inuisible god ye fyrstborne euery creature psal heb afor hym thynges made heauen earth visible thynges inuisible whether trones dominion rule power thynges created hym hym thynges abyde hym ephes c b ye heade ye body namely cogregacion apoc whych begynnynge co cthe fyrst begotten fro deade yt hauinge primacy al thinges hath pleased coll b fulnesse godheade dwell hym rom c cor cto reconcyle thynges vnto hymselfe settynge one bloude crosse thynges ether earth heaue rom ephes coll b whan ye somtyme made straunge enemyes wytte beynge geuen euell workes hath reconciled body hys fleshe death myght make holy vnspotted ephes c vnblameable hys syght yf ye abyde mat c cor b grounded stedfast fayth vnmoueable hope gospell whyche ye haue herde preached psal among euery creature vnder heaue whose minister paul become whych cor reioyce sufferynges ephe b phili tim fulfyll thynges wantynge passion christe flesh bodyes sake whych congregacio cor awhose minister become accordynge dispensacion god whych geuen amoge fulfyll worde god ephes b mystery hyd euerlastynge vnto generacions math ioh c cor c eph b made manifest vnto sayntes vnto whome god wolde make knowen ryches glory thys secrete amonge heythen whyche thynge christe amonge hope glorye whome shewe rebukynge euery man teachynge euery man wysedome may make euery perfecte christ iesus wherein also laboure stryuyng accordynge hys workynge whyche worketh power ii chapter wold haue knowe carefulnesse haue laodicia euer haue sene face ye flesh theyr harte may comforted beynge instructe loue al ye ryches fulnesse vnderstandynge ioh vnto knowlege mystery god father christe iesu cor whome hyd al treasure wysedome knowlege ephes thys saye noman deceaue ye heyght wordes cori afor though absent body yet presente wyth sprete reioycynge seynge order stedfastnesse fayth whyche christ iesu gal ye haue therfore receaued ye lord iesus christ walk hym beynge bothe rooted buylded hym beyng stablyshed fayth ye haue also learned ye plenteous geuynge thankes rom b take hede lest ony deceaue philosophy vayne deceate accordynge tradicion men accordynge ordinauces worlde christe cori c hym dwelleth ioh b fulnesse godheade bodely ye fylled hym whych heade al rule power whome also ye circumcised rom c philip wyth circumcision made wyth handes robbynge ye body flesh ye circucision christ rom beynge buryed wyth baptyme whych ye rysen also fayth god workynge whyche raysed hym deade rom ephe col b also wha ye deade synnes foreskynne fleshe hath quyckened wyth hym forgeuynge synnes puttynge handewryttynge yt agaynst v ye decre ye whyche contrary vnto v also hath taken ye way fastynge vpon crosse gene luc c ioh spoylynge rule power hath broughte forth boldely triumphynge hymselfe let noman therfore iudge leuit rom meate drynke parte leui holydaye ye new moone sabbat heb b shadow thynges come body christes mat let noma miscarye wyllynge humblynesse math c deuocio angel ye thynges hath sene walkynge vayne beynge pufte vp ye meanynge hys flesh holdyng heade whome whole body beynge noryshed fastened together knottes ioyntes dothe growe greatnesse god gala yf ye therfore deade wyth christe ordinauces worlde ye yet vse decree lyuynge worlde touche ye nother tayst ye nother handle ye whyche thynges hurte wyth vse commaundementes doctrine men tim b whyche dede haue shyne wysedome supersticion humblynesse sparing body countyng worthy ony honoure vnto sufficiency flesh iii chapter yf ye therfore rysen wt christe seke thynges yt aboue christ syttynge ephes heb b ryghthande set youre myndes thynges aboue yt vpon earth ye deade petri aand lyfe hyd wyth christe god phili c ioha c whan christe youre lyfe shall appeare shall ye also appeare glory hym corin b ephe mortify therfore membres vpon earth fornicacio deute c vnclenesse vnnaturall lust euel concupiscence couetousnesse whych worshippe idol gene cor whych thinges wrath god doth come vpo chyldre vnbelefe ephe ye thynges ye walked somtyme whan ye dyd lyue rom ephes c laye ye awaye thynges wrathe indignacion maliciousnesse blasphemy fylthy comunicacio mouth lye one another rom b robbynge yourselues olde man wt hys dedes puttynge ye new renewed knowlege accordyng hys lykenesse hath shape hym gala b ther man woma heythe iewe circucisio foreskynne barbarus scitian bond fre christe al ephe put ye therfore electe god holy welbeloued entyer mercy kyndnesse lowlynes softnesse pacience forbearynge eche forgeuynge amonge selues yf ony haue complaynte agaynst another lorde hath forgeuen ye also aboue thynges haue math b loue whych ye bande perfectio ye peace christ reioyce harte vnto whyche also ye called one body thankefull let worde christ dwell plenteously al wysedom epes teachynge exhortynge yourselues psalmes songes prayse spirituall songes syngynge graciously vnto lorde harte cor dall soeuer ye worde dede thynges name lorde iesus christ ephes c petri geuyng thankes vnto god father hym ye wyues obedient vnto youre husbandes due lorde ye husbandes loue youre wyues bytter towarde ephes ye chyldren obeye youre father mother al thynges pleasynge vnto lorde ye father prouoke chyldre vnto anger waxe feble mynded ephes titum b pe ri c ye seruauntes obey bodyly maysters thynges seruynge eye pleasynge men fearynge lorde synglenesse harte soeuer ye hartelye vnto lorde men knowynge ye shall receaue lorde rewarde enheritaunce serue lorde christ rom afor doth wronge shall receaue hath done wroge act rom b ther respecte person wyth god iiii chapter ye ephes tessa maysters geue vnto youre seruauntes iuste equall beynge sure ye also haue mayster heauen continue prayer watchynge therin vnto thankesgeuynge prayenge v also god open vnto v dore worde speake mystery christe whyche thynge also ame bounde vtter euen behoueth speake eccli b ephes b walke wysely towarde wythoute redemynge tyme let youre speche alwaye fauoure seasoned wyth math b marc salte ye maye know howe ye oughte answere euery man tychicus mooste deare brother faythfull minister fellowseruaunte lorde shall certifye thynges aboute whome sente therfore vnto maye knowe thinges aboute maye comforte youre harte wyth ph b onesimus oure moost beloued faythfull brother one whych shall certifye al thynges yt done act aaristarchus fellowpresoner saluteth tim b marke barnabasses syster sone whome ye haue receaued commaundementes yf come vnto receaue hym iesus whych called iustus circumcision helper kyngdome god coforted coll epaphras page duplicate page duplicate saluteth seruaunte iesus christe one beyng alwaye carefull prayer yt ye may stande perfecte full euery wyl god beare hym recorde hath muche laboure laodicia hierapolis dear phisician lucas saluteth tim b demas grete brother laodicia nympha congregacion hyr house wha letter shalbe red cause red also congregacion laodicians let yt laodicians red vnto saye vnto archippus loke thou fulfyll seruice whych thou hast receaued lorde salutacion myne owne hande paule myndeful bandes te bthe grace lorde iesus christ wyth amen pthe ende epistle paule apostle collossians fyrst epistle paule apostle thessalonian fyrst chapter paule syluanus timotheus vnto congregacion thessalonias god father lorde iesus christe cori gala agrace vnto peace phili coll awe thanke god alwaye makynge mencion prayer wythout ceassynge callyng mynde worke youre fayth laboure tessa b loue waytynge tim hope oure lorde iesus christ god father knowynge brother beloued god eleccion cor cfor gospell vnto worde also power holy goost much fulnesse te aa ye knowe maner men haue ben amonge youre sake ye become follower lordes receauynge worde muche trouble wyth ioye holy gooste insomuche ye become ensample vnto beleuynge macedonia achaia worde lorde noysed macedonia achaia fayth also whyche godwarde gone euery place nedefull v speake ought themselues shewe v intrauce haue vnto ye turned vnto god ymages serue lyuynge true god wayte hys sone act b ye heauens raysed deade euen iesus whyche hath drawen v oute ioh wrath come ii chapter ye brother also knowe intraunce vnto vayne hauing suffred many thynges afore actu c shamefully intreated ye knowe philippos boldened oure god act speake vnto gospell god great carefulnesse exhortacion erroure vnclennesse deceate alowed god gospell shulde commytted vnto v euen speake gal b pleasynge men god whyche tryeth oure harte neuer wente aboute wyth flatteryng wordes ye knowe wyth occasion couetousnesse philip b god recorde sekyng prayse men nother whan myghte haue bene chargeable vnto apostle christe become tender myddes yf norse cherysed hyr chyldren lykewyse desyrynge hartely wolde delyuer gospell god also lyues ye become moost beloued vnto vsfor ye brother myndeful laboure weerynesse act e cor b te workynge nyght daye leste shulde chargeable vnto ony man preached amonge gospell god ye wytnesses god holyly iustly wythout blame haue ben haue beleued ye know besekynge euery one father hys chyldren comfortynge haue wytnessed vnto te ye wold walke worthely vnto god whych hath called hys kyngdome glory therfore also geue thankes vnto god wythoute ceassynge whan ye receaued v ye worde preachynge god ye receaued worde men truely worde god whych worketh haue beleued ye brother become follower heb congregacions god iewry christ iesu ye also haue suffred thynges companion also iewes whyche haue kylled lorde iesus prophetes haue persued v please god contrary al act b forbyddynge v speake vnto heythen may saued maye alwaye fulfyll theyr synnes ye wrath god come vpo vntyll ye ende brother beynge wythdrawe fro space houre fro syghte ye harte haisted spedely se face wt great desyre wold agayn haue come vnto verely paul dan b satanas dyd let v whych hope cor b philip bioye crowne glory ye orde iesus christ hys comynge ye prayse ioye iii chapter wherfore forbearing pleased v remayne alone act c athens sente timothe brother minister god gospell christe stablysh exhorte youre faythe ephes b noman moued tribulacyons ioh b tim b ye youreselues knowe ordyned therto wha wyth shewed vnto shulde suffre tribulacions come passe also ye know wherfore also forbearynge ony longer haue sente knowe youre fayth leste happely tempteth haue tempted laboure become inuayne timotheus doth come vnto v sheweth vnto v fayth charite ye haue alway good remembraunce v desyrynge se v also therfor brethre comforted oure nede tribulacion thorow youre fayth nowe lyue yf ye stande lorde thankesgeuynge rendre vnto god ioye wyth reioyce god youre sake prayenge exceadynglye nyght daye maye se youre face fulfyll thynges wantyng vnto fayth god hymselfe father lorde iesus christ gyde iourney vnto lord increace make loue ouerflowe amonge selues towarde men also towarde stablysh youre harte wythout blame holynesse god oure father vnto commynge oure lord iesus christ wyth hys sayntes amen iiii chapter farthermore therfore brother pray beseke lorde iesus ye haue receaued v ye ought philip walke please god ye walke ye maye plentyfullyer ye knowe comaundementes haue geue lord iesus thys rom ephes b wyll god namely hallowynge ye abstayne yourselues fro fornicacio yt tob cor euery one knowe howe possesse vessell holynesse honoure ye lust cocupiscece rom ca heythen also whych knowe god noman passe hys bondes nother begyle hys brother bargenynge lorde auenger thynges haue sayde vnto haue wytnessed god hath called v vnto vnclennesse vnto hallowynge wherfore luce b despyseth thynges despyseth man god cor b c whych also hath geuen hys holy sprete v te abut loue brotherheade nedefull v wryte vnto ioh ye selues haue lerned god ye loue ech ye towarde brother whole macedonia praye brother ye abundaunte ye endeuoure quiete ye youre busynesse act c te worke wyth ha de haue commaunded ye also maye walke honestly towarde wythoute desyre ought ony ma wyll haue ignoraut brother slepynge yt ye sorowful also sap whych haue hope yf beleue iesus dyed rose agayne shall god brynge also wyth hym whych haue slepte thorow iesus thys saye vnto ye worde lordes behalfe cor fthat yt lyue whych remayne vnto commynge lorde shall preuente haue slepte mat c ioh c act b te afor lorde hymselfe shall come downe heaue wyth commaundemente wyth voyce archangell wyth ye trompe god deade christe shall ryse fyrste lyue whyche lefte ouer shalbe caught vp together wyth ye ayre mete christ ayre shal euer wyth lorde wherfore comforte ech wyth wordes v chapter bvt tymes brother seasos ye nede wryt vnto ye yourselues knowe perfectly mat pet b apo daye lorde thefe nyght shall come whan shal saye peace safety iere b shall soden destruccion come vpon euen payne greate wyth chylde shall escape ye brother darkenesse daye shulde ouertake thefe ye chyldren lyght chylderen daye nyght nother darkenesses rom blet v therfore slepe also let v watch sobre slepe slepe nyghte dronken dronke nyght let v daye sobre esa c ephes b armed wyth brestplate fayth loue helmet hope saluacion god hath appoynted v vnto wrath vnto optaynynge health thorow lord iesus christ dyed v ye cor whether wake slepe may lyue together hym wherfore comforte one another edifye one another ye also beseke brother galat tim bthat ye knowe laboure amonge haue ouersyghte lord exhorte ye loue theyr laboure haue peace wyth beseke brother rebuke restlesse comforte feble mynded take vp weake paciet toward al mat e se yt noma rendre euel euell ony follow alway vpo yt good one vnto another vnto al phili reioyce alway luc pray wtout ceassyng ephe b geue thankes al thynges ye wyl god christ iesu towarde al cor quech ye spret despise prophecy proue al thynges kepe ye good abstayne fro euel liknesse god peace sactify thorowout yt whole sprete soule body kepte blamelesse ye coming lorde iesus christe cor c faythfull hath called shal also brethre pray v rom b cor c cor c grete al ye brethre wt holy kysse charge lord yt thys epistle red vnto al holy brethre te b grace lord iesus christ wyth pthe ende fyrst epistle paule apostle thessalonian seconde epistle apostle paule thessalonian fyrst chapter paule syluanus timotheus vnto congregacion thessalonias god oure father lorde iesus christe cor ephes grace vnto peace god father lord iesus christ ought geue alwaye thankes vnto god brethre euen couenient fayth increaseth loue euery one plenteous towarde eche insomuche selues also reioyce cogregacions god pacience fayth persecucions trouble whych ye suffre ensample ye iust iudgemet god yt ye may couted worthy ye kyngdome god wherfore also ye suffre yf ye leest ryghte wt god recopece tribulacio vnto ye trouble yt troubled rest wt v mat c c vnto reuelacion lord iesus heauen wyth angel hys power pet ye flame
