oughte also walke hath walked moost beloued wryte newe comaudemete vnto olde commaundement whych ye fro ye begynnynge olde commaundement worde whych ye haue herde agayne wryte vnto ioh b newe commaundement whyche also true darkenesses past true lyghte doth nowe shyne sayeth lyght hateth hys brother yet darkenesse loueth hys brother remayneth lyghte ther offendicle hym hateth brother darkenesse walketh darkenesse woteth whether doth go darkenesses haue blynded hys eyen wryte vnto lytle chyldren luce actu synnes forgeuen hys name sake wryte vnto father ye haue knowen hym fro begynnyng wryte vnto yongemen ye haue ouercome wycked wryte vnto babe ye haue knowen father wryte vnto father ye haue knowen fro begynnynge wryte vnto yonge men ye stronge worde god abydeth ye ouercome wycked loue worlde thynges yt worlde yf ony man loueth worlde loue father hym world cocupiscece ye flesh desyre eyen pryde lyfe whych father worlde psal cor esa worlde passeth awaye hys lust yt doth ioh te wyl god abydeth foreuer lytle chyldren last houre ye haue herde mat ioh antichrist cometh eue ther many become antichristes wherby knowe last houre went ioha c act v v yf hadde ben v shulde verely haue remayned wyth v cor b maye knowen v ye haue heb b anoyntynge hym holy ye knowe thynges haue wrytten vnto knowyng truth knowyng euery lye ye truth lyar saue denyeth iesus christe antichrist whych denyeth father sone ioh euery one yt denyeth ye sone hath ye father cofesseth sone hath ye father also whych ye haue herde fro ye begynnyng doth remayne yf yt remayne whyche ye haue herde begynnynge ye shal also remayne ye sone father ye promyse yt hath promysed v namely lyfe euerlastynge thynges haue wrytten yt deceaue esa c ioha c c b anoyntynge ye haue receaued hym let remayne ye haue nede yt ony teach lyke anoyntyng teacheth thynges true also lye hath taughte abyde hym nowe ye lytle chyldren abyde hym whan shal appeare may haue hope sapi ashamed hym hys commynge yf ye knowe ryghteous know also euery one doth ryghteousnesse borne hym iii chapter beholde loue father hath geuen v called chyldren god therfore ioha c cori adoth worlde knowe v hath knowen hym dearly beloued nowe luce chyldren god hath yet appeared shalbe rom cor f coloss philip c knowe whan shall appeare shalbe lyke hym also shall se hym euery one hath thys hope hym sanctifyeth hymselfe also holy euery one doth synne doth wickednes also sinne wickednesse esay tim c titum b petri c ye know hath appeared shulde take away synne ther synne hym euery one abydeth hym synneth euery one synneth hath sene hym hath knowen hym lytle chyldren let noman myscarye doth ryghteousnesse ryghteous ryghteous also doth synne deuell ioh deuel synneth begynnynge therfore appeared sonne god lowse workes deuell ioh c euery one borne god doth synne hys sede pet abydeth hym synne borne god ioha chylderen god manifest chylderen deuell euery one ryghteous god loueth hys brother thys tydynge whych ye haue herde fro begynnynge ye loue one another gene bnot cain whych ye euel slew hys brother wherfore dyd slaye hym hys workes euell hys brother ryghteous ioh b maruayle brother yf worlde hate knowe translated fro death lyfe loue ye brother loueth abideth death ioha c euery one hateth hys brother manslayer ye knowe apoc c euery manslayer hath lyfe euerlastynge abydynge hym yt haue knowen ioha c b rom loue god hath layde hys lyfe v ought laye oure lyues brother deut shall haue ye substaunce thys worlde shall se hys brother haue nede shutteth vp hys entyer affeccion fro howe dwelleth loue god hym lytle chyldren iacob b let v loue wyth worde tunge wt worde truth thys knowe truth shall quyte oure harte hys syghte yf oure harte reprehende v god greater oure harte knoweth thynges moost dearly beloued yf harte shall rebuke v haue confydence towarde god ioha c ioha b iacob euer shal desyre shal receaue hym kepe hys commaundementes thynges pleasynge hym thys hys commaundemente beleue name hys sonne iesus christ loue one another ioh b hath geuen v comau demente kepeth hys co maundementes ioh b abydeth hym hym therby knowe abydeth v eue rom sprete ye whych hath geue v iiii chapter dearly beloued beleue euery sprete reg math b proue spretes whether god ioh c ioh b many false prophetes gone ye world hereby sprete god knowen euery sprete confesseth iesus christe come flesh god euery sprete parteth iesus god thesame antichrist whome ye haue herde commeth euen nowe worlde ye lytle chyldren god haue ouercome hym greater worlde worlde therfore speake worlde ye worlde heareth god ioh knoweth god heareth v yt god doth hear v ye knowe sprete truth spret erroure dearly beloued let v loue ech loue god euery one yt loueth borne god knoweth god yt loueth doth know god god loue ioh c rom thys hath ye loue god appeared v god sent hys begotten sone worlde may lyue hym thys loue thoughe haue loued god hath loued v fyrst cor c coloss b sente hys sonne atonemente oure synnes dearly beloued yf god hath loued v oughte also loue one another exod deu b ioh b tim cnoma hath sene god ony tyme ioh cyf loue ech god abydeth v hys loue perfecte v knowe abyde hym v hath geuen v hys sprete haue sene testifye father hath sente hys sonne saueoure worlde ioh whosoeuer shall confesse iesus ye sonne god god abydeth god knowe beleue loue god hath v god loue abydeth loue abydeth god god hym thys loue god perfecte wyth v haue ephes b boldnesse daye iudgemente also thys worlde feare loue perfecte loue casteth forthe feare feare hath paynfulnesse feareth perfecte loue let v therfore loue god god hath loued v fyrste ioh yf ony man shall saye loue god shal hate hys brother lyare loueth hys brother whome seyth loue god seyeth thys commaundemente haue god leuit ioh loueth god loue hys brother also v chapter every one yt beleueth iesus christe math c ioh borne god euery one loueth hym begat shall loue hym also yt borne hym thys knowe loue chyldren god whan loue god hys commaundementes ioha b thys l ue god kepe hys commau dementes math ioha hys comaundementes heuy borne god ouercommeth worlde thys cor f victory ouercommeth worlde euen fayth yt ouercometh ye world saue beleueth iesus sonne god thys cometh water bloude iesus christe water onely water bloude math b c ioh sprete testifyeth christ truth ther thre beare wytnesse heaue father worde holy goost thre one ther thre beare wytnesse earth sprete water bloude thre one ioha yf receaue wytnesse men wytnesse god greater thys ye wytnesse god whych greater testifyed hys sonne ioh rom b gala ahe beleueth ye sone god hath wytnesse god hym beleueth sonne maketh hym lyare beleueth wytnesse whych god hath testifyed hys sonne thys wytnesse god hath geuen v euerlastynge lyfe ioha thys lyfe hys sonne hath sone god hath lyfe hath sonne god hath lyfe thynges wryt vnto ye may know ye haue lyfe euerlastynge ye yt beleue name sonne god ioha thys boldnesse whych haue towarde god ioh c marc c ioha c euer shall axe accordynge hys wyll heareth v knowe heareth v souer shal desyre sure haue ye peticios requyre hym knoweth brother synne synne vnto death let axe lyfe shalbe geue vnto synnynge vnto death ther iere b math c ioha b synne vnto death saye ony man praye euery wyckednesse synne ther synne vnto death know euery one borne god doth synne generacion god kepeth wicked toucheth hym knowe god whole worlde set myschefe knowe ye sone god come luce dand hath geue v vnderstandynge may know true god hys true sonne thys true god euerlastynge lyfe lytle chyldren kepe ymages pthe ende fyrste canonical epistle ihon apostle second canonicall epistle ihon apostle fyrst chapter elder ye electe lady hyr chyldre whome loue truth also haue knowe ye truth truthes sake whych abydeth shalbe wyth foreuer grace mercye peace wyth god father christ iesu math sonne father truth loue reioyced greatly haue founde thy chyldren walkyng truth haue receaued commaundement father nowe beseke lady wrytynge ioh new commaundemet vnto fro begynnyng loue one another thys loue walke hys comaundementes thys commaundemente ye haue herde sence begynnynge ye walke hym ioh many deceauers gone worlde whych cofesse iesus christe come flesh thys deceauer antichrist take hede yourselues ye lose thynges ye haue wrought ye maye receaue full rewarde euery one goeth backe contynueth ioh c doctrine christ hath god continueth doctrine hath father sone te byf ony commeth vnto bryngeth thys doctrine receaue ye house nother salute hym saluteth hym partner hys euell workes beholde haue tolde ye ashamed lordes daye ioh b hauynge many thynges wryte vnto wolde wt paper ynke trust wyth speake mouth mouth ioh c ioha ayour ioye may full chyldre thyne electe syster salute pthe ende seconde canonicall epistle ihon apostle thyrde canonicall epistle ihon apostle fyrste chapter elder vnto moost deare gaius whome loue truth dearly beloued thynges wysh thou walke prosperously fare well thy soule prospereth reioyced greatly whan brother dyd come dyd bear wytnes vnto thy truth thou walkest truth haue greater grace heare chyldren walke truth dearly beloued heb thou doest faythfully soeuer thou doest vnto brother vnto straungers whych haue borne wytnesse vnto thy loue syght cogregacion ye whych bryngynge theyr way worthely vnto god thou shalt well gone forth hys name sake cori b cor takynge nothinge heythen ought therfore math cto receaue suche maye fellowhelpers truth happely wrytten vnto congregacio diotrephes whyche loueth beare rule doth receaue v therfore yf shall come shal admonysh hym hys workes doth bablynge agaynst v wt euell wordes though thynges sufficiente vnto hym nother doth receaue brother receaue doth forbyd cast forth congregacion dearly beloued followe euel yt good doth well god yt doth euel seyth god vnto demetrius good reporte geue euery one truth herselfe yee also geue hym good reporte thou knowest yt reporte true many thynges wryt vnto ioh b wolde wt ynke penne wryte vnto trust se shortly shall speake mouth mouth peace vnto fredes grete grete frendes name pthe ende thyrd canonicall epistle ihon apostle canonicall epistle iude apostle fyrst chapter ivdas seruaunte iesus christe brother iames vnto sayntes ar beloued god father kepte called christ iesu mercy vnto peace loue fulfylled dearly beloue busyenge mooste carefully wryte vnto nedefull vnto wryte vnto youre commune saluacion desyrynge fayth delyuered vnto sayntes stryuen thorow petri afor ther men preuely entred whych longe sence wrytten vnto suche iudgement wycked chaungyng grace lord iesus christe lechery psal denyenge ruler lorde iesus christ wyll admonysh knowynge al ye iesus sauynge people ye lade egipte secodarely num destroyed dyd beleue esa b iob b apoc angel kepte theyr princely state haue lefte theyr dwellyng hath kepte wyth eternall bandes vnder darknesse vnto iudgement great daye gen sodoma gomorrha cyties thereby goynge whoryng strauge flesh sufferynge ye payne euerlastynge fyre lyke maner become ensample lykewyse truely also yt stayne theyr flesh despyse gouernaunce speake euel ye maiesty zach wha michaell archangell disputynge dyd stryue aboute body moses durst geue iudgemet agaynst blasphemy sayde god commaunde petri c truely speake euel soeuer thynges know whatsoeuer thynges knowe naturally domine beastes corrupte wo vnto gone waye gen cain erroure nu balaam spylte wyth rewarde gone gaynesayenge num chore spottes feastynge theyr meates wythout feare fedyng themselues petri cloudes wythout water whych caryed aboute wyth wyndes tree gatherynge tyme vnfrutefull twyse deade pulled vp rootes wawes ragynge see fomynge theyr shame wandrynge starres vnto whome ye tempest darkenesse kepte foreuer enoch also seuenth fro adam prophecyed sayenge esaye c apoca beholde lorde come wt hys holy thousandes geue iudgemente agaynst euery man rebuke ye wycked theyr workes wyckednesse wherewith haue done wyckedly cruell speakynges wycked synners haue spoken agaynst god murmurer coplainers walkynge theyr lustes theyr mouth speaketh pryde wonderynge men cause auauntage ye moost beloued myndfull wordes spoken afore apostle oure lorde iesus christact tim tim petri sayd vnto yt ye last season shal come mocker walkynge wyckednesses accordynge theyr pleasure separate themselues beastly hauynge sprete ye moost beloued buyldynge yourselues vpo moost holy fayth prayenge holy goost kepe yourselues loue god waytynge mercy lorde iesus christe lyfe euerlastynge truely beynge iudged rebuke ye saue ye drawynge ye fyre haue compassion vpon ye wyth feare hatynge also spotted cote whych fleshly vnto hym able kepe wythout synne set vnspotted syght glory ioye commynge lorde iesus christe vnto god saueours thorow iesus christ lorde glory maiesty empyre power worlde euer euer amen pthe ende canonicall epistle iude apostle apocalypse reuelacion apostle ihon fyrst chapter reuelacion iesus christe whyche god gaue vnto hym ioh b make manifeste vnto hys seruauntes whych must happen shortly shewed sendynge hys angell vnto hys seruaunt ihon ioha whych dyd beare wytnesse word god wytnesse vnto iesus christ euer dyd se apoc happy readeth heareth ye wordes thys prophecy kepeth thynges written thesame ye time hade ihon vnto seuen congregacions asia grace vnto peace fro hym yt come fro seue spretes syght hys trone iesus christ whych faythfull wytnesse cori c coloss b fyrst borne deade prynce kynges earth whyche hath loued v hebre b petri c ioh b hath washe v fro sinnes bloud hath made v kingdom prestes vnto god hys father vnto hym glory empyre euer euer amen math c iude c beholde cometh wyth cloudes euery eye shall se hym zach c ioha haue pearsed kynred earthe shall bewayle themselues ouer hym eue amen esa b apoc c alpha omega begynnynge ende sayeth lorde god almyghty whyche whych whych come ihon brother partaker tribulacion kyngdome pacience christe iesu ye ile whych called pathmos worde god wytnesse iesus christ spret sondaye herde greate voyce behynde trompe sayeng thou seyst wryte boke sende vnto seuen co gregacions asia vnto ephesus smyrna pergamus thyatira sardis philadelphia laodicia turned myght se voyce spake vnto beynge turned sawe seuen golden candelstickes myddes seuen golden candelstickes one daniel b lyke sonne man clothed wyth longe garmente reachynge towes gyrded aboute brest wyth golden gyrdle hys heade heeres whyte whyte woll snowe apoc c c hys eyen flame fyre hys fete lyke vnto brasse burnynge burnynge ouen hys voyce voyce many water hys ryghthade seuen starres apoc c hys mouth wente swearde sharpe sydes math hys face sonne shyneth hys strength whan hadde sene hym fell hys fete euen deade layde hys ryghthande vpon sayenge feare esai fyrst last rom b alyue deade beholde lyuynge euer euer iob b esaie apoc b haue keyes death hell wryte therfore thynges yt thou hast sene yt must done thys mystery seue starres whych yu hast sene handes seuen golden candelstickes thys seuen starres angel seuen congregacions seuen candelstickes seuen congregacions ii chapter wryte vnto mal c b cor b apoc angel ye cogregacion ephesus thinges sayeth yt holdeth ye seue starres hys ryghthande whyche walketh myddes seuen golde ca delstickes knowe thy workes laboure thy pacience thou canst suffre euel men hast proued saye apostle hast foude lyars hast pacience hast suffred name sake hast faynted haue thynges agaynst yu hast left thy fyrst loue therfore myndeful whence thou arte falle fro repente fyrst workes luce yf shall come quickly vnto remoue thy candelsticke fro hys place wythoute thou repente thys hast yu also thou hatest dedes actu nicolaitans whych hate also yt hath eare let hym heare sprete saye vnto congregacions vnto hym ouercommeth shal geue eat gen b tre lyfe ye paradyse god vnto angell congregacion smyrna wryte thynges sayeth esay fyrst laste whyche deade lyueth knowe thy tribulacion thy pouerte thou arte ryche thou arte blasphemed say iewes sinagoge satanas feare none thynges thou shalte suffre beholde deuel shall cast preson ye maye proued ye shall haue tribulacion ten dayes faythfull vntyll death shall geue tob tim athe crowne lyfe hath eare let hym heare sprete doth saye vnto congregacions shall ouercomme shall hurte seconde death wryte vnto angell congregacion pergamus thynges sayeth hath hebre c sharpe two edged swearde knowe thou dwellest seate satanas thou kepest name haste denyed fayth dayes antipas faythfull wytnesse whyche slaye satanas dwelleth haue fewe thynges agaynst yu hast holde ye doctrine num c balaa whych taught balac put occasion synne ye chyldre israel eat comit fornicacio eue hast yu also yt kepe ye doctrine nicolaitans repent thou lykewyse yf wyll come shortly vnto fyght agaynst wt swearde mouth hath eare let hym heare ye sprete doth say vnto ye congregacions vnto hym ouercometh shal geue hyd na shal geue hym whyte stone stone esaie ioha new name wrytten whych noman knoweth saue receaueth wryte vnto ye angel ye cogregacion thyatira thinges sayeth ye sone god apoc c cwhich hath eye ye flame fyre hys fete lyke vnto copper knowe thy workes fayth thy loue seruice thy paciece thy last workes tha ye fyrst haue fewe thynges agaynst yu suffrest ye woma reg reg c iesabel teach whiche sayeth prophete myscary seruautes vse fornicacion eate idolofferynges haue geuen respyte repente wyll repente hyr fornicacion beholde cast bedde vse whoredome wyth shalbe greate tribulacion wythout repente theyr workes shall slaye hyr chyldren death congregacions shal knowe iere b psal b searchynge reynes harte shall geue vnto euery one accordynge hys dedes saye yt thyatira whosoeuer haue doctrine yt haue knowen depth sata say shal laye none charge vpo wtstadyng kepe yt whych ye haue vntyll come yt shal ouercome shal kepe workes vntyl ye endepsal apoc shal geue hi power ouer ye nacios shal rule wyth yron rodde shalbe broke potter vessel also haue receaued father shall geue hym mornynge starre hath eare let hym heare sprete doth saye vnto congregacions iii chapter vnto apoca angel ye co gregacio sardis wryte thynges sayeth yt hath seuen spretes god seue starres knowe thy workes yu hast name thou doest lyue thou art dead thou wakyng strengthen ye reste yt dyenge haue foude thy workes ful god haue therfore mynde thou hast receaued herde kepe repent yf thou therfore shalt watch shall come vnto math thess pet b thefe thou shalt knowe houre shal come vnto yu hast name sardis whyche haue defyled theyr garmetes shall walke wt whyte garmetes worthy yt shal ouercome shall clothed wt whyte garmente shal put hys name luce boke lyfe shall knowlege hys name father hys angel hath eare let hym heare sprete doth saye vnto congregacions vnto angell congregacion philadelphia wryte thynges sayeth ye holy true whych hath keye dauid whych esay iob b apoca openeth noma shutteth shutteth noman openeth knowe thy workes beholde haue dore open whych noman shute thou hast lytle strength hast kepte worde hast denyed name beholde shall geue synagoge say iewes lye beholde shal make come worshippe thy fete shall knowe yt haue loued thou hast kepte worde pacience wyll also kepe houre teptacion whych shall come vpo whole worlde proue ye dweller earth beholde come quyckely holde thou hast noma take away thy crown yt shal ouer come shal make pyler teple god shall nomore go forth wyll wryte vpon hym ye name god name ye cytie god newe ierusalem apoc awhych come fro heaue fro god new name hath eare let heare sprete sayeth vnto congregacios vnto angell congregacion laodicia wryte thynges sayeth amen faythfull true wytnesse whych begynnyng creature god know thy workes thou arte nother colde whote wolde god thou werest ether colde whote thou arte lukewarme nother whote colde shal begyn spewe mouth yu sayest rych encreaced haue nede nothyng thou doest knowe thou art wretched myserable poore blynde naked counsell bye golde tryed fyre thou mayest become rych thou clothed wt whyte garmentes ye shame thy apoca c nakednesse appeare anoynte thyne eye wt eye salue yu mayest se prou b hebre loue rebuke chastise feruent therfore repente beholde stande dore knocke yf ony shal heare voyce shall open ye dore vnto shall entre vnto hym shal suppe wyth hym shall ouercome shall graunt hym luce b syt seate also haue ouercome haue sytten wyth father hys seate hath eare let hym heare sprete sayeth vnto congregacions iiii chapter thys loked behold dore ope heaue fyrst voyce yt herde trope speakynge wyth sayenge come vp hether shal shewe yt thynges must happen shortely thys forthwyth sprete beholde ther seate set heauen one syttynge vpon ye seate yt sat lyke vnto iasper stone sardinestone ther reynebow ye copasse seat like vnto ye sight smaragde de b apoc band aboute seate foure twenty seates vpon seates foure twenty elder syttynge decked whyte garmetes vpo theyr heades golden crownes trone dyd procede lyghtenynges voyces thonderynges seuen burnynge lapes ye trone ye whych seuen spretes god syght ye seate ben glassy see lyke vnto cristall myddes seate co passe seat foure beastes full eye behynde ye fyrst beaste lyke vnto lion seconde lyke vnto calfe thyrde beaste hauynge face lyke man fourth beaste lyke vnto egle flyeng ye foure beastes euery one syxe wynges aboute wythin full eye rest nyght day sayenge esai holy holy holy lorde god omnipotent whych yt come wha beastes gaue glory honoure blessynge vnto hym yt sytteth vpon ye trone lyuyng euer euer foure twenty elder came forth hym sytteth vpon trone worshipped lyuynge euer euer layde downe theyr crownes ye trone sayng thou arte worthy lord god receaue glory honoure power thou haste created thynges thy wylles sake created v chapter saw ye ryghthande hym yt sat vpon ye trone ezech ba boke wrytten wt wt sealed wt seue seales saw stroge angel preachig wt loude voyce worthy open ye boke louse seales noma able open nother heauen earth vnder earth nother loke wepte much noma foude worthy open boke loke one elder sayde vnto wepe gen b esay b beholde lyon trybe iuda roote dauid hath ouercome ope boke lose hys seuen seales sawe beholde myddes trone foure beastes elder lambe standynge kylled hauynge seuen horne seuen eye seuen spretes god sente ye earth came toke ye boke ryght hande sat seate whan opened ye boke foure beastes ye foure twenty elder fel downe lambe hauynge euery one harpes golden vial full odoure whych prayer sayntes sange new songe sayenge thou arte worthy lorde receaue boke open hys seales hebr b petri c ioha b apoc thou wast slayne haste redimed v vnto god thy bloude euery kinred tunge people nacion thou haste made v vnto oure god kyngdome prestes shal raygne vpon earth daniel band sawe herde voyce many angel compasse seate beastes elder nombre thousandes thousandes sayenge wyth loude voyce labe slaye worthy receaue power godheade wysedome strength honoure glory blessynge euery creature heauen vpon earth vnder earth see therin herde al sayenge vnto hym sytteth seate vnto lambe blessyng honoure glory power euer euer foure beastes sayd amen foure twenty elder fell vpon theyr face worshipped lyuyng euer euer vi chapter sawe lambe opened one ye seue seales herde one foure beastes sayenge voyce thoder come se saw beholde zach b whyte horse sat vpon bowe ther crowne geuen vnto hym wente co querynge shulde ouercome whan opened ye seconde seale herde seconde beast sayenge come se ther wente another horse reede sat vpon geuen hym take waye peace earth shulde slaye ech ther great swearde geuen hym whan opened ye thyrde seale herde thyrde beaste sayenge come se beholde blacke horse sat vpon payre balauces hys hande herde bene voyce ye myddes foure beastes sayenge two pounde weyght wheat one peny thre two pounde weyghtes barlye one peny wyne oyle thou hurte wha opened fourth seale herde voyce fourth beaste sayenge come se beholde pale horse sat vpon hys name called death hell followed hym power geuen hym vpon ye foure partes earth kyll wt swearde honger death beastes earth whan opened fyfte seale saw vnder altare soules slayne worde god wytnesse cryed wyth loude voyce sayeng esa b danie bhow longe lorde thou holy true doest thou iudge doest auenge bloude dwell vpon earth vnto euery one geuen whyte garmentes esay c sayd vnto shuld rest yet lytle whyle vntyll theyr fellow seruauntes brother fulfylled whyche kylled also saw whan opened syxte seale beholde ther happened great math f earthquake ye sone became blacke heery sacke moone became altogether bloud starres fell downe heauen vpon earth fygge tre casteth hys vntymely fygges wha shake greate wynde heaue wente awaye boke rolled together euery hyll yles remoued theyr place esaye c kynges earth prynces captaynes rych stronge euery bondman fre man hyd themselues denes rockes hylles saye vnto mountaynes rockes osee b luc c apoca b fall vpon v hyde v syghte hym sytteth vpon trone fro wrath lambe ye great daye theyr wrath come shalbe able endure vii chapter thynges sawe foure angel standynge vpon foure corner earth holdyng ye foure wyndes ye earth shulde blowe vpo earth vpon ye see vpon ony tre sawe another angell commynge vp rysynge sonne hauynge token lyuynge god cryed loude voyce vnto ye foure angel vnto whome geuen hurte earth see sayenge apoc hurte earth see nother tree vntyll seale seruauntes god theyr foreheades herde nombre sealed hundreth foure forty thousande sealed euery trybe chyldren israel trybe iuda twelfe thousande sealed trybe ruben twelfe thousande sealed trybe gad twelfe thousande sealed trybe aser twelfe thousande sealed trybe nephthalim twelfe thousande sealed ye trybe manasse twelfe thousande sealed trybe simeo twelfe thousande sealed trybe leui xii thousad sealed page missing greate mountayne burnynge cast ye see ye thyrde parte ye see became bloude thyrde parte ye creature dyed lyfe see thyrde parte shippes peryshed ye thyrd angell blewe wyth trompet ther fell great burnynge starre fro heauen lyke creshet fell vpo thyrde parte floodes vpo foutaynes water name starre called wormewoode thyrde parte ye water became wormewoode many men dyed water became bytter fourth angell dyd blowe wyth trompet ye thyrde parte sone smytten thyrd parte ye moone thyrde parte starres insomuche thyrde parte darkened thyrde parte daye dyd shyne nyghte lykewyse sawe herde voyce egle flyenge myddes heauen sayenge wyth loude voyce wo wo wo vnto dweller earth ye voyces angel blowe wyth trompet ix chapter fyfte angell dydde blowe wyth trompet sawe starre falle downe vpon earth ther geue hym ye keye zacha bthe botto lesse pytte opened botto lesse pytte smoke ye pytte wente vp apoc c smoke greate fornace sone ayer darkened smoke pytte smoke ye pyt went locustes earth power geuen scorpio ye earth haue power apoc commaunded shulde hurte grasse earth euery grene thynge euery tre saue onely men haue ye token god theyr foreheades sayd vnto shuld kyl yt shuld vexe fyue monethes theyr payne payne scorpion whan styngeth man dayes osee b apoca shal men seke death shall fynde shall couet dye death shall flye lykenesses locustes lyke vnto horse prepared vnto battayll vpon theyr heades ben crownes lyke vnto golde theyr face face men heeres heeres wemen theyr teth teth lion habergions yron habergions soude theyr wynges sounde charrets many horse runnynge battayle tayles lyke scorpion ther stynges theyr tayles theyr power hurte men fyue monethes angell ye bottomlesse pytte kynge ouer whose name hebrue abaddon greke apollyon latine hauynge ye name rootynge one wo paste beholde ther come yet two woe thys syxte angell dyd blowe wt tompet herde voyce foure horne golden altare whyche ye eye god sayenge vnto syxte angel yt tropet louse foure angel yt boude great floude euphrates foure angel loused ready houre daye moneth yeare shuld kyll thyrde parte nombre horseman twenty tymes ten thousade herde theyr nombre thus sawe horse vision sat vpo fyre habergions yelowe brymstony horse heades heades lyon theyr mouth come forth fyre smoke brymstone thre plage thyrde parte men slayne namely fyre smoke brymstone whych dyd come forth theyr mouth power ye horse theyr mouth theyr tayles theyr tayles lyke serpentes hauynge heades wyth hurte ye rest kylled wyth plage nother repented workes theyr handes shulde worship deuels golden ymages syluer brasse stone woode whych nother heare se walke apoca c haue repented theyr manslaughter theyr wytchcraftes theyr fornicacion theyr theftes x chapter saw another mighty angel comyng downe fro heaue clothed wt cloude raynebow vpon hys heade hys face ye sone hys fete pyler fyre hys hande lytle boke ope set hys ryght foote vpo ye see lefte vpon earth cryed wyth loude voyce whan lyon roareth wha cryed seue thoders spake theyr voyces whan ye seue thonders spotheyr voyces wryte herde voyce fro heauen sayeng vnto seale vp thynges yt seuen thoders haue spoke wryte daniel b angel whome sawe standyng vpo see vpon ye lande lyfte vp hys hade towarde heauen dyd sweare ye lyuynge euer euer whych dyd create heaue thynges therein earth thynges yt see thynges yt therin ther shalbe nomore tyme ye dayes voyce seuenth angell wha tropet shal begyn blow mystery god shalbe fynished hath preached hys seruauntes ye prophetes herde voice fro heauen speakyng agayne wt sayenge go take boke open hande angel sta dynge vpo see vpon ye earth wente vnto angell sayenge vnto hym shulde geue boke sayd vnto ezech e take boke eate vp shall make thy belly become bytter thy mouth shalbe swete hony toke boke angel hande dyd eate vp swete mouth hony whan eate vp belly become bytter sayde vnto thou must prophecy agayne vnto heythen people tunges many kynges xi chapter ther geuen rede lyke vnto rodde sayde vnto ezech ryse meete te ple god altare worship ye quere yt temple cast meete geuen vnto heythen holy cytie shal tread vnder foot two fortye monethes shall geue vnto two wytnesses shall prophecy thousande two hundreth thre score dayes clothed sackes zach two olyue tree two shynynge candelstickes standynge ye presence god ye earth yf ony wyl hurte fyre shall go theyr mouth shal cosume theyr enemyes yf ony wyl hurt must kylled haue power shut heauen rayne ye tyme theyr prophecy haue power ouer water turne bloude smyte earth wyth euery plage ofte wyll dan apoc whan shall haue fynyshed theyr testimony beaste dyd come vp bottomlesse pit shal make warre agaynste shall ouercome shall kyll theyr bodyes shall lye stretes greate cytie whyche spiritually called sodoma egypte theyr lord also crucifyed ye tribe people tuges heythe shal se theyr bodyes thre dayes half shal suffre theyr bodyes layde graues dweller vpo earth shal reioyce ouer glad shal sende presetes ech two prophetes vexed dwelte vpon earth danie b thre dayes halfe dyd ye sprete lyfe god entre stode vpo theyr fete danie f great feare fell vpon dyd se herde great voyce heauen sayenge vnto come vp hether wente vp heauen cloude theyr enemyes sawe houre ther happened great earthquake thyrde parte cytie fell earthquake slayne ye name men seuen thousande ye remnaunte feared gaue prayse vnto god heaue seconde wo paste beholde thyrde wo shall come shortely seuenth angel dyd blowe wt ye tro pet ther happened great voyces heaue sayenge kyngdo thys worlde become oure lordes hys christes shall raygne euer euer amen foure twentye elder syt syght god theyr seates fell vpon theyr face worshipped god sayenge thanke oure lorde god almyghty whych arte werest whych arte come thou hast receaued thy great might haste raygned heythe angry thy wrath come tyme dead iudged geue rewarde vnto thy seruau te ye prophetes vnto ye sayntes ye drede thy name great smal roote yt haue corrupped ye earth ye teple god opened heaue arke hys testamet sene teple ther happened lyghtenynges voyces tho drynges earthquake great hayle xii chapter ther appeared great toke heauen woma clothed wt sone moone vnder hyr fete hyr head crowne twelfe starres wt chylde cryed trauaylynge payned yt may brynge forth ther sene another token heaue beholde greate reede draggo hauyng seue heades ten horne vpon hys heades seuen crownes wt tayle drue ye thyrde parte starres heaue caste earth ye draggo stode woma shulde brynge forth yt whan brought forth myght deuoure hyr chylde brought forth machylde rule ye heythe wt rod yron hyr sonne take vp vnto god vnto hys trone apoc c woma fled ye wyldernesse place prepared god yt may fede thousad two hu dreth thre score dayes ther happened great battayll heaue dan michael hys angel fought draggon draggon fought hys angel preuayled nother theyr place founde ony heaue esaie b luce b thesame great draggon cast ye old serpent whych called deuel satanas whyche deceaueth whole worlde caste earth hys angel sente wyth hym herde great voyce heauen sayenge saluacio stregth ye kingdome become god ye power hys christes accuser brother whych accused nyght daye ye presece god throwe downe haue ouercome hym bloud ye lambe worde hys wytnesse haue loued theyr lyues vntyl death reioyce therfore ye heauens ye dwell wo vnto earth set deuell come downe vnto hauynge great wrath beynge sure hath lytle tyme draggon sawe caste downe earth persued woman broughte forth manchylde vnto ye woman geuen two greate wynges great egle apoca c shulde flye ye deserte hyr place wher noryshed daniel tyme tymes halfe tyme ye syghte serpente serpent cast water hys mouth ye woman lyke ryuer myght make drawen ryuer earth dyd helpe woman earth opened hyr mouth swalowed vp ye ryuer whych ye draggon cast hys mouth draggo wroth wt woman wete make battayll wt residue hyr sede kepe ye comaundementes god haue wytnesse iesus christe stode vpon sonde see xiii chapter sawe beast rysyng apoca cout see hauyng seuen heades ten horne vpo horne ten crownes vpon heades name blasphemy daniel beaste dyd se lyke vnto cat ye mou tayne hys fete lyke fete beer hys mouth mouth lyon draggo gaue hym hys vertue great power sawe one hys heades slaye death stroke hys death healed earth wondered ye beaste worshipped ye draggon gaue power vnto beast worshipped beaste sayenge lyke vnto beaste shalbe able stryue wyth hym hym geuen mouth speakynge greate thynges blasphemyes power geuen vnto hym two forty monethes opened mouth blasphemyes vnto god shulde speake euell hys name tabernacle dwell heauen apoc geuen hym make battayll wt sayntes ouercome power geuen hym vpo euery kynred people tuge nacion daniel f dwelt vpo earth worshipped thesame whose name wrytten boke lyfe lambe whych kylled begynnynge worlde hath eare let hym heare gene math shall leade captiuite goeth captiuite yt shall slaye wyth swearde muste slayne wyth swearde apoc c pacience fayth sayntes sawe another beaste goyng vp earth two horne lyke ye labes spake lyke ye draggon dyd al ye power ye fyrste beaste hys fyght caused earth dwelt worshippe fyrst beaste whose wounde death healed dyd great token insomuche caused fyre also come downe fro heauen earth syght men myscaryed dweller vpon earth reason toke yt geuen hym syghte beaste sayenge vnto dwel earth make ymage vnto beaste whych hath ye woude swearde dyd lyue geuen hym yt shulde geue sprete vnto ymage beaste ymage beaste speake shall make whosoeuer shall worshippe ymage beaste maye slayne shall cause small great rych poore fre bode haue marke theyr ryght hande theyr foreheades man myghte bye sell saue haue marke name ye beaste nombre hys name wysedome hath vnderstandynge let hym count nombre beaste hys nombre bre hys nombre syxe hundreth thre score syxe xiiii chapter sawe beholde lambe stode vpon ye moute sion wyth hym hundreth foure forty thousande hauynge hys name name hys father wrytten theyr foreheades herde voyce heauen lyke soude many water voyce greate thonder voyce herd lyke many harper playenge theyr harpes dyd synge ben new songe seate foure beastes elder noma could learne songe saue hundreth foure forty thousade bought earth defyled wyth wemen virgin followe lambe euer doth go cori c apoc b boughte men fyrst frutes vnto god lambe theyr mouth lye foude wythout spot ye trone god sawe another angell flyenge thorowe myddes heauen hauyng euerlastynge gospel yt myght preach vnto syt vpon earth vpon euery nacion kynred tunge people sayenge wt loude voyce feare lord geue hym honoure houre hys iudgement come worshippe hym psal act c hath made heauen earth see fountaynes water another angell dyd followe hym sayenge esa b iere b apoca fallen fallen greate babilon whyche hath made nacions drynke wyne wrath hyr fornicacion thyrde angell followed sayenge wyth loude voyce yf ony man shall worshippe beast hys ymage shall receaue marke hys foreheade hys hande thesame shall also drynke wyne wrathe god whych mengled wt pure wyne cuppe wrath shalbe tormented wyth fyre brymstone syght ye holy angel syght ye lambe apoc aand smoke theyr tormentes shal go vp euermore nother haue rest nyght day whych haue worshipped beaste ymage whosoeuer shall receaue marke hys name apoc pacience saintes whych kepe commaundemetes god fayth iesus herde voyce heaue sayeng vnto wryte blessed deade dye ye lorde hence forth nowe sayeth sprete rest fro theyr laboures theyr workes follow loked beholde whyt cloude vpon cloude one syttynge lyke vnto sonne man hauyng heade golde crowne sharpe syckle hys hande another angel wente temple cryeng wyth loude voyce hym sat vpon cloude ioel b math put thy sycle reape houre come reaped harueste earthe waxen rype yt sat cloude put hys syckle earth dyd reape ther wente another angell temple whych heauen also sharp syckle another angell went altare power ouer fyre cryed wyth loude voice vnto hym sharpe syckle sayenge put thy sharpe syckle gather cluster vyneyarde earth hys grape rype ye angel thrust hys sharpe syckle earth cut downe ye vyne yarde earth cast great wynefat wrath god wynefat trodden wythout cytie bloude came wynefat vntyll horsebrydles space thousade syxe hundreth furlonges xv chapter sawe another greate maruaylous token heauen seuen angel hauynge seuen laste plage danie wrath god fulfylled sawe glassy see myngled fyre ouercome beaste hys ymage nombre name standynge vpon glassye see hauynge harpes god syngyng new songe moses seruaut god songe lambe sayenge great wonderfull thy workes lorde god almyghty iust true thy wayes thou kynge euerlastyng tymes iere shall feare lorde shall magnifye thy name thou art holy gentyles shal come worshippe thy syghte thy iudgementes manifest thynges sawe beholde ye tabernacle wytnesse heauen open seuen angel wente teple hauinge seue plage clothed wyth cleane bryght lynnen beynge gyrded wyth golden gyrdles aboute brestes one foure beastes gaue vnto seue angel seue golde vial full ye wrath god lyuinge euer euer ezec ye teple god fylled wt smoke maiestye god hys power noma coulde entre teple vntyll ye plage seuen angel fulfylled xvi chapter herde great voyce teple sayeng vnto ye seue angel go poure forth ye seue vial wrath god vpo ye earth fyrst angel went poured hys vyal vpon ye earth ther happened noysome moost greuous botch men whych ye beastes marke vpon dyd worship beast hys ymage ye secode angel poured hys vyal vpon see became bloude one yt deade euery lyuynge soule dyd dye see thyrde angell dyd poure hys vyall vpon ryuers vpon ye foutaynes water became bloude herde angell water sayeng thou arte righteous lord art werest yu holy whyche haste iudged thys haue shed ye bloud thy saltes prophetes yu hast geuen bloude drynke worthy herde another angel sayeng yee lord god almyghty thy iudgemetes true ryghteous fourth angell poured vyall agaynste sonne geuen hym vexe men wyth heate fyre men dyd rage greate heate blasphemed name god hauyng power ouer plage nother dyd repente shulde geue hym prayse ye fyfte angell poured hys vyal vppon beastes seate hys kyngdome became darke dyd eate theyr tunges payne dyd blaspheme god heauen theyr paynes woudes dyd repente theyr workes syxte angell powred hys vyall vpon ye great floude euphrates dryed hys water ye waye myght ready vnto kynges rysynge sonne sawe thre vncleane spretes go oute mouth draggon mouth beaste mouth false prophet lyke frogges spretes deuels doynge token go forth vnto kynges whole earth gather battayll vnto great daye ye almyghty god mat luce e thess pet b beholde come thefe happy watcheth kepeth hys garmetes apoc dlest go naked se fylthynesse shal gather place hebrue called armageddo seuenth angell poured oute hys vyall agaynste ayre ther wente great voyce temple seate sayenge done ther happened lyghtenynges voyces thonderynges ther happened greate earthquake suche neuer sence vpo earth earthquake great ye great cytie became thre partes cyties nacions fel downe great babilon came remembraunce god geue cuppe wyne fearcenesse hys wrath euery ile dyd flye mountaynes founde great hayle lyke talet came downe heauen vpon men men blasphemed god plage hayle became exceadynge great xvii chapter one seue angel seuen vyales came vnto spake wyth sayenge come wyll shewe th danacion great whore whych sytteth vpon many water wyth whyche kynges earth haue comytted fornicacion dyd dwell vpon earth become dronke wyne hyr whoredome toke sprete deserte sawe woman syttynge vpo rose coloured beast ful name blasphemy hauynge seue heades ten horne woma clothed wyth purper scarlet gylt golde precious stone pearles hauynge golde cuppe hyr hande full abominacio vnclennesse hyr fornicacion hyr forehead name writte mystery great babilo ye mother fornicacions abhominacios earth sawe woman dronke bloude sayntes bloude martyres iesus whan sawe maruayled wyth great wonder angell sayd vnto wherfore maruaylest thou shall tell mystery woman beast beareth hath seue heades ten horne beast thou hast sene shal come bottomlesse pytte shall go destruccion dweller vpo earth shall wonder luce b pilip apoc b whose name wrytten boke lyfe constitucion worlde seynge beast meanynge hath wysedome seuen heades seuen moutaynes vpon ye whych woman sytteth ther seuen kynges fyue fallen one yet come whan shall come muste abyde lytle season beast whyche also eyght seue goeth destruccion dan b apoc ten horne thou hast sene ten kynges haue yet receaued kyngdom shal receaue power one houre kynges beaste haue one counsell shall delyuer theyr power strength vnto ye beaste shall fyght ye lambe lambe shal ouercome tim c apoc c lorde lordes kynge kinges wyth hym called chosen faythfull sayd vnto esaie bthe water thou haste sene whore sytteth people nacions tuges ten horne thou haste sen beaste shall hate whore shall make desolate naked shall eate hyr flesh shall burne wyth fyre god hath geuen theyr harte pleaseth hym yt geue hys kyngdome vnto beaste vntyll ye wordes god fulfylled woman thou hast sene great cytie hath rule ouer kyngges earth xviii chapter thinges saw another angel comynge downe fro heaue hauyng great power ye earth lyghtened hys glory cryed wyth strength sayenge esaie b iere b apoc b fallen fallen greate babilon become ye dwellyng deuels holde euery vncleane sprete holde euery vncleane hatefull byrde wyne wrath hyr fornicacio haue heythen dronke ye kynges earth haue vsed fornicacio wyth marchauntes earth become rych ye power hyr pleasure herde another voyce fro heauen sayenge gene c corin c go ye people ye partaker hyr synnes ye receaue hyr plage hyr synnes come vntyll heauen lorde hath remebred hyr wyckednesse geue vnto also hath geue vnto geue twofolde accordynge hyr workes cup dyd myxe vnto myxe vnto uble much hath glorifyed herselfe hath vsed pleasure much payne sorow geue sayeth hyr harte ie syt beynge quene wedow shall se sorowe dani thess b therfore shall hyr plage come one daye death sorowe honger apoc dand wyth fyre shall burnte stronge god whyche shall iudge kinges ye earth shal bewepe wayle ouer haue vsed fornicacion wyth haue lyued pleasure whan standynge afarre shall se ye smoke hyr burnynge sayenge feare hyr punyshmet wo wo greate cytie esaie b iere b apoc b babilon stronge cytie one houre thy iudgemente come ye marchautes ye earth shall wepe wayle ouer noman shall bye theyr ware ony ware golde syluer precious stone pearle fyne lynnen purple sylke scarlet al thynen woode vessel yuory al vessel precious stone brasse yron marble cynamon rose iericho odoure salue frankeinsence wyne oyle fyne flore wheate cattell shepe horse charrettes bought seruauntes soules men appels thy soules lust departed ye well fed costly thynges peryshed fro marchauntes thinges shal fynde nomore become ryche shall stande afarre feare hyr tormentes wepyng waylynge sayenge iere b wo wo great cytie whych clothed wyth fyne lynnen purple scarlet gylte wyth golde precious stone pearles one houre greate ryches come nought euery ship gouernoure al sayle see shipmen worke see dyd stande afarre cryed seynge place hyr burnyng sayenge cytie lyke vnto thys great cytie cast dust vpon theyr heades cryed wepynge waylynge sayenge wo wo greate cytie whych become rych shippes hir ware see one houre made desolate reioyce ouer thou heauen ye holy apostle prophetes god hathe iudged youre iudgemente stronge angell toke vp stone great mylstone caste see sayenge wyth violence shall iere greate cytie babilon throwen shall nomore foude ye voyce harper ye musicias pypers tropet shall nomore herde euery craftesma euery craft shall nomore foude sounde myll shal nomore herde lyght ye burning light shal nomore shyne iere voyce brydgrome bryde shal nomore herde ye thy marchautes price ye earth al nacions haue erred page duplicate page duplicate thy wytchcraftes bloude prophetes sayntes foud thesame slayne earth xix chapter herd ben ye voyce much people heaue sayege alleluya prayse glory power vnto god hys iudgementes true ryghteous hath iudged ye great whore whych hath corrupte earth wt hir whoredome hath auenged bloude hys seruauntes hyr handes said agayne alleluya apoca c hir smoke wente vp euer euer foure twenty elder foure beastes fell downe worshipped god syttyng vpon trone sayenge amen alleluya ther wente voyce trone sayenge prayse ye god hys sayntes ye feare hym small greate herde voyce great multitude ye soude many water ye voyce great thonders sayenge alleluya oure lorde god almyghtye hath raygned let v glad reioyce let v geue prayse vnto hym spousales labe come hys wyfe hath made herselfe ready geue vnto decke bryght fyne lynnen whyte fyne lynnen ryghteousnesses sayntes said vnto wryte math luce blessed yt called supper labes spousals sayde vnto wordes god true fell hys fete myghte worshippe sayd vnto actu c c apoc cloke thou thy fellow seruaunt thy brother hauynge ye wytnesse iesu worship god wytnesse iesu ye sprete prophecy sawe heauen open behold whyte horse sat vpon called faythfull true iudgeth fyghteth wyth ryghteousnesse apoca c chys eyen flame fyre vpon hys heade many crownes hauynge name wrytten noma knoweth saue hymself esaie clothed wyth garment sprenkled wt bloude hys name called ye worde god hoostes heauen dyd followe hym vpo whyte horse clothed wyth whyte fyne lynnen pure apoca hys mouth doth procede swearde sharpe sydes wyth psal b maye smyte heythen shall rule wyth rodde yron treadeth wynefat fearcenesse wyne wrath almyghty god garment thygh hath name wrytten danie tim c apoc c kynge kynges lorde lordes sawe angell standynge sonne cryed wyth loude voyce sayenge vnto byrdes dyd flye ye middes heaue come gathered vnto greate supper god ezech ye maye eate flesh kynges flesh hyghe captaynes flesh myghtye flesh horse syt flesh yt fre bonde small great sawe beaste kynges earth theyr hoostes gathered make battayll wyth hym sat vpo ye horse wyth hoost ye beast taken wyth hym false prophete whyche wroughte myracles hym wyth deceaued receaued beastes marke dyd worshippe hys ymage daniel b math apoca c two put quycke poonde burnynge fyre wyth brymstone rest slayne wyth hebre c swearde syttynge vpon horse whyche doth procede hys mouth byrdes satisfyed wyth theyr flesh xx chapter sawe angell commynge downe heauen hauynge keye bottomlesse pytte great cheyne hys hade iob b petri b toke ye draggo ye olde serpente deuel satanas bounde hym space thousande yeares put hym bottomlesse pytte dyd shut hym sealed vpon hym deceaue heythen nomore vntyll thousande yeare fulfylled must lowsed lytle tyme daniel b apoca saw seates sat vpo iudgemente geuen sawe soules beheaded wytnesse iesu worde god dyd worshippe ye beast hys ymage nother dyd receaue hys marke theyr foreheades ha de haue lyued raygned wyth christ thousande yeares ye rest deade dyd lyue vntyll thousande yeares fulfylled thys fyrst resurreccion blessed holy yt hath parte ye fyrste resurreccion hath ye seconde death power shalbe prestes god christ shall raygne thousande yeares hym whan thousand yeares shall fulfylled satanas shalbe let louse hys preson shal go oute deceaue nacions yt vpon foure corner lande ezech gog magog shal gather battayll whose nobre ye sande ye see came vpo bredth earth copassed tentes ye sayntes beloued cytie ther came downe fyre fro god oute ye heauen consumed daniel b apoca math deuel yt deceaued cast poole fyre brymstone beast prophete shalbe tormented daye nyght euer euer sawe great bryght trone one syttynge vpon whose syghte heauen earth dyd flye ther place founde vnto daniel aand sawe deade great smal standynge syght trone bokes opened another boke opened whych ye boke lyfe deade iudged thynges yt wrytte ye bokes accordyng theyr workes ye see gaue hyr deade yt therin death hell gaue theyr deade euery one iudged accordynge theyr workes hell death cast poole fyre thys seconde death founde wrytten apoc b boke lyfe caste poole fyre xxi chapter sawe esaie c petr b new heaue newe earth fyrst heauen fyrst earth gone see nowe ihon sawe holy cytie newe ierusalem commynge downe heauen prepared god bryde garnyshed vnto hyr husbande herde great voyce trone sayeng beholde ezech tabernacle god wyth men shall dwell wyth shalbe hys people god hymselfe beynge wyth shalbe theyr god esaie b apoca c god shall wepe awaye euery teare theyr eyen ther shalbe nomore death wepyng cryeng nother shal ther ony payne fyrst gone sat trone sayde esaie c cori c petri b beholde make thynges newe sayde vnto wryte wordes moost faythfull true sayde vnto done esai b apoca b c alpha omega begynnyng ende wyll geue vnto hym thyrsteth fountayne lyuynge water frely shall ouercomme shal possesse thinges zacha b hebre c shalbe god vnto hym shalbe sonne vnto vnto fearfull vnbeleuynge cursed maslayers whoremonger sorcerer idolatrers lyars shall theyr parte apoca c poole burnynge wyth fyre brymstone seconde death ther came one seue angel haue vyals full last plage spake wyth sayenge come shall shewe bryde lambes wyfe toke vp sprete greate hygh mountayne shewed holy cytie ierusalem commynge downe fro heauen fro god hauynge clearnesse god hyr lyght lyke vnto precious stone eue vnto iaspar stone crystal great hygh wall hauynge twelfe gate gate twelfe angel name wrytten whyche name twelfe trybes chyldren israel easte thre gate northe thre gate south thre gate weste thre gate wall cytie hauynge twelfe fudametes twelfe name twelfe apostle ye labe zach spake wt golde measure rede myght measure cytie hyr gate wall cytie set square hyr length much ye bredth dyd meete cytie golden rede twelfe thousande furlonges hyr length bredth heyght equall measured wall therof hundreth foure forty cubytes measure man whych angel buyldynge hys wall iasper stone cytie selfe pure golde lyke vnto cleane glasse foundacions wall ye cytie garnished wt euery preous stone fyrst foudacio iaspar seconde saphire thyrd calcedony ye fourth smaragde fyfte sardonix syxt sardius seueth chrisolitus eyght beral nynth topase tenth chrisoprasus ye eleuenth hyacinth ye twelft amethiste ye twelfe gate twelfe pearles seuerally euery gate one pearle strete ye cytie pure gold lyke thorow shynyng glasse sawe temple lorde god omnipent temple lambe cytie nedeth sonne moone may shyne therin bryghtnesse god shal lyghten lambe lyght heythen shall walke hys lyght kynges earth shall brynge theyr glorye honoure esay b hyr gate shall shut daye ther shal nyghte shall brynge ye glory honoure heythen ther shal entre therin ony defyled thynge workynge abominacio makyng lye saue yt wryte ye boke lyfe ye labe xxii chapter shewed zacha b ryuer ye lyuyng water shynyng cristal comyng fro seate god labe ye myddes hys strete ether syde ryuer tre lyfe bryngyng forth twelfe frutes geuynge hys frute euery moneth leaues ye tre health heithe ther shalbe nomore curse seate god labe shalbe therin hys seruau te shall serue hym shall beholde hys vysage hys name shalbe theyr foreheades ther shalbe nomore nyght shall haue nede lyght ye burnyng lyght light sone ye lorde god shal lyghte shall raygne euer euer sayd vnto wordes moost faythfull true lorde god ye spretes ye prophetes sent hys angell shewe vnto hys seruautes thynges yt must done quyckely beholde come quyckely happy kepeth ye sayenges prophecy boke ihon haue herde sene thynges herde sene fell downe yt myghte worshippe fete angell whyche dyd shewe thynges sayd vnto se yu thy fellowseruaunt thy brethre prophetes yt kepe wordes prophecye thys boke worshippe god sayeth vnto seale ye wordes prophecy thys boke ye tyme hade yt hurteth let hym hurte styll yt fythynesses let hym fylthy styll yt ryghteous let hym righteous yt holy let hallowed behold come quickely rewarde wyth geue vnto euery man accordyng hys workes alpha omega fyrst laste begynnynge ende blessed yt wash theyr garmetes bloude ye lambe theyr power may ye tre lyfe yt maye go ye cytie thorow gate wythout dogges sorcerer vncleane persos murthurers idolatrers euery one yt loueth maketh lesynge iesus haue sente myne angell testifye thynges ye cogregacions roote kynred dauid shynynge mornynge starre sprete brydgrome say come yt heareth let say come yt doth thyrst let hym come wyll let hym take ye water lyfe frely testifye vnto euery one hearynge ye wordes thys prophecy yf ony shall adde god shall adde vpon hym plage wrytten thys boke yf ony diminish ye wordes boke prophecy god shal take awaye hys parte boke lyfe holy cytie thynges yt wrytten thys boke beareth wytnesse thynges sayeth yee come quickly come lorde iesu grace lorde iesus christe wyth amen pthe ende apocalipse reuelacion ihon apostle pthe ende new testament pa table finde epistle gospel vsually red church salysbury vse wherof fyrst lyne epistle gospell whose begynnynge thou shalte fynde boke marked wyth crosse ende wyth halfe crosse conteyned wythin letter namely b c c pon fyrst sondaye aduent rom xiii b knowynge thys mat xxi whan drue nye wednisdaye iaco v b pacient therfore brethre mar begynnyng go frydaye esay li herken vnto math iii came iesus pon seconde sonday aduent rom xv thynges soeuer luce xxi c ther shalbe token wednisdaye zacha viii thus sayeth lorde math xi b verely saye vnto frydaye esay lxii b wyll set watchman ioh b ihon beareth wytnesse pon iii sondaye aduent cor iiii let man estyme v math xi whan ihon herde wednisdaye esay ii thys worde luce b syxte moneth frydaye esay xi ther shall come rodde luce mary rysynge pon fourth sondaye aduent phili iiii reioyce lord ioh b thys recorde wednisdaye ioel ii e iii c glad luce vii b thys saynge hym frydaye zacha ii b glad reioyce mar viii b take hede beware christmasse euen rom paule seruaunt math c truely generacion pin christmasse nyght ye masse tit ii b grace god luce ii befell pat seconde masse tit iii whan kyndnesse luce ii c shepherdes spake pat thyrde masse hebr god speakynge tymes past ioh begynnynge saynt steuens daye actu vi b steuen full fayth mat xxiii e therfore saye vnto ihon euangelistes day eccli xv feareth god ioh xxi followe peter beynge chyldermasse daye apo xiiii sawe beholde math ii c angell lorde pon sondaye christmasse gal iiii saye longe luce ii e father mother pon newyeares daye tit ii b grace god luce ii c whan eyght dayes twelfte euen tit ii b grace god math ii whan herode deade twelfte daye esay lx get vp tymes math ii whan iesus therfore pon fyrst sonday xii day esay xiii lorde thanke ioh next daye agayne stode pon ii sonday xii daye rom xii beseke therfore brethre luce ii f whan twelfe pon iii sondaye xii day rom xii lyke haue many ioh ii vpon thyrde daye pon iiii sondaye xii daye rom xii c wyse mat viii whan iesus come pon v sondaye xii daye rom xiii b owe noman ought saue mat viii c whan wente pon vi sondaye xii daye colo iii b put ye therfore mat xiii kyngdome heaues pon septuagesima sondaye cor ix knowe ye math xx kyngdome heauens pon sexagesima sondaye ii cor xi c ye suffre fooles gladly luce viii whan much people came pon quinquagesima sondaye cor xiii ye shall speake luce xviii iesus toke ashwednisdaye iohel ii c therfore sayeth math vi b whan ye taste become frydaye esa lviii therfore cry math v e ye haue herde pon fyrst sondaye lent ii cor vi helpynge exhorte math iiii iesus led wednisdaye e od xxiiii c iii reg xix math xii answered hym cer frydaye ezec xviii c thus sayeth lord ioh v ther pon seconde sondaye lent te iiii farthermore therfore bre mat xv c iesus beynge depar wednisdaye hest xiii mardocheus thought math xx b iesus goynge p frydaye gen xxxvii ioseph sayd vnto bre math xxi heare another parable pon iii sondaye lent ephe v ye therfore folio luce xi b castynge wednisdaye exo xx b honoure thy father math xv came vnto hym frydaye num xx congregacion ioh iiii came therfore cytie pon fourth sondaye lent gal iiii c ther wrytten ioh vi whan iesus lyft vp hys wednisdaye esay c eze xxxvi ioh ix iesus goynge frydaye iii reg xvii c actes ioh xi ther one sycke called pon v sondaye lent heb ix b christ commynge ioh viii rebuke wednisdaye leui xix lord talked ioh x c dedicacion frydaye iere xvii c lorde al ioh xi gathered hygh pon palme sondaye phi ii let mynde math xxvi ye know two wednisdaye esay liii lorde geueth luce xxii feast daye swete good frydaye exod xii lorde sayd vnto ioh xviii whan iesus spoken easter euen col iii yf ye therfore rysen mat xxviii vpon euenynge pon easterdaye cor v b pourge therfore olde math xvi whan sabbat mondaye actu x peter openynge hys luce xxiiii b beholde two tewsdaye actu xiii c ye men brother ye chyl luce xxiiii c iesus stode ye myddest wednisdaye actu iii b ye men israell ioh xxi afterwarde dyd iesus thursdaye actu viii c angel lord ioh xx b mary stode without ye frydaye pet ii c christ also suffred v mat xxviii c eleuen disciple saterdaye pet ii layenge awaye therfore ioh xx fyrst daye ye sab pon fyrst sonday easter ioh v borne ioh xx c whan late pon ye secode sonday easter pet ii c christ also suffred v ioh x b good shepherde pon iii sondaye easter pet ii b ye moost beloued ioh xvi b yet lytle whyle pon iiii sondaye easter iaco b euery best gyfte ioh xvi go vnto hym pon v sonday crosse iaco c ye doer ioh xvi c verely c yf ye shall axe mondaye iaco v c knowlege youre synnes luce xi shall haue tewsdaye tim ii desyre therfore instantly marc xii iesus syttynge ouer ag wednisdaye actu iiii multitude ioh xiiii thys sayd iesus ascension daye actu fyrst treatyse verely marc xvi b laste appea pon sondaye ascen pet iiii b ye therfore wyse wa ioh xv c whan comforter whytsoneuen actu xix fortuned wha apol ioh xiiii b yf ye loue kepe co pon whytsondaye actu ii whan dayes ioh xiiii c yf ony man loueth mondaye actu x e commaunded v ioha iii c god dyd loue teusdaye actu viii b wha apostle ye ioha x verely verely c wednysdaye actu ii b dyd peter lyfte ioha vi e man come vnto thursdaye actu viii philippe goyng luce ix xii apostle beyng cal frydaye actu ii c ye men israel heare luce v c befell vpon daye saterdaye actu xiii e nexte sabbat luce iiii e iesus rysynge oute pon trinite sondaye apoc iiii thys loked behold ioh iii ther man pha corpus christi daye cor xi c haue receaued ioha vi f flesh meate dede pon sondaye trinite ioh iiii c god loue luce xvi c ther certayne ryche pon ii sondaye trinite ioh iii b maruayle brother luce xiiii b certayne made great pon iii sondaye tri petr v become ye therfore luce xv resortynge pon iiii sondaye tri rom viii c suppose luce vi ye therfore mer yfull pon v sondaye tri pet iii b conclusion ye luce v came passe whan pon vi sondaye tri rom vi b knowe ye math v b saye vnto excepte pon vii sondaye tri rom vi c speake maner mar viii dayes whan pon viii sondaye tri rom viii b therfore brother mat vii b beware false prophetes pon ix sondaye tri cor x shuld lustynge luce xvi sayde also vnto hys pon x sondaye cor xii ye knowe whan ye luce xix come pon xi sondaye cor xv wyte brother luc xviii b vnto certayne whiche pon xii sondaye ii cor iii haue suche trust mar vii goyng forth agayne pon xiii sondaye gala iii c vnto abraham hys sede luce x c blessed eyen pon xiiii sondaye gala v c saye christ walke luce xvii c fortuned wente pon xv sondaye gala v c yf lyue sprete let math vi c may serue two may pon xvi sondaye ephe iii b wherfore desyre ye luce vii b fortuned afterwarde pon xvii sondaye ephe iiii therfore presoner luce xiiii happened wha iesus pon xviii sonday cor thanke god alwaye mat xxii pharises herde pon xix sondaye ephe iiii c ye renewed sprete math ix iesus goynge vp pon xx sondaye ephe v b take hede therfore brother mat xxii iesus answeryng spake pon xxi sondaye ephe vi b finally brother ye strong ioh iiii f ther certayne pon xxii sondaye phil thanke god euery mat xviii c therfore ye kyngdome pon xxiii sondaye phili iiii b ye follower brethre mat xxii b goynge pharises pon xxiiii sonday colo therfore also sence mat ix c speakynge wordes pon last sonday trinite iere xxiii beholde tyme commeth ioh vi whan iesus lyfted wednisday ember weke afore mychaelmasse amos ix c beholde tyme commeth marc ix b one people answe pon frydaye ose xiiii turne israel luce vii one pharises de pon satyrday heb ix fyrst tabernacle luce xiii certayne fygge tre pin dedication church apoca xxi ihon saw holy luce xix beynge gone wal phere endeth table epistle gospel sondayes followeth ye table ye epistels gospel vsed red diuerse sayntes dayes yeare pon saynt andrewes daye rom x b wc harte beleued mat iiii c iesus walkynge ye see pon concepcyon lady eccl xxiiii c vyne haue mat boke generacio pon thomas apostle daye ephe ii c therfore ye ioh xx c thomas one ye twol pon candelmasse daye mal iii beholde wyll sede me luce ii whan dayes theyr pon mathias apostle daye actu c dayes peter ry mat e tyme iesus answe pon day annunciation gretynge oure lady esa vii b god speake vnto achas luce b syxte moneth pon george daye iaco counte full ioye bre ioh xv true vyne pon marke ye euangelistes daye ephe iiii vnto euery one v ioh xv true vyne fa pon philippe iacobs day sap v shall ryghteous ioh xiiii sayde vnto discip pon natiuite ihon baptist esa xlix herken vnto ye iles luce e elizabeth tyme bry pon peter paul daye act xii tyme layed mat xvi b iesus came coastes pon iames apostle daye ephe ii c therfore ye nowe mat xx c came vnto hym ye mo pon assumpcion lady eccli xxiiii b al thynges also luce x fortuned wente pon bartholomeus daye ephe ii c therfore ye luce xxii b ther rose stryfe amoge pon natiuite lady eccli xxiiii c vyne haue math boke generacion pon mathew apostle daye eze b similitude foure math ix b whan iesus wente pon michael daye apoca shewed
